choices: Call up all her friends and invite them over to make plans.
Jenn tried to figure out where the remote came from.
Bring the remote to school the next day.
Go find some people at the mall to test it out on.
Toy with the device and see if it can make her grow!
1.content:
Jennifer found herself sitting on the bus going home from the beach one warm summers day. She brushed back her long flowing brown hair behind her slightly perky ears and sighed. It was a pretty boring day. Her friends had left a few stops ago and she was on her way home.

When she finally reached her stop, Jenn picked up her towel to wrap around her two piece blue swimsuit and her trim and toned body. As she was stepping off the bus she noticed a tv remote looking device sitting on one of the seats. Her brother was into video games so she nabbed it up for him. Might keep the rodent of a kid of her room for a change.

Wandering off the bus, Jenn toyed with the remote and heard the vehicle pull away. As she poked at the controller, a blast of light fired from it and it hit one of her neibours. An annoying punk guy that lived next door.

Gasping, Jenn almost dropped the device. "I've vaporized him!" She cried. Wandering over she saw that she hadn't. Instead Tom had been shrunk down so that he was just a bit shorter than the tall blades of grass he stood in the middle of.

Flexing her feet on either side of him, Jenn had an evil thought run through her mind. What if she just, sorta squished him? Wiggling her toes, Jenn looked around. No one in sight.

Tom fell back in surprise as he looked up in awe of Jenn's huge body. He had been paralized as she stomped through the grass to him, but now he was truly too scared to move as her now gigantic bare foot lifted over him and her sole wrinkled slightly as she lowered it toward him. Her huge foot, dirty from walking around barefoot all day, descended into the grass upon him.

As Jenn felt the tiny person under the soft sole of her well cared for foot, she eagerly pressed down until she felt her toes getting into the moist mud of her neibours lawn. Lifting her foot, she couldn't even really make anything out. Smiling, Jenn felt overwhelmed. Problem solved! No one knew what had happened and she had just made sure that creep wouldn't be staring at her anymore every time she went out.

Snatching up the remote in her hands, Jenn quickly made her way home and slammed the front door behind her, back pressed tightly against it as her soft pink lips smiled devilishly. Her bright green eyes lit up as she decided to...
1.title: Jennifer's BIG discovery

choices: Rachelle wants to use it on her cheating punk rocker boyfriend.
Becky wants to take out the girls that work at the clothing store in the mall.
Tiffany wants to use it to take out the schools rival basketball team.
Jenn wants to go to the local video game store and take out some nerd there.
Jenn's little brother comes downstairs, so Jenn demonstrates on him!
11.content:
Jenn didn't waste any time in quickly calling up Rachelle, Becky, and Tiffany. Jenn was almost too excited to explain everything as she padded at the sole of her foot with a damp paper towel, wiping the mark her neighbour made off.

Not too surprisingly, the girls quickly made it to Jenn's house. She had been sort of vague when she rambled off her story on the phone, and no one was quite sure what was going on.

Rachelle arrived first. A tall, dark haired girl who had a casual punk look. With a black tank top, a light grey unbuttoned overshirt, and dark khakis with the bottom half taken off so they only went a bit below her knees.

Becky and Tiffany arrived together. Becky was blonde with fluffy bangs and a pony tail, bright blue eyes. She was dressed in a pink skirt with a white sports shirt on. Probably the most excentric of the group, Becky quickly threw down her colorful backpack and wandered in.

Tiff on the other hand had shoulder length hair that was brown like Jenn's but a bit lighter from constant highlights. She had light freckles too that were visible on her face, and shoulders that were bare from her sports tank top. Her matching black shorts were almost as long as Rachelle's khakis and had white stripes down the side.

They gathered in the living room, assuming that no one was home. Jenn explained her frantic story again, this time showing off the remote.

"Do you know what this means?" She explained excitedly, "We can get rid of all the people we don't like and no one will ever know!"

"Isn't that wrong?" Becky said plainly. "I mean comon, you squished him under your bare foot after being around town all day? Gross! Comon, how would you like my foot stepping on you?"

Rachelle was more in thought. "It's not that bad of an idea. No one would suspect that the marks we left behind were people."

"Exactly!" Jenn chimed and laughed. "So, who are we going to test this on first?"
11.title: Meeting Jenn's friends

choices: Jenn puts her plan into action
111.content:
The next day, Becky, Tiffany, Rachelle and Jenn arrived in school and dropped off their packs in the lockers, as usual. Nothing about them suggested an unusual day. However, nobody took the time to look in Jenn’s pocket, where she carried the shrink ray.

Half the day passed by uneventfully, and then they all filed into the lunch room. The four of them sat down at their “popular girls” table, and looked out around the lunchroom at all the other cliques. There was the nerd table, where all the nerds were collaborating on some weird machine; the jock table, where everyone was going over the secret plays for the next football game; the actor table, where everyone was in full costume for one play or another, from Hamlet to The Adventures of Spaceman Jim; and the vampire slayer table, where a bunch of weird-looking kids sat around eating meals with plenty of garlic and holding wooden stakes.

Becky, Tiffany, Rachelle and Jenn had all gotten the school lunch: ham sandwiches with chocolate cake and tinned peaches, when Jenn excused herself. Her no-good punk rocker boyfriend, instantly recognizable in his Ramones T-shirt, was hitting on another girl. She moved towards him slowly. Her plan was to lure him into the now-empty locker room with the promise of sex, then shrink him and flush him down the toilet…

Meanwhile, Tiffany, looking around the lunchroom, suddenly noticed an attractive boy at the vampire slayers table. He was tall and muscular, with light skin and grayish blonde hair, which he wore in dreadlocks. He chatted energetically with the other vampire slayers at the table, who addressed him as Spike.
111.title: The next day...

1112.content: Jenn aimed the shrink ray at Rachelle's boyfriend, he saw Jenn aiming the remote at him and took it out of her hands before she could get the remote to shrink him. he held it up in the air and said ''hmm Whats this little toy you have?'' he continues to mess around with it. suddenly the remote goes off and lets out a beam of light in the direction of the girls start to...
1112.title: Jenn puts her plan into action

11121.content:
Much to the chagrin of Rachelle's boyfriend, the girls start to grow big.

How big?
11121.title: ...grow big

11122.content:
Much to the surprise of Rachelle's boyfriend, the girls start to shrink.

How small?
11122.title: start to shrink

choices: Rachelle, she seems the most eager to squish someone.
Becky, let's see what kind of fun the bubbly blonde has with the bug-girl.
112.content:
Becky's mood, although soured at first to the idea of stepping on human beings, lightened as a thought crossed her mind. "Oh! We can go to the mall and get rid of some of the people from school we don't like!" She piped to the girls. She glanced at Tiffany, grinning, "Like Samantha". Samantha, along with others from their school, worked in the various stores throughout the town's Mall.

Tiffany smiled, obviously receptive to the idea. Samantha wouldn't feel so smug about luring Tiffany's ex, Glenn away from her when she was done with her. "Yes! That sounds awesome!" Said Tiff.

With that, the girls got themselves together and headed out. They stuffed themselves into Jenn's Mom's blue corolla and headed off on the short drive through the warm suburban air. Rachelle, still excited, was chatting away in the back seat. "Oh my god, do you guys have any idea how cool this is going to be?". The girls were silent. All were lost in their own thoughts of the possibilities which the remote in Jenn's possession afforded them. Before they new it, they were pulling onto the broad asphalt of the super center parking lot. Stepping out of the car, the girls practically ran with excitement towards the automatic glass doors.

Stepping through, Jenn, with the remote safely in her purse, led the way through the throng of shoppers. Becky, looking a little nervous, asked Jenn; "So, um, you'll be careful right? We could get into serious trouble if someone catches us, you know". This drew a snort of laughter from the other girl. "If anyone catches us, we'll step on them. Becky. Don't you realize the power this thing gives me?". "Gives us, you mean" added Rachelle. Ignoring her, Jenn continued walking.

"There it is! That's where she works!" This from Tiffany, her grin nearly reaching both ears. Stepping through the anti-theft sensors, the girls entered the mall's Macy's. The store was massive, a melting pot of chatting shoppers, clothing racks, gaily dressed mannequins and black-clad employees.

"There she is" Said Jenn after a few minutes of wandering around the store, walking up to Samantha. Samantha was leaning on a glass counter filled with perfumes, having a conversation with one of the girls in charge of that station, their words inaudible over the din of the store. Samantha was an attractive girl, more so than any of the girls, and they new it. While she was not as popular as Jenn and her friends, Sam's beauty rankled them. Tan, with deep hazel eyes, Samantha looked up as the girls approached. Curls of black hair that went down past her shoulders framed a kind, feminine face.

"Oh. Hello" she said non nonchalantly, her eyes flickered to Tiffany, and her mouth spread into a self-satisfied grin. After all, making the quarterback of the school football team leave his girlfriend for you was no light feat. "What can I help you girls with? We have the new line of active wear in if any of you want to lose some of those extra pounds" she said, drawing laughter from the girl behind the counter. Jenn thought for a moment. The perfume stand was in the middle of the place, people walking past on all sides. Shrinking her in front of all these people was not an option. One or two people seeing was one matter, but the last thing Jenn wanted was twenty people trying to tackle the remote away from her. What was a place in the store that would be relatively empty?

"Oh, hi Samantha" said Jenn, maintaining composure. "Could you show us where the suits are? The men's suits?"
"They're over there" said Samantha, waving her arm to the left. "Through the doorway there, all in one room."
"Could you take us? Please? Look at this place, we could get lost!" Jenn's voice was heavy with sarcasm

With a sigh, Samantha grudgingly led the girls towards the suits. She knew they were up to something stupid, but she was working, and the last thing she needed was a scene or her managers getting involved. She strode through the doorway, Jenn and company in tow. Nobody else in this section, just as Jenn suspected. Most of the stores business this time of the year was made up of girls buying their revealing summer clothes. Stepping out into the middle of the room, She turned around, her arms spread dramatically "Here we are! I-" She was cut off as blast of light hit her in the chest. In an instant, Samantha was gone, or so it seemed.

"Oh my god! It worked!" Squeaked Becky. Walking over to where she was last seen, the girls spotted her. Still frozen with the shock of her newfound perspective, Samantha stood still as a statue, no taller than one inch. She looked, shocked out of her daze as she was suddenly surrounded on all sides by four pairs of prettily pedicured, flip-flop shod feet. Looking up, she saw four massive faces looking down at her, from incomprehensibly high up. "What the fuck did you do to me!?" She screamed.

"I think shes saying something" Said Becky. "Who cares" Said Jenn, wiggling her toes with anticipation. "She doesn't look so pretty now, whaddaya think girls?" Laughing, they all gave their agreements. "Well Sam, Its been nice" she continued, slipping her right foot from her flip flop. She raised her foot, the sole finely wrinkled and slightly dirty from the lax protection given by her choice of footwear, over the tiny girl, flexing it."I want you to know Sam, I'm really gonna enjoy feeling you go squish on the bottom of my foot" she said with a grin. Letting out a scream barely audible to the ears of the titanic beauties, Samantha fell backwards onto the shallow carpeting of the room. She scrambled around frantically, and got her self up facing the other way, and went to run away from Jenn, but the massive feet of Tiffany stood before her, with Rachelle and Becky to her left and right. "You cant do this! Please! Please!". But it was no use. "Don't be too upset Sam, I've been told my feet are very pretty, you should be honored!" Jenn looked like she was barely containing laughter.

She started to lower her foot towards the girl, slowly, so she could see it coming. "Wait!" Said Rachelle. "You already got to squish someone today, let one of us try!" Jenn paused, her delicate foot hovering mere inches over the helpless girl, and after a few heartbeats she sighed, stepping into her flip flop. "Alright, alright, you're right. So, who wants the honor of first bug squash?" "Second, you mean" Becky chimed in. "Shut up".

So, who will crush Samantha?
112.title: Mall Mayhem

choices: Let's go to the food court, I'm hungry!
Let's see if anyone else we don't like works here.
Let's find that security guard that doesnt like us!
1121.content:
"Rachelle, you seem eager, why don't you give it a try?"
"Don't mind if I do" Rachelle responded, smiling. She slid her foot from her flip flop, and wiggled her plump toes, each one topped in pitch black polish.

"Hey, wait a minute" said Tiffany. "I'm the one she fucked with, I should be the one to do it. You take the next one, Rachelle". "Fine, go for it". Her foot went back into it's flip flop, scrunching her toes a few times to get it comfortable. Tiffany sat on her heels to address Samantha. "You think I forgot about Glenn, bitch? You humiliated me in front of the whole school making him dump me for you. Doesn't matter anymore, Glenn's about to be single again and you'll never be with another man" she said sweetly. Expecting a reply, Tiffany did not get one. Samantha was curled into a ball, crying inconsolably. Tiffany stood. Realizing what was about to happen, Samantha got to her knees and looked up "Please, I'm sorry, I'm sorry!" she sobbed, looking up with pleading eyes, but Tiffany was already out of earshot.

Removing her flip flop, she placed her heel on the ground in front of Samantha, the ball of her foot poised high above her. Long slender toes adorned with french tips let light down on Samantha from between them. "Bye Sam" With that Tiffany brought her foot down, lightly at first, the ball of her foot coming straight towards Samantha. From her perspective it was horrible, warm, wrinkled flesh pinned her to the carpet, preventing all movement. She could smell the sweat and feel the moisture, both of which were a product of the summer's heat. She thrashed wildly, frantically trying to avoid what she knew would be her death, but the soft pink flesh gave no quarter.

Up top, Tiffany was feeling amused. "This is so cool! I can feel her squirming, it kinda tickles". "Come on already, I want to try one!" said Becky. With that, Tiffany put all of her weight onto her heel. Slowly, she shifted the weight towards the ball of her foot where Samantha was. Tiffany felt the squirming stop, and the girls thought they heard a faint crack. Finally, after a few seconds, there was an audible wet pop, and Tiffany's foot made a small, quick movement as what was blocking it from touching the ground was suddenly gone.

"Ew, that sounded gross" said Becky. "Let's see!" Rachelle added. With that, Tiffany lifted her foot. Balancing on her left, she placed her right foot in her left hand, the sole pointing up towards the ceiling so the girls could get a closer look. The girls drew close to look at what was once a person. "Ew, gross!" was Becky's reaction, but she did not seem disgusted, and she did not look away. "Ha, I can see her face!" said Rachelle. Jenn looked at Tiffany with approval. A small, pulpy red mass was stuck to the ball of her foot. Samantha's arms and legs were visible, small twigs bent and twisted in all the wrong places, her midsection completely blown apart by Tiffany's foot. Black hair slick with gore lay in complete disarray, framing what was once a beautiful face. The flattening of her skull gave a deformed cast to Samantha's features, her jaw nowhere in sight.

"That was awesome!" Tiffany exulted. With that, she put her foot back down and dragged it across the carpet a few times. Soon, Samantha was off of her foot and nothing was visible on the carpet but a faint red smear. "Wow, she's dead" said Becky. "Who's dead?" Jenn replied. "No one's dead, all we did was kill a bug, I dunno what happened to Sam" she said, making an innocent face. The girls smiled to one another. "Well girls" Jen continued, "What's next?".
1121.title: This One's for Glenn

choices: Let's go find some nerds to squish!
Let's go take out the girls at Hot Topic.
11211.content:
"I could use a bite to eat" Rachelle declared. Jenn assented; "Sounds good to me". Not sparing a glance for the small red smear on the carpet, the girls headed out of the men's formal wear section, and out into the tumult of the main body of the store. They passed the girl behind the perfume counter on the way out. "Hey, where'd Samantha go?" She asked. Jenn spoke without stopping "I dunno, she wandered off, probably to clean a bathroom or something. Hey, I saw some bugs in there, you guys should really look into that". With that, the girls walked out of the store and back onto the broad polished floors of the mall.

         Looking to her right as they walked, Tiffany let out a gasp. "Look! aren't those guys from the Edgemont high football team?". Jenn looked, and smiled; they were. Edgemont high's football team was the main rival of the team at Jenn's school. Seeing five of them walking into a sporting goods store was a stroke of luck. She could have 'fun' with them, and at the same time help out her team. Two birds with one stone, she thought to herself. "Let's go" she said, leading the way towards the store.

         Inside, the guys were lounging in an aisle of the store, while one of them was looking over the selection of cleats. They all had their jerseys on, undoubtedly for the attention they knew they would receive. One of them, a tall blonde, was talking to the groups pale redhead while he fiddled with a box of cleats.
"Dude I'm telling you, she was totally into me".
"Yeah? how you figure that?"
"She looked at me whenever she laughed"
"And?"
"And that means she likes me, its like, psychology, I read about it somewhere"
"Good to know, Doctor Freud"

Jenn and the girls walked up to the jocks, they were alone in the aisle, and the shelves were tall enough that they were all sheltered from view. "Hey boys" Jenn said in a sultry voice. The looks of the four girls made the jocks stop what they were doing and look towards them. They all began to smile, two of them casually rested an arm on a shelf and crossed their legs, trying to look suave. "Hello ladies, what brings you into a sporting goods store? Buying something for your boyfriends?" This from one who appeared to be the groups leader, a tall lad with a jaw like an anvil. "Oh, no, none of us have boyfriends, isn't that right girls?" The girls all nodded, giggling, and the jocks smiled and gave each other sly looks. Jenn continued; "hey, you guys wanna see something cool? you have to promise not to tell anyone" not that that was going to be an issue. "We'll look at whatever you girls want to show us" the jock replied to Jenn's faux flirt.

         "Okay, remember, no telling" Jenn said. She took the remote out of her purse, and aimed it at the jocks. "You want to show us a toy? What is-" Jenn held down the trigger and swept the beam across the five guys, each one 'vanishing' the instant the beam touched them. She walked over to where the leader was and stopped. Her feet on either side of him, she squatted down and spoke to him. "Pretty cool, huh?" The jock stared in shock and awe at the massive feet to either side of him, and the long, smooth bare legs atop each. Before he could come to his senses, Jenn plucked his inch tall figure up between two slender fingers, being careful not to apply too much pressure. "You guys are fucked" she said with a wolfish smile. Before the jock could respond, Jenn took her makeup bag from her purse, and popping it open, she dropped the tiny man inside. She saw the other four trying to make a run for it, but it was no use at their size. One by one she plucked them up and put them into the makeup bag. Once they were all in, she snapped the little pink bag closed and dropped it carelessly into her purse, letting out a contented sigh.

         "We'll have our fun in a bit, I'm hungry." with those words the girls left the store and resumed their long walk to the food court. A few minutes later and they were on the escalator that would take them to their destination. "Ooh look, Johnny Rockets! Lets get burgers!" Becky squeaked. She made a bee line straight for the retro themed burger joint. The other girls acquiesced and followed her in. They placed their orders, and soon all girls were headed out into the food court proper to find a place to sit and eat, each girl with her cheeseburger and chocolate shake. The food court was a massive open floor filled with tables, all with attached benches. The ceiling rose up far overhead, at least three stories high. One whole side of the massive room was a floor to ceiling wall of window panels overlooking the rolling hills of the suburban landscape. The girls found a table far from anyone else, where they were sure they would not be disturbed.

         Placing their food on the table, the girls sat and began to eat."Hey" Rachelle said through a mouthful of burger, "I still haven't gotten to squish anyone"."Me either" Becky added. "Stop being so impatient, we have the jocks in my purse, remember? Besides, maybe we can go look for some nerds after we eat" said Jenn. "Squishing nerds sounds fun!" Tiffany said. Placing her purse on the table, Jenn decided to have a little fun before she continued her meal. "What are you gonna do?" Becky asked? "Hush, you'll see". Popping open the makeup bag, Jenn reached in without looking and lightly pinched the first tiny person her fingers felt. She brought him up to her face, it was the anvil-jawed leader of the group. Pinching his clothes behind his back so he was facing her, she asked him
"Whaddaya think? Pretty cool right?"
"What the fuck is this? What did you do to us?!"
The tiny man seemed shaken. "Don't be scared, I wont hurt you" Jenn said with all the tender flirtatiousness she could muster, "I only want to have a little fun". With that, she began caressing his body with the tip of her right index finger, paying special attention to his groin. It only took a few moments of this for him to completely forget he was in a potentially life threatening situation. "Take off your pants big guy, I'll turn you back to normal size after I have my fun" She put him down onto the table, and he was more than happy to oblige. At this point the girls had stopped eating and were watching Jenn, wondering where she was going with this. As soon as the jock had his pants off, Jenn picked him up in her fingers again. His member was stiff as a rock. "Look girls" she said, turning him around for them to see, "I think he likes me". As soon as the words we done coming out of her mouth, she reached between his tiny legs with her fingers. Bringing her nails together, she pinched, then pulled. She wiped her fingers off as the jock writhed in her fingers, letting out roars of agony that were barely more than squeaks to the girls. Having had her fun, Jenn dropped him through the open dome of her milkshake top, watching him squirm but not sink into the drink. She pulled out her straw, placed the bottom of it on his chest, and plunged him down into the thick cream. "Brutal" Tiffany said. The girls broke out into fits of giggles.

         "What should we do with the rest of them, Jenn?". "I want to try eating one!" said Rachelle. "Order up" said Jenn, reaching into the makeup bag. This time she pulled out the redhead and dropped him into Rachelle's outstretched palm. "Hey little guy" she said, bringing him up towards her face. "I'm hungry, would you mind if I ate you?" she asked teasingly. She picked up the screaming jock and pressed him onto her outstretched tongue, she brought her tongue in and closed her mouth. The redhead lay in the dark on a warm, wet bumpy surface, he was quickly gasping and spluttering as more and more saliva began to coat him. Swishing him around for a few seconds, Rachelle decided enough was enough and worked him with her tongue onto her molars. She bit down and felt a crunch. "Ick! Disgusting!" she said, immediately taking a sip of her milkshake. "If you want to eat one, don't chew". Jenn had taken the other three out to watch, and at this point they were scrambling around frantically in her cupped palm, trying in vain to escape. She picked them out, and put one in Becky and Tiffany's hands. "Bottoms up, girls!". With that, the three popped their tiny men into their mouths, and after a few seconds of sucking on them, swallowed them whole. Rachelle sighed, and said sadly; "And then there were none". "Don't worry" Jenn replied, "plenty of time left in the day, and plenty of 'bugs' left in the mall". The girls laughed, and finished their meals in silence.

"That, was good" Tiffany said, leaning forward onto her elbows. "Now what?". "Lets find some nerds to squish!" Becky said excitedly. "Eating them was boring". "Lets go to Hot Topic" Rachelle said, "I hate the girls that work there, lets go show them our cool 'toy'" Rachelle said. "Well, which should we do?" Tiffany asked Jenn.
11211.title: Getting Grub and Squashing Grubs

choices: Wait here and see if more nerds come.
Head back out into the mall and hunt for victims.
Go take out the girls at hot topic as Rachelle suggested earlier.
112111.content:
"We've gotten some jocks, I think it's only fair we give some nerds a turn". Jenn said with a grin. The other girls smiled with her, and leaving their trays, they left the table.

         The girls, satiated from their meal, headed off once more into the bustle of the mall to search for more prey. "Where do we even find nerds in this place?" Becky said. Jenn laughed. "Easy, Beck, all we have to do is find a store that sells computer games". Seeing a directory, the girls made their way over to it and began to formulate a plan. "How about Gamestop?" Rachelle asked. Jenn shook her head "Those are small and too open, we need a larger place". She tapped a store on the directory with her finger. "Best Buy, perfect". With that, they were on their way to the massive tech store. "Remember, Becky and I get to squish next" said Rachelle.

         "It should be coming up in a few mins" Jenn said. The girls continued walking, their flip flops beginning to make a sticky, peeling sound with every step as all the walking and the summers heat drew perspiration. "There it is!" Becky said excitedly, pointing to the large yellow tag. Stepping through the automatic glass doors, the girls entered Best Buy. Hard, grey carpeting covered the floors, and everywhere they looked their eyes met some sort of nerdy tech. "Perfect" Tiffany said. The girls walked up to the nearest employee, A fat man with plenty of pimples to spare and a greasy pony tail, a ratty beard growing from his neck covering the collar of his blue shirt. "Excuse me" Jenn asked, "Do you know where the computer games are?". The fat man raised an eyebrow, obviously wondering what four pretty girls were doing asking for computer games. "They're that way, in the back right hand corner with the console games, they're all along the walls" He raised his arm to point, exposing the soaked armpit of his shirt. "Thanks, tubs" Jenn said, walking away. The mans smile turned into a scowl as he glared at their backs. "Cunts" he mumbled under his breath.

         The girls made their way down the aisle until they spotted a sign hanging from the ceiling. "Games" it read simply. Walking in, the first glances made the girls hearts sink. Empty. But walking further in, they spotted two nerds in the corner of the room where the two computer game shelves met. They walked past the empty console aisles until they were feet away from the nerds.

***

         Tim and Brian stood next to the games, arguing as they looked for some interesting game to pick out. Brian was your average nerd, slightly chubby, shy and soft spoken. His short brown hair uncombed, and his plump cheeks stained with a permanent blush. Tim stood a full foot taller than him, but he was by no means attractive. Greasy, shoulder length black hair framed an acne scarred face with a recessed chin. He stood awkwardly, his arms and legs seeming too long and gangly for his small torso. They continued their argument.
"She is totally evil, dude" Brian said
"She's not, she was only doing what she needed to, they were at war!" Tim responded, his voice cracking as the end of the sentence neared.
"Yeah, a war she started! The Burning Legion had just been defeated, they finally had some peace."
"So? The Alliance and the Horde are still enemies, still at war, she was just being preemptive."
"Preemptive!?" Brian nearly yelled. "By burning a bunch of civilians! That's not war, that's-"

         The words froze on Brian's tongue as he spotted something something behind Tim. Four of the most beautiful girls he had ever seen seen had just walked into view from behind the console aisles. In front was a tall girl with long brown hair and vibrant green eyes wearing a blue t-shirt, going down to jean shorts that were cut almost obscenely high, showing off long shapely legs. With her was a dark haired punk girl darkly dressed, a freckled brunette with shoulder length hair and a blonde. His heart started beating faster as he looked at the blonde. She wore a pony tail with fluffy bangs that flowed down to her deep blue eyes. She was breathtaking. With a flush he also noted that all of them were wearing flip flops, showing off four pairs of beautiful, pedicured feet. Brian felt his anxiety flaring up, and silently prayed that he face was not getting any redder than usual.

         "Oh hey, can you guys help us?" the girl in front asked. "Uh, sure. Um, whats up?" Tim asked. "Do you guys know if there are any games about giant women crushing tiny guys?". Tim and Brian looked at one another, that was an odd question. "No" Tim answered, "There's Attack of the 50ft Woman, but that's a movie". Brian spoke up without thinking; "There's a website where you can read a bunch of stories like that, where-" realizing what he was staying, and to whom, he stopped. He looked at the ground, face burning redder than usual with embarrassment. The green eyed girl took note of his embarrassment and laughed. "You nerds are into that type of stuff, yeah? What would you do if you were actually shrunken? Do you think it would be fun?" The other three girls giggled. Tim became flustered. "I- Um- I don't-". "Shut up" She said coldly. There was something about the tone of her voice that chilled Brian. Without saying anything, she quickly took something out of her purse. Before he could say anything, a bright flash of light filled his eyes, and he saw nothing but bright white. When he regained his vision, he was no longer in the aisle of the store. He looked around. He was. Everything looked different somehow, and it hit him like a freight train. He had shrunk. He looked up and saw four titanic girls looking down and giggling. Tim, who was seconds ago feet from him, was now many yards away, standing between him and the girls. They couldn't be more than half an inch tall.

         "Aww look, they're scared". The green eyed girl said. "Good. Well girls, lets squish some nerds". Brian's heart fluttered, surely they weren't being serious. They wouldn't kill him and Tim, they couldn't. She took a step towards Tim, who fell onto his back with an arm raised between them. "Hey Jenn, remember, it's my turn." the punk girl said. "Yeah yeah, go ahead Rachelle". Rachelle, the punk girl, walked over to where Tim was. "Finally" she said, looking down at him between her flip flopped feet. "I've been waiting all day to squish a nerd". The words sent a chill down Brian's spine. Rachelle took her right foot out of her flip flop and stepped onto the ground next to Tim. Seeing what was happening, he got up to run, but the punk girl was not about to let him get away. Rachelle gave Tim a light tap with the ball of her foot. Light to her at least. Tim now lay his back, long legs motionless and broken, his left arm twisted and folded under him. All he could do was sit there panting from the pain. "Aw man, I did it too hard" Rachelle said sadly, "oh well". She placed the ball of her foot on the ground in front of him, blocking Tim from Brian's view. All he could see was the top of her foot and her plump, black nailed toes spread on the ground. "Bye bug!" she brought her heel down with a squishy pop. Lifting the ball of her foot, Brian stared, dumbstruck, at her wrinkled sole as she put all her weight onto her heel and twisted back and forth, grinding his friend into the carpet.

         Finally she stopped. She tilted her foot to the side, her sole wrinkling, so she could inspect her heel. "Cool, look!" she said, pointing to a red splotch on her heel. Oh god, Tim! Tim's dead! Brian thought to himself. Rachelle looked down at him and smiled, sending a spike of fear through him. He sighed with relief as she slid her flip flop back on and walked back to her friends. Maybe they would spare him now that they had killed Tim. "You're up Becky" she said. The fear returned once more as the beautiful, blue eyed blonde walked over to Brian. This wasn't fun. This wasn't sexy. Brian was going to die. He started tearing up as Becky took off both flip flops and stepped up to him, putting him face to face with gargantuan toes topped in hot pink polish. Brian could not help it, he began to cry. "Please" he begged, "I don't want to die". Becky squatted down and put her face close to his. His breath caught as he looked into her face. Deadly as his situation was, she was beautiful. "Whats that little guy? You say something?". "Please! I don't want to die! Please don't do this!" his voice broke on the last word and the tears flowed forth anew. "Aw, sorry, but I've been waiting to squish a nerd like you all day. I saw you looking at our feet before, try to enjoy it a little before you die, I'll make it nice and slow". With a giggle she stood, leaving Brian feeling hollow. Running a pink tongue across her bottom lip, she raised her foot above him. Scared as he was Brian couldn't help but admire the beautiful, slightly dirty sole poised above him. Then it moved downward. Brian raised his arms instinctively and soon his hands made contact with the moist, pink flesh. It pressed down onto him, covering his legs and forcing his elbows to the ground. "Oh wow, he's strong!" she said, her voice filled with sarcasm. Brian's sensed were filled with the scent of her foot, sweaty from the heat of the summer. The pressure increased, and his forearms gave out with loud cracks. Just as he began to scream out his agony, her foot came down farther and put pressure on his chest and head, squeezing the air out of him. Brian thought the pain could not get any worse. He was wrong. Pain lanced through his body as he heard various parts of his body cracking. Brian heard a pop. Blackness enveloped him.

         ***

"That. Was. Awesome!" Becky squealed. Bringing her foot up, she admired her handiwork. "Hope he got a little fun out of it at least". She licked her thumb and proceeded to wipe the nerd's pulpy remains off her sole. "I want to do that again!" said Rachelle. "Lets-"
112111.title: In Search of Nerds

choices: Shrink some people and bring them back to Jenn's for some fun.
1121113.content:
It had been a long day working at Best Buy, and Ralph was just about ready to go home. Turning around and scratching the beard on his neck, he glanced at the clock. Only two in the afternoon, still hours to go. His mood had been ruined for the day when that girl called him tubs. They were pretty cute though, weren't they? he thought to himself. Their pretty faces, their smooth bare legs exposed to the summers heat. He thought about walking over to the computer section just so he could see them again. I'm being an idiot he told himself, what's gonna be my excuse for going over there?. Standing for a few minutes, Ralph's libido eventually beat his intellect into submission. They've been there for a few minutes, I'll go ask if they need help. Employees do that all the time. With that thought, he was off. Shifting his weight from one hip to the other, his elephantine lumbering sent waves of fat rippling beneath his blue shirt as he waddled towards the gaming section.

          "That. Was. Awesome!" Ralph heard a feminine voice say as he walked past the console aisles. "Hope he got a little fun out of it at least". He came into view of the computer games, and saw the four girls from earlier. They had their backs to him, facing the blonde. Her flip flops were off on the floor beside her, and she was wiping something off the sole of her foot with her thumb. "I want to do that again!" said the dark haired punk girl. "Let's go to Hot Topic and use this thing on the girls there". The green eyed girl who seemed to be the leader of the four was about to say something, but turned around and saw Ralph looking at them. There was something about the look on her face... You should get out of here a voice seemed to say in Ralph's head. Ridiculous, they were just your average rude hot girls, nothing to be scared of. Without saying anything the green eyed girl took something out of her purse and lifted it towards Ralph. A white flash blinded him, and he fell over onto the ground. He heard a series of loud footfalls, and when his vision cleared, he was faced with four pairs of massive, flip flopped feet. He followed those feet up shapely legs, until he was staring into the faces of the four girls, a skyscraper's height above him.

         "Dibs! I want to squish this one!" laughed the brunette with shoulder length hair and freckles. She took off her flip flops and raised a foot above Ralph. Panic seized him as he realized what was going on, and instinct took over. Ralph struggled to get his massive bulk onto his feet, and took two lumbering leaps away from the girl before falling flat on his stomach. He felt something warm press onto him from above, the girls foot. The pressure increased and Ralph tried to scream, but all that came out was a croak. Feeling immense pain and pressure, as if all his blood was trying to leave through his face, Ralph's vision began to darken. Cracking and popping filled Ralph's ears as pain spread throughout his body. All went black.

***

         "Jeeze, that one was messy" Tiffany said, wiping the red pulp that covered nearly the entire ball of her foot onto the carpet. "You gotta make the fat ones smaller, Jenn". "Noted". Satisfied for the moment, the girls continued with Rachelle's plan and headed out of Best Buy and started making their way to Hot Topic. After a short, uneventful walk, the girls arrived in front of the counter cultured store.

         The inside of the store was a hodgepodge of grunge clothing and pop culture memorabilia. It stood empty except for the employees, three goth looking girls. The girls walked up to the counter in the back of the store, behind which all three of them stood. "Hi welcome to Ho-" The goth girl who spoke stopped as she spotted Rachelle. "Oh, it's you. Sorry, we're out of our plus sized shirts, but you can come back next week". This brought laughter from the other two blackly dressed goths behind the counter.Glancing behind her, Jenn observed that the store was still empty, and nobody was looking inside. Eager to be out of this ridiculous store, Jenn took the remote from her purse. "You goths always looked stupid to me, I think I'll enjoy killing you weirdos". Before they could react to the strange threat, light flashed from the remote, and the three girls were out of sight.

         Walking behind the counter, the girls spotted them on the floor, an inch tall each. They all were looking around in confusion, still not adjusted to their new perspective. Taking off her flip flops, Jenn walked over to the closest girl, the one who had made the plus sized clothing remark. Sweat from walking around all day made Jenn's feet make an audible peeling noise each time she removed a foot from the black linoleum to take a step. The girl tried to back away as Jenn stepped up to her, but Jenn put her foot in front of her and raked her back with her toes. "You're not people in my world, you're just a bunch of bugs. Sadly for you, squishing bugs is fun". With that she pushed the goth girl over with her toes and placed her big toe on top of her. The girls arms and face were visible, and Jenn laughed as she beat desperately at the soft flesh of Jenn's toe with her fist's. Jenn put more weight onto her toe, watching as the goth girl's arms and face grew red. Eventually her arms stopped beating, and her face became a mask of horror and pain. With a pop, the goth's head snapped to the left as organs came bursting out through her neck, she went still. Jen then ground the remains under her heel so they could not be recognized as human.

          The other two goth girls, upon seeing what became of their friend, tried to make a run for it. Becky and Rachelle wasted no time. Easily overtaking them, Rachelle stepped on the nearest goth, not bothering to take off her flip flops. Becky had other plans. Her right foot came out of her flip flop, and she slammed her foot down onto the goth that was running from her. The goth was unhurt, Becky making sure she only trapped the girl with her toes. She scrunched her toes, pressing the goth girl to the soft, fleshy edge of the sole of her foot with her toes. Becky laughed at the slight tickle she felt as the tiny girl tried in vain to squirm free. Lifting her foot off the ground, she gave a quick squeeze and uncurled her toes, letting the girl fall to the floor. She lay twitching on the ground where she fell, not dead, her twisted body unable to comply with the urgent signals her brain was sending. Without saying anything, Becky stepped down onto the girl with her heel until she heard the now familiar wet, crunchy pop of a tiny person bursting, then twisted her foot.

         "That's never gonna get old" She said, smiling happily. The other girls laughed and gave their agreements. "Finally, lets get out of this stupid store. Smells like middle school angst in here" Jenn said, heading for the door. The girls went wandering through the mall, trying to think of what they should do next. "I'm gettin kinda bored of the mall" Rachelle said. "Let's go to the beach!" Becky chirped. Jenn had already been to the beach earlier, and was not very eager to go back. "I say," Tiffany began softly, "we find some people to shrink and take them back to Jenn's, have a little fun with them where we won't be bothered, play around a little". Jenn was more receptive to this idea, her mom would be at work for quite some time yet, and her little snot of a brother Eddy was at a sleepover at a friends house.

What do the girls decide to do next?
1121113.title: Hunting at Hot Topic

choices: Follow the horrors of the ordeal from the guy's perspective.
Partake in the fun with the girls.
11211131.content:
"I like you're idea, Tiff. A little privacy would mean we could get... creative" Jenn said with a smile. "Lets head back to the car, we'll find some bugs to take with us along the way". The girls left the Hot Topic, making their way through the shoppers to the exit at the other end of the mall. Not seeing any opportunities as they walked, the girls stepped out of the glass doors of the malls entrance and into the hot summer's air. Heading out into the large parking lot to where Jenn had parked, the girls saw a group of six guys walking in front of them, going in the same direction. Talking and laughing, they seemed to Jenn to be perfect targets. They all seemed to be the same age as the girls. Jenn looked at the others and nodded. Trailing behind them, the girls followed them until they all got into an old silver Honda Odyssey.

         Jenn took out the remote. "I've never tried this on anything other than people, let's see what happens". With that, Jenn pointed the remote at the car and fired. Quick as a lightning strike, the beam hit the car with a flash. The next instant the car was still in its parking space, but it was the size of a toy car. "Quick, pick it up!" Jenn said. She didn't want to give the now inch tall guys in the toy sized car to try driving off, or get out and scatter. Skipping over to the car with a girly giggle, Becky quickly bent and picked up the car in her hand. Keeping her hand curled around it so all four doors could not open, Becky brought the car up to her face. She looked into the windshield with one eye, laughing, "you should see the looks on their faces, they're terrified!". "Alright" Jenn said, "let's go". The girls crowded once more into the blue corolla, Becky clutching the car in her fist like a child who has just gotten a precious, longed for toy.

***

Whom do we follow?
11211131.title: Car Troubles

112111311.content:
Walking through the parking lot with his friends towards his old Odyssey, John reflected on the day he had just spent at the mall. The carefree air, the girls in revealing clothing, the time spent with friends, all were a reminder of why he loved summer, and why he always hated to see it go. "Oh god" said Billy sickly, hands on his gut, "I think I had too many cinnabuns". John and the guys laughed, "You always eat too much, it's why you have that fat gut". "Fuck you" Billy said, however he laughed along with them, he was used to being at the butt end of jokes. His propensity towards self-deprecation made him a popular target to hurl roasts at to get everyone to laugh. Seeing his ride a few car-lengths away, John hit the unlock button on his keys, drawing a friendly "chirp-chirp" from the SUV. John got into the drivers seat, with Billy sitting shotgun. Ryan, Frankie, Jacob and George crowded into the back two rows through the sliding doors. Looking in the rear view mirror, John ran a hand through his short cropped brown hair. He always prided himself in his looks, and was always vigilant in grooming himself. That was how he got the nickname "The Diva" earlier in his freshman days. George, the dumb-as-a-stump, yet kind, broadly built redhead whistled at him. "Lookin good girl!". "Yeah yeah, piss off". Content with the state of his hair, John went to put the keys in the ignition, when suddenly he and the others were blinded by a flash of light, their vision taking a few seconds to return. "Aliens!" boomed George from the back. "Shut up George. John, what the fuck was that? Did you blow the engine?" Frankie asked. Billy pointed out of the windshield "Dude look!". Somehow the car had moved, for in front of them lay a concrete wall rising ten feet into the air. "How the hell did that wall get there?" Ryan asked. "Holy shit" John said, viewing a massive tire through his door's window. "It's not a wall, it's the god damn curb! We're tiny!". "Aliens!" Boomed George once more. "Shut up!" was the reply in unison from the five others. Before anyone could say another word, the car lurched. A giant hand wrapped around the car, blocking all the doors, and with a brief feeling of weightlessness, brought them high up into the air.

         They all went perfectly still as the car stopped moving. All that was heard was silence but for the creaking metal of the car. Suddenly, a massive eye colored deep blue looked in at them through the windshield. They all began to scream as suddenly, massively loud, feminine laughter split the air. "You should see the looks on their faces, they're terrified!". They fearfully watched as the car moved backwards, bringing into view the beautiful, blonde haired face of the owner of the voice. John looked at the wide smile of the girl, noting fearfully that the whole car could probably fit into her mouth. "Alright" another girlish voice called out, "let's go". They briefly caught a glimpse of an equally beautiful, green eyed girl with long brown hair getting into the drivers seat of a blue sedan. The car began to shift around as the blonde walked a few steps, and got into the right hand back seat of the same car. Knowing they probably could not be heard by the titanic beauties, the guys spoke with hushed voices anyways. "There's your aliens, George. Some girls shrunk us. God fucking knows how" John hissed. "That green eyed one, I know her." Frankie said. "She's in my science class, her name's Jenn. Real spoiled bitch that one is. This ain't gonna be good". The car was still held in the blonde girl's hand, blocking the use of all doors. Through a crack between her fingers John could see the bare skin of her leg, going all the way to her knee. John heard the car door and saw through the windshield another girl sit beside the blonde. Long, bare legs led up to dark khaki shorts, topped with a black tank top. Leaning down in his seat so he could look up out of the windshield, like he did when he pulled too close up to a traffic light, he saw a dark haired, punk looking girl with pale, delicate features. "What do you think they're gonna do to us?" Ryan asked. "I don't know, but whatever it is, we got no way out" John answered. John felt surprisingly calm, despite being probably about an inch tall in his now toy sized car. They're gonna have their fun with this stupid little prank, and we'll all be fine he thought to himself.

         "Dude this is fuckin nuts" Billy said, "they could crush us like bugs at this size". "Not gonna happen" Ryan replied confidently, "That, would be murder".
"Yeah? How they gonna get caught if they do?"
"We'll be reported missing, and they'll find our bodies"
"What bodies you dope, at this size they could flush us down a toilet!"
Ryan had no response to this, and grew quiet. "Jenn's a bitch alright" Frankie said, "But she's no murderer, she's probably just gonna have some fun with us, turn us back to normal size, then threaten us with some bullshit if we ever tell anyone". His voice shook slightly as he said this, as if he doubted the truth of his own words. "Y'all better be right" Jacob said. "I'm not tryna die before the last season of Game of Thrones comes out". "We should try talking to them, see what they're gonna do to us" George said. "Yeah? And how we supposed to get their attention with our little ass voices?" Jacob replied. They all went silent, and looked to John. "What?" "You're in the drivers seat, honk the horn. Then you can ask them what's up". John thought about it. These girls were gargantuan, and part of him wanted to just close his eyes and hide. But he knew there was no getting out of this, not until the girls had whatever they were planning done with.

         Taking a deep breath, John briefly pressed the horn, letting out a quick honk. The punk girl looked down at the car, frowning, "Shut up" she said. "Honk it again" George said. John looked at him, "What are you, nuts? You heard her. I don't to piss of that giant bitch". "We gotta know whats up" Frankie said, "I can't take just sittin here wondering what's gonna happen. Hold the horn down this time". It sounded asinine, but Frankie was right. They had to know what was going on. Taking more deep breaths and steeling himself, John honked the horn again, this time holding it down, letting out one continuous blast. His hand fell from the wheel and the guys let out startled yells as the car was launched up into the air. It stopped almost as soon as it started. The Blondes hand moved a little down the car, exposing the driver's side window, and John looked once more into the face of the beautiful blonde girl. "What?!" she yelled. "Holy fuck dude she looks pissed!" Billy said fearfully. Swallowing, John began opening the window, his heart beating frantically in his chest. The car was dead silent, except for the slight whirring of the window mechanism. Once it was down, he stuck his head out, and swallowed.

         He looked straight into her eyes. What the fuck do I say!? he thought. "Um, hi!" He yelled so his small voice would reach her ears. "We're, uh, kinda scared in here, and we just wanna know, y'know, what you're gonna do with us!". A grin spread across the girls face. "Well now that depends how you boys behave" she cooed. John inhaled sharply as he was overtaken by a gust of warm and minty breath from behind the girls shapely, glistening lips. "We're just gonna have a bit of fun with you boys, that's all". The rest of the guys were stone quiet, afraid to even move. John almost let out a sigh of relief hearing the girls words, but then she said; "Or maybe, my friends and I are going to kill you all. Squash you with our giant, sweaty feet, swallow you whole, who knows" she said happily. She looked at John and ran a wet, pink tongue across her lips, sending chills down his spine. "Oh stop teasing them, Becky". John turned his head to look past Billy out of the passenger window, and saw a girl looking at them from the passenger seat. She had shoulder length brown hair, and a pretty face lightly peppered with freckles. Her hazel eyes looked at the car. John recognized her, that was Tiffany from his economics class. "Alright fine, I was just having some fun is all" Becky replied. She winked at John, and set the car back down on her thigh, once more covering the door with her hand. John rolled up the window.

         "Bro, fuck this" Ryan said. "We got our phones" George said, "Let's call for help!". John took out his Iphone and went to call the police, but when he pressed the home button, nothing happened. "Mine's busted! Try yours". The other guys took out their phones. "Mine too!" Frankie said. "Same" added Jacob. John thought for a minute. "It's gotta be whatever they used to shrink us. It must've fried our phones. Son of a bitch!". John screamed, slamming a fist into the center console. "We're trapped". Frankie spoke up; "Maybe we can try opening the trunk and jumping out?". "Why, so we can land on this Becky girl's thigh and piss her off? I'd rather stay in the car for now" John replied. "It's our safest option. For now, there's a small cage of steel between us and them". "Yeah" said Billy, "steel they could bust like a damn paperclip". Billy was right. They were only safe for as long as the girls were busy doing something else. The car did not really offer any protection. Becky's threat rang through John's mind. He always liked girls feet, sure, but he did not really feel like being killed by a pair of them. "What do we do?" asked George. "We wait" said John. "There's nothing else we can do. We gotta wait and see what these crazy girls do, hopefully it's the fun part, not the sweaty foot squashing or whatever". Putting his face into his hands, Jacob began to cry softly, fear taking hold. George clapped a hand onto his shoulder. "Don't worry man, whatever happens, we got each other. We got each other's backs"

         John wished he could share George's simple-minded optimism.
112111311.title: A New Sort of Road Trip

1121113111.content:
"There's gotta be something we can do" John said, thinking aloud. "Let's face it" said Billy, "we cant do shit, these girls got us good". The whole situation began to feel surreal as the reality of what had happened so far sunk into John. They had somehow been shrunk by some girls, and now had no choice but to wait for God knows what to happen. "Look on the bright side guys, at least they're hot. This could be kinda fun" George said. The guys ignored his remark. So far the girls rode in silence, not a word was heard from them other than what was said to John earlier. "John, you think this girls hand messed up the car at all?" Frankie asked. "No, why?". "I'm thinking, as soon as they put us down somewhere, you start the car and floor it". "Yeah? And that leaves us still tiny" Jacob said, seeming to have recovered his nerves. "Shit, you're right" Frankie said. John spoke; "Billy is right, they got us good. All we can do is wait and see what happens". "Guys, check it out!" Ryan said. Lifting his hand out from under a seat he produced a small, quarter filled bottle of whiskey. He uncapped it and took a swig, and passed it around, all the guys doing the same. "That should help keep us calm" Jacob said. "Yeah" John agreed, "but that's it. The last thing we need right now is to be drunk and stupid. Cap it". Back under the seat the bottle went.

          The guys all looked around with fearful expressions as the car pulled to a stop. They all buckled in as the car began to move, Becky was getting out of the car. Through the windshield, John saw that they were walking down a driveway towards a quaint, white dutch colonial house. "Here we go" he said, his anticipation forming a lump in his throat. They entered the house. "Finally" Jenn said, "let's have some fun with our tiny friends, shall we?". With that, the girls walked into what looked like the living room of the house. Becky set the car down onto the hardwood floor with a jolt. "Now don't any ideas about starting that car and trying to run, you know there's no way out of the house". John realized with a sinking feeling that she was right. Unless he could manage to get the front door open, there was no point in trying to run. The guys watched nervously as the girls kicked off their flip flops and went to put them in the hall. Their feet made sticky, peeling noises with each step, moist with sweat from the summers heat. "Oh fuck, oh fuck, fuck me!" Jacob said. John turned in his seat and put a hand on his shoulder, "take it easy, let's just go with the flow, give these girls their fun, and we'll all laugh about this over some beers at my place later" he said.

         The girls returned, and all sat on the floor in a circle around the car. Becky scooted forward and partially unfolded her legs, so that the car was positioned between her huge feet. Her massive soles formed walls on either side of the car, at least three times as high as the guys current height. "Alright" Jenn said, looking at the car, "out of the car. All of you". "Do we listen?" Frankie asked? "I don't really want to find out what she's gonna do if we don't" Ryan answered. John thought for a moment, "Let's get out, it's too dange-". They were interrupted by Jenn speaking in a more aggravated tone; "Get out of the car now, or Becky there is gonna rip the damn car open and take you out". "Let's go" John said. Nervously, the guys all exited the vehicle. As soon as they were all out, Becky picked the car up and put it on the ground behind her. The guys now stood bunched together between her giant feet. John looked at the massive sole to his left. The detail from being this close and this size was amazing. John could make out every fine wrinkle, and make out the small bits of dust that clung to the sweat on the heel and ball of her foot. Breathing in, he realized he could smell them from where he stood. Trying to exert some self control, he tore his eyes from the massive foot and walked closer to his friends. They were all looking around fearfully at the blonde girls feet, and the faces of the other girls high above, looking down on them with warm smiles.

         "Now remember" John whispered to his friends, "don't do anything that might-" John was interrupted as a massive thumb and forefinger grabbed him, covering him from his shins to his chest. His friends backed away, frightened, into Becky's foot as he was lifted high into the air. He stopped, inches away from a deep, hazel eye set in a pretty, freckled face. "John! It is you! I thought I recognized you" Tiffany said to him. John looked at the massive, beautiful face before him. He and Tiffany had always been on friendly terms in class, but what Tiffany did not know was that John had always had a crush on her. John was by no means popular, or a jock, but his good looks meant that she had always tolerated and returned his friendliness. "That's a shame" she said sadly, "you can go last" with that, she set him down gently next to his friends. There was something about the way she said that, what the hell are these girls planning he thought to himself. "Who wants to go first?" Jenn asked. George, rubbing his hands together, walked out from between Becky's feet and onto the floor between all four girls. "Well well, this little guy is eager" Jenn said with a smile. Gently, she picked him up between two fingers. She brought him up to her face, saying "oh wow, hes a cute one!", it almost sounded sarcastic, but George had too simple a mind to catch on. Gently, Jenn kissed him, her soft, damp lips covering his whole body. By now all of the guys were staring, not without a little jealousy. "Maybe this isn't gonna be so bad" Jacob said. "Yeah" Billy agreed. Jenn opened her mouth, and sticking out her tongue, ran it across George's small form. The soft, wet tongue left George soaked in Jenn's warm saliva after a few licks, his body quivering with pleasure. John felt heat rising to his cheeks as he watched. See? They're just gonna have some fun with us. I was worried over nothing. That actually looks fun He thought. Jenn stopped, and looked at George, he met her gaze, smiling stupidly.

         "Bye" she said. Before anyone could say anything, she popped George into her mouth. She worked her mouth for a minute, like she was moving him around, then bit down, an audible crunch reaching the guys. "What the fuck! She killed him!" Ryan screamed. John grew cold and numb. Was this really happening? George, kind, simple George, was dead. "I don't know what you were talking about, Rachelle. They taste good when you bite them. Lotta juice in them". The punk girl laughed. John watched as Jenn tilted her head back, her throat giveing a pulse as she swallowed. Billy ran. Out from between Becky's feet, he saw a gap between Rachelle and Tiffany's knees and ran for it. Rachelle snatched him up in her fingers before he got more than a few steps. "Where do you think you're going, little bug? I know we're all very pretty and you cant wait for your turn, but you're gonna have to". With that, she pinched Billy's left leg between two fingers, and squeezing, ground her fingers together with the leg between it. She set Billy back on the ground next to his friends, screaming in agony and clutching his leg. John ran up to him, and was sickened by the sight of his leg. twisted and bleeding, red muscle and yellow fat lay exposed to open air, bits of pearl white bone occasionally peeking through. "Oh fuck, Billy, can you hear me? Billy!" John bent to take care of Billy's leg, but was pushed back by Becky's finger. "Here, I'll help him" she said. She picked him up and laid him gently in her palm. She shushed him gently as a mother would her injured child. "Are you hurt little fella? You shouldn't have tried to run" she said. "P-please" Billy stammered, words difficult to form through his labored panting. "Please what?" Becky asked.
"P-please, let me go, I don't, I don't want to die! Oh god it hurts!"
"You want me to release you? Fine. Say, 'Please release me, Goddess"
Billy, sobbing now, said; "P-please release me! G-Goddess!"
"Very well" that she picked up Billy with two fingers, and with the other hand, pinched his head, lightly. She squeezed harder, Billy screaming for a heartbeat of agony as his head was being pulled from his body. Skin tearing and spine snapping, Billy's head ripped free. "I release you". She flung the remains behind her, and looked down, smiling, at the four remaining guys between her feet. "Anyone else wanna try running?" she laughed.

         Billy, oh god, Billy John thought. Billy would not be the butt of any jokes any longer. "Me next!" Rachelle said. She picked up Jacob, his face wet with tears. "No! NO!" he kept screaming. "Please, why are you doing this!" He yelled. Rachelle stopped and looked at Jenn. "Jenn? Why are we doing this, again?". Jenn paused, thinking for a moment, "You know, I was trying to think of something deep to say, something profound. Maybe about how we're seeking power we subconsciously crave in a male dominated society. But honestly, I just think killing you little bug-people is fun". Jacob screamed as Rachelle, with a smile, bent him backwards with a snap in her fingers until his legs were flat against his back. She place him on the floor, and stood, Jacob unable to do anything but writhe in pain. Placing the ball of her foot on him, she pressed down. John wanted to vomit as he heard his friend stop screaming, and make a wet, crunchy pop under the girls foot. She sat back down, cross legged. John and the others looked with horror at the pulpy, red remains stuck to the punk girls massive sole. She did not bother wiping it off.

         Tiffany laughed, "I don't know about you boys, but I'm having fun. Who's next? Don't worry John, I remember what I said about you going last". "This can't fucking be happening!" Ryan said. "They're dead" Frankie moaned. "They're actually dead."

Finding the rival team was easy enough. Everyone new that they hung out at the local cafe'. The girls decided it would be best to lure them outside behind the cafe', where no one could see them. Every time it gurgled, they stumbled into stomach acid and came closer and closer to their inevitable digestion.

Soon enough, the movement stopped. Tiffany's stomach rumbled deeply, and she let out a powerful burp afterwards. "Ahh~" Feeling satisfied, she listened to the sounds of her tummy boiling her snacks alive, just around the time that the other girls were done eating their first ones.

1142.content:
"Alright, listen closely," Jenn commanded the man, who stared at them in fear, his eyes widening as this young Goddess raised the remote at him, "Give me your wallet." The man hurriedly, if not a little clumsily, fished out his brown leather wallet and handed it to Rachel, who stepped forward only closely enough to reach out and take the object. She brought it over to Jenn, who fished through it. "Crap, crap..." she said in a monotone voice as she threw various objects out of it, including pictures of his insect family. Finally, she sighed. "Okay, look...I'm keeping your license, and your last twenty bucks. If you tell ANYONE about what you saw here tonight, I'll come and shrink you and your family, and you'll all fit nicely into the lines on the bottom of my lovely feet. Understood?" Jenn asked. After a moment, Rachel loudly yelled,

"Answer her, worm!"

"Uh...alright, yes, whatever you say!" The man said, nodding and half-bowing.

"I'm gonna check in on you...I think there might have to be a monthly tithe to your new Goddess...me. So...I better hear your prayers at night." Jenn said softly. The man nodded, bowed, and ran from the store.

"Run, Forrest, Run!" Becky yelled after him.

"That was so fucking awesome!" Tiffany yelled.

"Do you realise what this means, Jenn?" Rachel asked, "You're, like, God now."

"We can shrink anyone we want..." Becky said, softly, as if just realising it, "The whole world...they're just bugs at our feet now! It's, like, thier lives but without the metephorical!"

"Metephor." Tiffany corrected.

"Right, that's what I said! The metephor is, like, real now. We were always the rulers of the school, but now, like, we're like thier Goddesses! I want to make the science class worship me!" Becky cried. Jenn stood, thoughtful. All of these thoughts had occured to her as soon as she stepped on her tiny neighbor and squished him into paste. Even the three girls beside her were really insects to her, but Jenn liked them and thier enthusiasm, so they'd remain with her...for now. Besides, all Gods nead priestesses', right?

"Jenn? What do you think?" Rachel asked. Jenn looked at her and smiled, her beautiful face lighting up.

"I say those are all great ideas, but I have some scores to settle first...people who think they're better than me are going to learn that my rule is absoloute. They nead to realise how small they are in comparison to me, and they need to realise that thier lives are nothing but something for me to play with. After that, the school...and then, maybe more..." Jenn replied.

"Wow..." Becky whispered, "Jenn Jameson...Queen of the World!" She giggled.

"So, where to, my Queen?" Tiffany asked, bowing jokingly before Jenn. Jenn didn't appreciate the joke, but she knew that soon Tiffany would bow to her for real.

"I know just the person to shrink..." Jenn said, smiling devilishly.

11422.content:
Jenn, her underlings close behind, walked into the high school with a purpose. Jenn wore a tight pink shirt and a white flowy short-skirt and high-heeled sandals, colored pink like her shirt. The girls wore similar outfits, all carrying designer purses and expensive jewlery. Now, more than ever, it was important to show thier surperiority to the other students. Jenn looked hot as always, and she knew it, and smiled apprecietly at the locks all the men(and some of the girls) gave her. She was in a good mood...someday many of these people would end up at her feet to meet thier destiny, but today they would be left alone. Jenn had someone specific in mind today.

Ashley was the star performer at Sunnydale High. She was pretty without being gorgeous, sporting girl-next-door good looks. Not too fat, not too thin...just enough makeup and the right clothes to make her desireable, and she was nice and sweet and personable. And Jenn was going to show her who was boss.

Jenn had made some attempts at plays and musicals...not because she liked or cared about them, but because people paid attention to those people and Jenn wanted everyone to pay attention to her. They did pay attention to her anyway, but she wanted ALL of thier attention. After all, she deserved thier admiration. But instead, Ashley got some of that attention. Ashley was an excellent actress and singer, and Jenn was not. Jenn wouldn't admit to such a thing, but even Jenn was angrily aware of some of the snickers the crowd had made when she'd auditioned for Juliet last fall. She'd barely passed chorus with a C, and Ashley had gotten an A AND the Juliet role.

Jenn and the girls wandered into the chorus room, where Ashley practiced piano every morning. Sure enough, she was here, singing and playing some song Jenn would never in her right mind listen to. The girls walked in and Ashley stopped.

"Oh, hey guys...uh, how are you?" Ashley asked, disturbed but friendly.

"Just came by to see how your quest to be a BIG star was coming along." Jenn said with a smirk, the girls giggling behind her.

"Oh...well, I don't know about being a big star. Maybe just a small one." Ashley conceded, smiling politely but obviously a little upset. The girls giggled more at her last statement, especially after she said the word 'small'. She was confused.

"Well, I know you're just going to be HUGE someday, Ashley. Just gigantic. You'll see." Jenn said with a grin.

"Well, thanks for the support....I guess..." Ashley said. Jenn and the girls walked closer to her, surrounding her.

"What's going on?" Ashley said, suddenly nervous.

"Look how cute she is!" Tiffany said, bending over and putting her face next to Ashleys. Ashley moved away from the girl, looking disgusted.

"Awww, she so widdle..." Becky said with a laugh, stroking Ashleys' hair.

"Hey, what the hell are you doing?" Ashley asked, striking the hand away.

"Does that bother you Ashley?" Rachel asked, also bending down face level with the soon to be tiny girl, "Does it make you feel this big?" Rachel spaced her fingers just a little bit apart. Ashley got up and slapped Rachel, sending her down on the ground. It was then that Jenn stepped forward and pulled the piano bench out from under Ashley, sending her stumbling to the ground. Ashley cried out and Jenn put a foot on Ashleys' shoulder.

"I was lying about you being a huge star someday, Ash...I was actually talking about me. I'M going to be huge someday. You, on the other hand, are going to be small. Tiny. Miniature. In a few minutes, you're going to be this tiny." Jenn spaced her fingers apart, peering through them, "And I'm going to hold you in the palm of my hand. But maybe if you're a good girl, I won't have to squish you." Jenn said.

"You're crazy, get offa me!" Ashley yelled.

"No, no, Doll...you don't ever tell ME what to do. I tell YOU what to do. Now, be a good girl and shrink!" Jenn said, and pointed the remote at her. Light enveloped Ashley and she saw Jenn getting bigger and bigger. She tried to run, but saw the massive forms of Tiffany and Becky in her way. Ashley spun around, panicked, and soon the shrinking stopped and she was staring at Jenns' gigantic toes. The sounds of the girls laughter filled her ears like thunder. Jenn bent down and spaced her fingers around, measuring Ashley.

"TOLD YA...THIS TINY!" Jenn said with a loud laugh.

"You did not even try to defend him at all!" she said.
