He is terrorfied. HE IS YOUR OWN BROTHER!" she yelled. "Well, I guess sence you put it like that I guess I kind of feel bad about this...
1151.title: Reachel to the rescue

choices: "How 'bout we have some 'fun' with the rest of your family?"
"I know! Let's go to the mall!"
11511.content:
Rachel immediately froze at Jenn's statement. Her eyes widened. She opened her mouth, trying to find something to say, then shut it, then opened it again.
"J...Jenn...it's me...Rachel. Remember? Your friend?"
Jenn merely pointed the remote at her.
"No...you're not my friend. You're just a bug!" she spat.
"No, Jenn, please!"
"That thing on the floor," Jenn said, pointing to her brother with her bare foot. "is a bug. And anyone that protects it deserves the same fate as it!" she was just about to push the button when Rachel cried out.
"NO! Wait!"

Jenn lowered the remote to her side, glaring at her former friend.
"What?" she said coldly.
"I...I don't care about bugs! I...I hate them!" Rachel said. She looked down at Eddy, trying to form a facial expression of hatred. But it failed to truly come out, and she looked more like she was pitying the creature that lay before him. Because that was what he was, right? A creature? An insignificant bug?

She screwed up her face again trying to make it form a shape of raw contempt, but again failed. Instead, she looked back up at Jenn a tear forming in her eye. Jenn, along with the other friends, were still glaring at her. Jenn was even beginning to raise the remote again, and Rachel again looked back at Eddy, who had just woken up. He was screaming at the top of his lungs again, and he quickly stood up and began to run away.

He felt a massive force push him from behind, knocking him on the ground. He immediately rolled over to see what it was, and was met with the massive sight of Rachel's big toe, which she had used to knock him over. He peed his pants as first her left foot raised into the air, landing next to him, then her right foot doing the same. Finally, Rachel spoke.

"Bugs...need...to be...squished." Eddy's mouth suddenly fell open. There were no words or sounds he could make to express the feelings of fear and betrayal he felt. Rachel was the only one of Jenn's friends who had ever liked him. One of the only friends he had ever had, period. And now, here he was, standing between her bare feet like an ant, unable to do anything but watch as she slowly rose her left foot high above his quivering form. He could just barely see her face in between the gap of her big and second toes.

"I'm sorry." she mouthed at him, and then brought her foot down upon his body. She rested it on him at first, as if unsure of whether or not she even wanted to do it. Then, finally, a tear fealling from her eye, she forced her foot down the rest of the way, feeling the sickening crunch of Jenn's brother collapsing into nothing underneath.

She twisted her foot into the fibers of the carpet, smearing the blood all over before Jenn put a hand on her shoulder.
"Hey, hey, it's okay." she slowly patted Rachel's back as Rachel burst into tears, crying into Jenn's shoulder. Jenn gave her a hug with one arm, holding the remote with the other. "It's okay, Rach, it's okay..." Rachel merely cried some more as the other friends began to look uncomfortable. "Besides, we were gonna shrink you anyway." With that, Jenn pushed Rachel away from her, hard, knocking Rachel against the wall. She cried out in pain, and tried to get up to tackle Jenn, but was met in mid-air with the burst of light from the remote.

Rachel landed in the carpet at the height of merely an inch, if that. She slowly picked herself up, knowing what had happened, but refusing to believe it. When see saw the sight of ten toes raising and lowering in anticipation, reality hit home.

It didn't help that she saw the same thing on several other pairs of feet, just a few feet behind Jenn.

Rachel looked up, crying once more, into the god-like face of Jenn.

"Wh...why?" she asked.
"Oh, come on, you know why...we saw you hanging out with that nerd Steve in the halls last week!"
"What? He's my cousin!"
At that, there was a slight pause. They had thought she was going out with him. Finally, Jenn spoke up.
"Oh, well. It has to have been an hour since I've stepped on someone. Wrong place, wrong time, Rach." It was just a quick motion to raise her foot over the quivering form of her friend, and an even quicker one to bring it crashing down on her.

Jenn felt the blood ooze from beneath her foot, and twisted it back and forth.
"My God, this feels so good...wait till you try it, guys."
"We were gonna try it. You promised Rachel to us, remember?" they said. Jenn merely shrugged. She removed her foot from Rachel's flattened corpse, and looked down on it.
"Oh, my Gosh!" she said. "I can see Eddy's head on Rachel's foot! It's so small...it's like a piece of lint!" she giggled. She finally regained herself, and stood up to her full height. She stepped on Rachel again, and then turned to her friends.
"That's what happens to bugs in this house." she grinned at them, and they grinned back. "What do you guys wanna do now?"
There was a slight pause, before Bridget answered:
11511.title: A Betrayal

115111.content:
(First off, I'd like to apologize for calling Becky Bridget. I had completely forgotten both Becky's and Tiffany's names, and only remembered that Becky's began with a B. Sorry!)

"Great idea, Bridget!" Jenn said.
"My name's not Bridget..." Becky said, slowly.
"It's not?"
"No."
"Huh. Oh, well. Sure, I guess we can do my family."
"Yeah, but Jenn," said Tiffany. "If we do your family, Becky and I get to do them, okay?"
"...why?" Jenn asked.
"Well, come on, Jenn, you've already gotten to step on three people, including Rachel, who you promised to us." Becky said. Jenn finally nodded.
"But who gets who?" Tiffany asked.
"Well, hey, you were always nice to Jenn's sister..." Becky replied.
"All right, so you're saying that I get her Mom?"
"No, wait, wait..." Jenn cut in. "Becky, my Mom hates you...you take her. Tiffany, you take my sister. Come on, you saw the look on Eddy's face when Rachel stepped on him. It's much more fun if someone they trust steps on them, don't you agree?" Tiffany nodded eagerly.

The door to her room opened slowly, and all three girls poked their heads out to check into the hallway. They could hear Jenn's mom downstairs; she must have come home, and was now preparing dinner. The door to Jenn's sister's room was closed, and they could hear the music she was listening to pulsing into the halls.

"Who goes first?" Jenn asked.
115111.title: Fun for the Whole Family!

choices: Let Tiffany have her chance at Jenn's sister
1151111.content:
The girls casually walked downstairs, Becky and Tiffany equally eager to feel a live person under their feet. As Becky approached the kitchen, she slipped her bare feet back into her pink sandals in preparation - she has only had a pedicure that morning and did not want to mess her soft soles up.

Jaclyn turned around as she heard footsteps, and smiled as she saw her daughter and was about to greet her when she saw Becky. The smiled turned into a slight frown, and she decided not to say anything, annoyed with her daughter for bringing her here.

Becky giggled slightly, knowing that this old woman had always been under her in status, and would soon be under her physically, where she really belonged.

The dislike that Jaclyn had for Becky was nothing to do with Becky personally, but an old family feud over business. Becky's father, Russell, was the real cause of the dislike that Jaclyn had shown towards Becky. Russell had since passed away due to illness, and it made Becky smile, knowing his daughter was about to get revenge on his behalf.

"Hi Jaclyn!", Becky greeted her, cheerfully. Jaclyn glanced at her, without responding. She knew that she was being mocked, Becky appeared to be trying to hold back a giggle. She resisted the urge to slap the girl, and wipe the grin off her pretty face. If only she was 18 again, like Becky, she'd teach her a lesson. At that moment, all went black.

When Jaclyn regained consciousness, the very first thing she saw in front of her were two sets of toes, wiggling eagerly in front of her. Unsure at first of what they were, and trying to figure out what had happened, it didn't take her long to recognise the pink patterned nail varnish as what Becky usually wore on her toe nails. The true reality of what had happened started to sink in, only to be confirmed when Becky's face appeared in front of her, as she bent down to talk to the shrunken Jaclyn.

"Okay, lady, this is what has happened. We acquired a shrink ray, and decided you should have the honour of being one of our first victims. You should know that you are about to be stepped on, I mean, what more end would be appropriate for an insect like yourself? Moreover, the person that is going to be stepping on you is me. I believe this is very appropriate considering the history between my family and yourself. You will be under me as you die, under my shoe, where you have always belonged".

With that said, Becky stood up to her full height, ignoring the squeals of protest from below, and positioned her right foot on top of the old woman. At first she rested her foot on top of her, wiggling her toes subconsciously, unsure if she should be doing this. Her death would not just be incredibly painful as all of her organs and bones were slowly crushed into each other before exploding out, but immensely humiliating as it would happen beneath the sandalled foot of the teenage daughter of her ex business partner. A sandal that would provide a gentle cushioning to the soft young foot of the girl above, and nothing but a hard, cold and cruelly ridged surface that agonisingly exerted the weight of the pretty girl above on to the old body of the victim below. As she mused about this contrast, and how it meant both she and woman below would feel as it was happening, she felt the tiny body wriggling beneath her, the sensation easily passing through the sole of her shoe, tickling the sole of her sensitive foot. Any feelings of guilt suddenly vanished, it just felt so right. This woman should be honoured, that it is -her- foot that she is beneath, -her- foot that would now cruelly squash her.

She pressed down gently, slowly. She wasn't sure how much it would take, but knew exactly what the outcome would be. She felt the body below her press deeply into her hard bottom sandal which in turn pressed the soft cushioning of the insole into her toes, right the way down to the inner arch of her foot. She smiled at her victims predicament below, she continued to press down, and slowly transfer her weight onto the foot with the woman beneath. She felt a pop from somewhere beneath the arch of her foot, which produced a slight giggle from Becky's lips, and four seconds later both heard and felt a crunch beneath the ball of her foot. Knowing the head of the woman was somewhere beneath the front of her foot, Becky raised her heel off the ground slightly so as to allow her to put more of her weight there. The pink skin on her toes turned white with the pressure until she felt yet another crunch, easily distinguished as from beneath her toes. She stood on the body of the woman for a further three seconds, bouncing slightly on her foot to be sure, before stepping off her.

"Awww, it looks like she wants to stay with you, Becks", Jennifer stated happily. Looking down, Becky noticed Jaclyn was pasted firmly onto the bottom of her sandal. "Ewwwww". She shook of foot slightly to dislodge her, and slowly she peeled of the sole of Becky's sandal and fell with a wet flop back to the floor.

The girls peered at her body and all of them burst into fits of giggles. The easily distinguishable ridges that made up the tread of the sole of Becky's sandal were firmly imprinted right the way across the squashed body of Jaclyn, as her body has been pressed deeply into the grooves. Happy to have left her mark on Jaclyn, Becky and the girls walked away to plan what they were going to do next.
1151111.title: Becky: Jenn's Mom, Jaclyn

It would be better if you calm down and stop yelling or your dear neighbor Becky", Jenny interrupted: "I bet you know her", "will crush your dear little oh-so-fashy home with pleasure"

115111221121.content:
"You have made us very angry Mr. Davis." Jenny said. "Very angry", Tiff added. "You are witches. Damned. You are..." "What? Jenny asked calm", There was another crunching sound. Becky giggled as she felt the rubble of the poolhouse under her foot. "Please make her stop" the man was desperate. Three beautiful girls had taken his house as hostage. Including his wife and his baby. "Who are you", the man asked almost in tears. "I am Jenny. I am the future queen of earth." "We", Tiff corrected. Jenn looked at her for about two seconds and then stared back at the man.

Your dear neighbor Mrs. Davis is at home too" "Great", she replied, "the whole family together." Becky crouched down and tried to look into the windows. A triumphal smile crossed her face "There she is. She is sleeping"

"Leave her alone, Bitch!", The man yelled half hearted "Did he really talked to me?", Becky asked rhetorically. And stood up again gracefully. She walked around the house and looked right into the mans eyes, with pure hate. "I am sorry, but I think now you have pissed her off" Jenny shruged her shoulders. Becky raised her sneaker into the air. little stones and chunks of mud fell down onto the roof as she hovered above it. The mans eyes grew big and he fell to his knees. "Please stop. I didn't mean it. I am stressed. Please, don't crush my home. I beg you. I'll do everything for you... My queen." "Becky, please stop a moment. I am his queen" "Thats nice Jenn", She firmly rested her foot on the roof. It creaked a little but held. "I want you to go over there and kiss Beckys feet. Her new sneaks are kind of muddy because of YOUR lousy swimmingpool in the garden."

1151112211212.content:
Then he stood up. "I won't crawl in front of you" "Well, then Becky won't spare your home... and your wife.", Jenny answered. Becky let the roof crack in a little.

Mr. Davis looked over to his house and looked straigt at the girls in front of him. "get down", Jenny whispered and pointed at her feet. The remote was in her left the whole time.

Becky saw this and she also saw Jenny who lifted her arm and aimed at the running man. Just before he reached Becky she fired. He lifted his arm for a punch as his whole world changed. He ran up the hill and stopped in front of the wall of his house.

He walked past the house and saw a trampled mudhole plenty of titanic footprints covered the whole area. The three girls looked down at him and giggled. "That reminds me of my little dollhouse I had as I was a cute child" "Well, I've had one too but I jumped ontop of it as I was pissed." He heard more cracks from above.Becky applied more pressure to her foot. The roof buckled and you could hear that it was really suffering. To the surprise of the girls it still remained intact. Becky was a little dissapointed that it gave resistance but tried it again. She again applied more weight to her front foot and bend forwards a little. You better come over here and clean my shoes from all the dirt around here. And you better don't make me come over to you. The only step I'm going to take is the one that will be your last." He was barely moving. She tapped him again and the movements got slower. She did this several times even after he didn't move anymore. For him it was like beeing crushed by a car for not even a second and that again and again and again. His bones broke one after the other and most of his skin burst open. After three times he was dead.

Becky spun around and looked a little surprised. The girls started to laugh and Becky joined the round. "This thing is just great!" Becky exclemated with a bright smile on her face. "Where is mr. Davis?" Jenny pointed out at the dirty, mangled, halfcrushed body on the ground. Becky shrugged her shoulders and went on talking: "So, whats the next step to world dominance" the girls giggled at the thought. Just Jenny took it seriouse.

"Well", Jenny started. "I thought we could go to the Ghettos and diminish the crime rate in the city. Or" she made a dramatical pause: "We could drive to the countryside tomorrow and check if we could shrink a complete village." The girls looked at each other and then voted for decision
1151112211212111.title: Next step to world dominace

11511122112121111.content:
Using Jennifer's moms car, they arrived at the nearest ghetto in only 15 minutes. Some men stared at the girls as they got out, clearly they were the hottest girls around for miles. At first Jennifer stepped out of the car, her brown thin soled sandals hitting the asphalt, giving her young toes a cute wiggle as she felt the hard surface beneath her. Next, Tiffanys black ballet flats hit the ground, a slight outline of her youthful feet visible on their soles. Next revealed was some sockless feet in white van sneakers with pink stripes, as Becky eagerly followed.

The girls wasted no time in looking for their next victims. Any casual observers would only notice three rather preppy teenage girls walking and giggling with each other along the sidewalk.

Their first victim was a homeless old man, maybe about 60, sitting in an underpass. He was asleep, but woke suddenly, noticing the three pretty girls faces grinning down at him, one pointing what looked like a gun in his direction. He tried to scramble away, but was quickly overcome by an odd and dizzy sensation.

"Dammit", Jennifer cursed. He moved too quickly, and only got hit partly by the Ray. The girls peered down at the result, and he was very clearly bigger than the others. Giggling, Tiffany held her foot in a parallel position to his body above him. Estimating him to be around 11 inches long, his head extended beyond her toes, and her feet behind her heel. She adjusted her position to compensate for the mans futile scrabbling to get out from beneath her. She also decided to move her foot forward slightly so her toes covered his face, so more of his legs stuck out from under her heel.

Being larger than the others, she felt him press into the thin sole of her ballet flat, and firmly into the sole of her young foot above. Increasing her weight on that foot, his old body gave way quite quickly, his visible legs spasming rapidly. She felt each individual bone that crunched, as her foot literally sunk into his body. She soon felt his his hard and ridged spine dig into her much softer foot.

As she stood perched on his body, the irony of what was happening was not lost on her. She was a privileged and pretty 18 year old, with a old and ugly mans body, perhaps three times her age, lodged and compressed beneath her foot. She giggled at the thought, this was the way the world really should be.

Lifting her foot, she was surprised to see he was still moving, even still conscious, and clearly in agonising pain.

"Jeez, what the heck is that man made of, how the heck is he still moving after you put all your weight onto him?" Tiffany heard Becky exclaim behind her. "He is bigger, so he'll be able to take more, and as none of us are even remotely heavy for our ages", Jennifer calmly answered.

Tiff, placing her foot gently back onto the writhing body, slowly rolled him back and forth, from her heel to her toes, before giving him a final firm press with her toes. "Ugh", "it's like squashing the massively oversized insects on the farm my parents used to own as a kid, they just never seem to die", she laughed. "Okay, we're done here, lets go".

The old man was still alive, although barely. In unbearable pain, he heard the laugh from his executioner as she compared him to an insect, and noticed them start to leave. Then a shadow appeared from above, and the last thing he saw was the wavy tread of the underside of Jennifer's brown sandal, and the pink soft underside of her toes as they peeked slightly over the top of the sandal that was coming down on top of him. Jennifer felt his spine crunch as she stepped onto him whilst walking away, making sure to add her mark onto his body. Becky did the same, feeling his head pop beneath her toes, and leaving the diamond shaped tread pattern of her vans cut deeply into the remains of body.
11511122112121111.title: Move to the ghettos

115111221121211112.content:
"Let's do this city a service by ridding this town of criminals!"

There were no shortage of them, so they could pick and choose. What sort of criminal?
115111221121211112.title: Find a criminal

"Jenn quickly make him big again while he is sleeping so he thinks this was a nightmare. I really think he should be left out of this. Remember its for revenge for people who have done us wrong." 1152.content:
“Wow Eddy, this brings a new meaning to the word little brother,” said Jenn, wiggling her sandaled toes at him.
“I can’t believe that really worked,” breathed Becky, “he’s small enough to squish under one foot.” Jokingly, Tiffany lowered her bare foot over Jenn’s cowering brother for comparison, then backed up. The girls were in awe of their new power.
“Uh, Jenn, it looks like you’re out a pair of panties,” said Becky, “because they shrank along with Eddy and- HE’S RUNNING!” Eddy had had enough of this scary situation and made a break for the door. Jenn plopped her enormous foot down in front of him to stop his flight, but he nimbly vaulted over her toes and slid under the door edge to the hall.
“Crap,” said Jenn as the girls regrouped and flung the door upon. Eddy was making surprising time for such a little size. He scampered across the linoleum on his way to the laundry room. He could hide there under the heavy washer/dryer until Mom and Dad got home. In the lead, Tiffany put on a burst of speed and leaped ahead to stop him. Unfortunately she misjudged his speed and one bare foot landed right on him. His little body immediately smashed into paste as her full body weight crashed down upon him. Sliding a little, she stepped off and as the girls converged, their expressions showed a combination of squeamishness and fright. It was one thing to talk about squishing him or even the idea of stomping on people they had grudges against but this? “Oh geez, Jenn, what are we gonna do?” wailed Tiff, rubbing Eddy’s blood off her foot on a throw rug.

“OK, don’t panic. My folks won’t be home for hours, we’ll think of something.” For the next half hour, pretty much all they did was some form of panicking and wild thinking. Jenn started looking at the cause of her current problem, the shrink remote thing. She’d thought of it as a TV remote when she first found it, but had ignored all the other little buttons once she used the big one. Now she looked and saw a button she hoped meant what she thought.

“Stand back, I’m going to try something. I hope this works.” Pointing the machine at Eddy’s pathetic remains, Jenn pressed the button labeled “RWD” A bubble around Eddy formed, but nothing else happened for an increasingly disappointing long time. Then suddenly, the mess on the floor reformed and stood up, speedily running backwards. Jenn stopped holding down the function that caused a localized time adjustment to objects previously under the device’s molecular rearrangement. Jenn didn’t know about any of that science geek stuff. All she knew was the “REWIND” button worked and she wasn’t going to get grounded or something.
The girls laughed relievedly and high-fived Jenn as Eddy was once again terrified into motionlessness. Then Rachelle stepped forward and put her stockinged foot on Eddy and pushed down with her toes. In the abrupt silence, a tiny squish was heard.
“Rachelle!” yelled Jenn.
“Relax, Jenn. You can reverse him any time you want. And I thought it was only fair to get a chance to feel a little guy underfoot too,” said Rachelle reasonably.

“Hey yeah, I want to play with him. He’ll be good practice for my ex-boyfriend,” said Becky. Tiffany was still a little creeped out and thought they should see if they could get him back to normal, “and get some anonymous creep,” she added.

NOW, DO THEY-

12.content:
Her bright green eyes lit up as she decided to investigate, to buoy her knowledge (as they say) and open the lid of the tabernacle of knowledge. Because she lacked the technical or detective skills to conduct the investigation herself, she walked to the office, which housed both a phone and the book that would lead her to the answers she sought - and there was a hint of dance in her walk, rhythmical surges of electricity, igniting her world in rainbows of possibility and potentiality, and the gold at the bottom was hidden at the bottom of her feet which left the slightest stain on the lightly-speckled white carpet.

The office was a small room, added to the old house after computers started gaining popularity but before it became common practice for each family member to have one. Like so many other upper-middle-class families, Jenn's had wanted to devote an entire structure to the glory of this new machine. At first, only the monstrous tower, the same speckled color as the carpet, its accompanying monitor, and the even larger instruction manuals dwelt in the new room, but it slowly filled itself with articles of life and technology - a neglected toy here, a printer there - and eventually became an extension of the traditional office upstairs. Presently, Jenn's mother, an architect, was working on a new plan, so the desk opposite the computer was covered with large sheets of paper, a giant square and various grades of pencil. Jenn walked to this desk, opened the top drawer, and retrieved the phone book - a yellow artifact, which looked like a tiny monarchy, power-hungry in its decline and jealously observing the computer. There was a face drawn hastily on the bottom of the cover, a relic from a long-forgotten conversation. Now, it peered vehemently at Jenn as if whispering, "I could have licked him once... I could have done it without trying. Nobody could have survived without my benevolence, but now." A brief silence. "Now..."

Jenn opened the book, looking under "Detective." Men's faces under mysterious large hats glared up at her. One of them chewed angrily at a straw, with the words, "Find out who your spouse is really sleeping with... Dan Spitz - I fight for you," bolded next to him. On the next page, a wiry man stood, smiling and holding a long, thin chord. Next to him floated the words, "Don't get stuck with muscle and gruff; a computer means hustle for your stuff: Linus Little." Jenn smiled back at the man and wrote his address on her hand.

Linus's office doubled as his home. It was an apartment a few blocks from downtown, part of a building that was famous for once being the oldest remaining apartment building in the contiguous United States. It smelled of age and urine and rotten fruit, all blended together into the musty odor we associate with tradition. Linus lived on the third floor, and the elevator was either broken or non-existent - the sign, "Elevator Temporarily Gone," that hung at the entrance to the building left many questions unanswered - so, Jenn walked up the echoing stone stairs, fiddling with the remote in her pocket, wondering what would happen were she to trigger it accidentally. Would the building shrink? Would she shrink? Again, a rush of electricity flushed her cheeks and propelled her forward, so that she almost tripped as she danced lightly up the two flights of stairs.

She arrived at the third floor. The same stone clicked beneath her feet as on the stairs, and there were six wooden doors, in clusters of three, on either side of the hall. Directly in front of Jenn was a window so streaked with brown that the world outside looked as though the ground beneath the city had finally erupted in revenge at its neglect. Jenn found the apartment - 33 - and was about to knock on the door when she saw a note tacked on, written in the scribbled script of an intellectual in haste. It read, "Departed. Strange things. Back later. LL."

Jenn stared at it for a second, perplexed. She knocked on the door three solid times, her hand aching at each abuse, in the hopes that the note has lied to her. She heard an unidentifiable noise from inside, a faint thud muffled by walls and the door. Jenn waited for a response to the sound, but none came. She looked around her, as if the other doors, each more barren than the last, would present a solution, and then she...

choices: I'm anxious to find out more about the strange device.
122.content:
..left with an overly-dramatic sigh to see Dan Spitz. She didn’t have time to wait on some stupid detective. She wanted information about this wonderful little machine. She took the bus over to Mr. Spitz’s building, amusing herself along the way by surreptitiously pointing the remote out the window and shrinking random people. (As the rest of the trip is kind of boring, let’s digress and check out a few victims.)

Chris Sovette had seen better days. Too much alcohol had led to losing his CPA position and then to a series of firings. He hadn’t held a job other than temp manual labor for about 4 years. Lost his house to the bank 2 years ago. Currently, his possessions comprised of the clothes he was wearing and the mostly empty bottle sitting on the sidewalk. Sprawled out on the bus stop bench with a newspaper over his face, he bemoaned his life. He had no delusions. He knew everything that had happened to him was, as Jimmy Buffett put it, “his own damn fault”. Half hated his self-destruction and half prayed it would hurry up. An unlikely angel answered his prayer as Jen hit “that filthy bum” with a shot from the device. A two-inch Chris now rested under the newspaper.

About that time, a couple of women who had been smoking off to the side came back around. “That filthy bum must have gotten on the #37,” said Maria, sweeping the paper off the bench with Chris entangled in the pages.
“I can still smell him though,” said Farrah, sitting down and stepping on the paper, crumpling it under her wedged heel sandals.
“Hey, kick that paper over here. Is that a sale at Dillard’s?”
Farrah obliged sliding it over with her sole, unable to notice a small bump compressed underneath. When it got to Maria, she stepped on the page with both feet to straighten it out enough to check out the sale. Again, with all the dirt that has now wiped off the soles of two girls’ shoes, who would notice a wet stain concentrated in one of Maria’s heelprints. (We can only hope all that alcohol anesthetized Mike enough before he was unknowingly flattened by disdainful women.)

“Camelia! Stop stepping on those flowers! They don’t belong to you and it’s not nice. Are you listening to me, young lady!”

Grudgingly obeying her stepmother, Camelia got out of the flower bed of the neighbor near the stop, crushing two more flowers as she did. Her stepmom saw that final act of defiance. She grabbed Camelia by her shoulders and gave her a shake. “I told you to stop that! Look at your shoes. They are all dirty now. I spent a long time cleaning them for you today. What will your teacher say?”

Another abusive mother, Jen thought angrily. She had her own issues with her mother. Zap.
Camelia opened her eyes as the brief shake stopped. Where did her stepmother go? Little squeaky noises on the ground. A doll?, she wondered picking it up.

“Camelia, be careful. It’s me. Something’s happened. You need to get help for Mommy,” the little doll said.

“You’re not my Mommy,” frowned Camelia, walking back over to the trampled flower bed.

“What are you doing? I’m sorry, honey. Aaaaaaah!”, the stepmom said before she was cut off by a long drop. Bruised, but otherwise unhurt by the fall to the soft soil, she tried to get to her feet. She heard a giant CRUNCH. To her left, a redwood-sized tulip crashed to the ground under a muddy black shoe. Looking at her step-daughter twisting the blossom into mush under one foot, she didn’t notice the other foot raising above her until the shadow fell upon her.

“Hey, get out of my garden,” yelled the neighbor woman, “I’ll tell your mother.”

“My mom lives in NY. I’m going to be living with her soon,” said Camelia, scrubbing her stained shoe down into the dirt before walking back home to watch TV.


Now then do we do another random shrinking or find out more about Jen's visit to Mr. Spitz
122.title: Random violence

1222.content:
Jennifer arrived at Dan Spitz’s office, a sight better than Mr. Little’s, but no more reassuring. It was on the back side of a little strip mall, next to a laundery and an empty storefront. She was beginning to think the whole private detective idea of hers was kinda stupid, but one thing Jenn had, other than beauty and a mean streak, was a ton of stubborn and she opened his door.
The room’s overhead lighting lit a sparsely furnished room with a beige patterned carpet. A nice desk, several file cabinets, a black computer that probably cost as much as the rest of the furnishing and no Spitz. Are they all at some detective convention or something? though Jenn, her easy temper rising. Sploosh!, a toilet flushed, brief secondary water noises and a man emerged from a back door wiping his hands on his pants.
“Hey, didn’t hear you come in, I’m Dan Spitz. How can I help you little lady? Got a cheating hubby?” He came up to her, too close into her personal space wished, especially with the amount of cologne he had on.
“No, it’s something different,” she started to explain slowly, trying to think of how to phrase this. “Well, I found this thing that shrunk people. After I crushed a guy, I wanted more information.” Right, Jenn, try again. Maybe a research project, she thought, but Mr. Spitz interrupted. “Whatever it is honey, it’ll have to wait. I’ve already got a case that’s going to take all my time for the indefinite future.”
“This is important,” Jenn insisted.
“They all say that, honey.” Dan was not improving with experience. “Now leave me a contact number and I’ll give you a call when I’m not so busy.”
Forget that, thought Jenn and took out the device.
“Hey,” Dan Spitz said sharply, “Where’d you get that?” He made a quick grab for it. He actually got a hold of it before Jenn could get the button pressed. Zap! Quickly, she stooped down and grabbed the little guy before he could recover. She emptied a cup of cold coffee into the trash and dropped him in the bottom. Eventually, he stood and looked up through at the circle of her head he could see.
“You’ve got one chance, Danny boy.” She poked him hard with a fingernail, shoving him back into the coffee residue. “You recognized this thing I’ve got. You can tell me everything you know about it OR you lie and die. Maybe I fill this cup with hot, scalding coffee again? Or maybe I dump you onto the floor and crush you under my sandals. Well, Mr. Spitz?”
1222.title: Spitz's chance

12221.content:
Mr. Spitz obviously didn't want to die, so he decided to tell her. He knew what it was, he just hoped she'd never find out its satisfying potential! He hung his head. "It's a shrink ray. Only 60 of these were ever made, in a high tech, and top secret laboratory in Fort Dodge, Iowa. They tested it, but deemed it too dangerous for the public. But they recognized its usefulness, so agreed to distribute a small amount instead of scrapping the project outright.

"So, now that you know what is will you let me go?
12221.title: He spills his guts.

12222.content:
Dan stared open mouthed at the pretty teenager above, temporarily unable to speak from shock. Unfortunately for Dan Spitz, Jenn was not in a patient mood and had already figured this was a waste of her time.

Carelessly dumping the fat old man onto the floor, she didn't even bother to give him a second warning before placing her cute sandalled foot on top of him, and slowly but firmly pressed down. Unlike the boy she stepped on earlier, Dan's body spread out beneath her, his excessive body fat spilling out from beneath the front of her sandal where her young toes lay, causing Jennifer to grin and suppress a giggle.

Leaving her foot in place on top of him, she paused to stare amusedly at the contrast. Her slim, soft, tanned foot with pedicured toe nails, located firmly on top of a pale pink fat blob of an old man's body, with just her thin leather sandal between the two. As she mused over this, she felt him starting to involuntarily convulse and spasm beneath her, causing a vibrating, tickling sensation through her sandal to her foot above. Unable to suppress a giggle this time, she decided to end his suffering.

Wiggling her toes slightly to adjust to the shape of his deformed body directly beneath, she continued to press down until they turn white around the edges with the pressure she was exerting. His body burst, allowing her weight to rest on his bones, causing them to break as she felt a few of them crunch beneath her.

Lifting her foot, she shook it briefly to ensure he was fully dislodged from the sole of her sandal before leaving his office.
12222.title: She spills his guts.

choices: Try to get in to the office somehow.
Go elsewhere and let the cops deal with it. Who needs this shit?
124.content:
Jenn slammed her back into the door and then sunk melodramatically down it until she sat on the floor.
The ratty carpet was damp.
"DAMNMIT!" she yelped. She was a good looking girl, used to getting her own way immidiately and without complication. The impotence she felt at what would be a minor setback at best to her normal people was almost crippling.
"I'm not moving till he get's his sorry ass back here," she thought poutily.
"Nothing goes right for me," she sulked, forgetting entirely the amazing luck of finding a shrink ray and the neighbour she'd squashed underfoot. "I can't believe how lazy this jerk is! Doesn't he want my custom? I've a good mind to take my business elsewhere!"
"Uunnngk," went the muffled sound from inside the office.
"This place stinks anyhow! How could any real businessman work in a hole like this?"
"MMMMmmmmnnnuuukk!" went the muffled noise.
"I bet he's just a glorified wino. Or a goth. Ugh!"
"MnnnmmMMgghhmmmK!"
"Will you shut the fuck up! I'm waiting for someone here!" Jenn snapped.
Then stopped.
"Hello?"
"MMnnnoo."
"Are you, like, the PI?" she asked, her face pressed against the wood.
"Unhn."
"Oh. Hey! Why didn't you answer the goddam door? Don't you have any manners?"
"NNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNKKKK!"
"What?"
As if from nowhere, it occured to the pretty teenager that Little might be in some kind of trouble. What to do?
124.title: A little sulk.

choices: He tells her what she wants to know.
Stubborn he is, she'll have to prove how serious she is.
125.content:
pointed the remote at the door. I’ll just tap the button,” Jenn thought, maybe if the building shrinks, it’ll just shrink a little. Closing her eyes, she hit it. A slight creak. She peeked up at the water-stained ceiling. It didn’t look any closer. Another creak and Jenn followed the sound to the door which was slightly ajar. It appeared to have shrunk about half a foot and the lock no longer met. “Hello,” Jenn said, pushing into the apartment office. It was a mess. She found herself stepping all over clothing and papers as she picked her way to the wooden desk with a plaque stating LITTLE: DETECTIVE in bold letters. The thumping seemed to be coming from a door to the right, likely a closet. This is so not worth the effort, Jenn thought, this place is gross and weird; gross and weird being two of Jenn’s greatest insults. She opened the door and let out a little squeak as a gunnysacked body flopped out.
I don’t really want to even touch that, but I guess I have to, Jenn considered. She pulled the top sack off, revealing a middle aged guy’s head with tape across the mouth. Taking out her frustration with this whole scene, she ripped off the tape and a good portion of the guy’s mustache too.
After the muffled scream, the guy panted, “Sanderson. . . tell him. . . no sign”

“What?” Jenn asked impatiently.

Swallowing, the guy asked, “Huh, aren’t you with Sanderson?”
“Look Mr. Little, if that is who you are,” Jenn said as he acknowledged his identity, “I just had a question about this strange thing I found.” She pulled out the remote.

His eyes got wide as plates, “The mass transformer! Untie me and give it here, girl!”

“Hey now.”

“Don’t give me any lip, you spoiled brat! You don’t know what you’re messing with,”

“Oh really,” Jenn sneered, pointing the remote at his face, “I don’t think you’re in any position to yell at me. Tell me now what MY new toy does or you’ll regret it.”

So what happens next? Does Mr. Little give up the information or does Jenn shrink him too?
125.title: Crossing Her Fingers

1252.content:
"You're just a spoilt little girl. You won't use that thing on..."
Infuriated, Jenn blasted Detective Little and made him into a little detective. With a quiet sucking sound, the startled man seemed to implode until he was lying helplessly before Jenn's sandals, less than an inch tall.
Little stared wide eyed at the suddenly gigantic girl with a new respect. Or, at least fear. Suddenly the flat soled thong sandal nearest rose into the air, and he found himself staring up at the scuffed sole of Jenn's shoe!
"I've had enough of you!" pouted the blonde teenager.
1252.title: Call my bluff

choices: Jen accepts his offer, and Little spills the beans.
Jen doesn't care, this bug needs to die for defying her.
12521.content:
The sandal was closing in fast, so Little acted quickly. Diving out of the way, he dared not look back to see if he'd made it. He could just imagine what it would be like if he was crushed. He cringed, but lept on rolling. He wasn't dead yet, so he'd done well. Frightened, he opened his eyes, only to see the twisted expression of an annoyed teenage girl that was goddess-sized to him. He doubted she was with Sanderson, after all this. But still, he'd have to keep going. The detective got to his feet and ran, already looking for potential escape routes.

"Don't think I'll be letting you get away; unless of course you'd liek to explian to me where this little gadget came from," Jen snarled.
Little thoought about that. Could it hurt to tell this random girl, after all, she clearly wasn't working for his enemy. The girl had just been mixed in this. As much as he hated to be forced to give out answers, the man stopped, waving his arms.
"OK, I'll tell you all about it! Just stop trying to kill me!" the detective screamed.
Jen looked over at him, the puny insect who'd dared to defy her. He was willing to explain it to her?
12521.title: Roll aside quickly!

choices: Jenn lifts her foot and leaves him crippled
125212.content:
It was too little too late. From Jennifer's perspective, this old man had not shown her the admiration and respect she was so used to receiving, without having to earn any of it. Besides, as she held her foot over his little body, an urge overwhelmed her. It was the urge to step down, to literally crush this man under her. She'd experienced it once before today, and wanted to experience again.

Jenn could no longer see the man, as he was being blocked out by the view of her sandal clad foot. She let her foot descend, ignoring his screams of horror, until it rested upon him. Then slowly, the pretty teenager worked his body beneath her foot, gently twisting and increasing her weight upon him. For Jenn, the feeling was surreal - she could feel his body through the thin sole of her shoe, pressing firmly into the sensitive underside of her foot. It felt a bit like stepping on a rock, she mused, but one that crumbled. She could actually feel him deforming as she slowly twisted, and she giggled as she felt the first crunch of his bones under her weight.

Detective Little however was screaming in unimaginable agony, as he was being slowly crushed alive. He couldn't see the girl on top of him, giggling as she felt his spine shatter. He couldn't see her painted toes on the other side of the sandal, as they pressed more firmly into the leather insole, to even inflict more weight onto their victim.
125212.title: Jen doesn't care, this bug needs to die for...

choices: Jenn looks for more people to kill; she's bloodthirsty now!
1252121.content:
Jenn lifted her foot off Little, and slowly slid her foot from the sandal. She wanted to look at his barely alive body, and see the fear in hiss eyes, knowing that he could've stopped his fate, and to know that he was now incapable of stopping it.

Jenn looked down at Little's battered face with a profound look of smugness. Almost like, "Here I am, up here, perfectly fine, about to finish killing you!" She places her bare foot over Little, and twisted from side to side, crushing his body, and smearing blood all over the ground.
1252121.title: Jenn ends his life

choices: Wander the halls before class looking for victims.
Look around outside school for people to squish on the lawn.
Wait, Jenn decides to shrink her whole science class.
Jenn goes to the gym to find her ex.
She visits the library, there are always nerds hiding there.
13.content:
Jenn decided to sleep on it.

She slid the remote into her backpack the next morning, after securing it inside a pencil case so it didnt accidentally go off.

Most of the girls in her classes were absolute nerds, and she couldn't stand them. It was even worse that some of the guys Jenn had dated were beginning to find these girls attractive. Something had to be done and this seemed like the perfect place to start.

It was even worse taking the bus to school every day ever since her ex had decided to see if he could race her convertable and totalled it. The ride to school that morning on the city bus got Jenn thinking about what she would do to him too. After all, it's not like he could afford to pay for the damages. He didn't want a job, since he was so busy with sports all the time.

Staring out the filth smeared window as the bus pulled up outside the school, Jenn sighed. Hopefully this device would work again. She had some revenge to exact.
13.title: Another bus ride with Jenn

choices: She sees her friends and walks over to them
131.content:
The halls where already filled with Teenagers - Boys and girls. They where standing, sitting and talking to each other. Jenn picked some of the nerds out of the mass. Normaly nobody realised that they shrank But some of the victims had been realised and where scooped up. The ones that shrank unnoticing normaly where trod on by some of the moving feet or where treated as insects - which normaly ment nothing else.

Jenn was very satisfied. Since she was here she had shrunk already 17 nerds. 12 had been squashed, 3 had been collected and two where still on the run but they could also be dead by now, Jenny smiled.

The schoolbell rang and the pupils where on their way into the classrooms. Then Jenny saw her Math teacher Mr. Schreiner. She didn't liked the german Teacher. As she was just a few steps behind him, she pulled out the device and shrank him. She didn't stop but she waved down to him before her foot smashed his frightened face and the rest of his body. At least 200 further students walked over the corpse, smashing it with every step until there was almost nothing left.
131.title: Assassination in the schoolhalls

choices: She shrinks him and keeps him as a...
She is responsible, she gives it back
1311.content:
Jenny saw her friends hanging out in their usual place near the lunch tables and decided to go see what they were up to. "Hey girls you'll never believe what I found, it's so cool because I can shrink the nerds and crush their tiny bodies or eat them and..." She stopped talking because the girls weren't even looking at her. "What the heck! I say I have big news and you just...."

She stopped talking because Kafei, the hottest guy ever, was walking right towards them. He had shiny blue hair that hung down to cover his ears, and stunning white face and a very small body. He was from the middle school across the street and he was only 12. He was in seventh grade but he was still friends with them. He was only four feet tall but he was so hot! He even made the guys drool when they saw him! The girls were all just dazzled by his super-hotness (if that is a word) and just couldn’t stop staring at him. His little bounce in every step, his blue hair flinging everywhere… no one could help but stare at him. He went through every step in slow motion, with an inescapable glimmer in his face and eyes. He was so small and short that even the kids on wheel chairs were slightly bigger than him. He was hot though, I mean HAWT.

“Jenn, Jenny!” Jenny started to come back to life.. “JENNY!” It was Kafei, he was talking to her. “Dang it Jenn, each time I see you, you do that. It’s getting so annoying. He held out his arms so she could give him a hug. She came back to her senses. She gave him a huge hug and everyone looking became very jealous, well the girls mostly. “He Jenn, are those new pants? They make you look even sexier.” Jenn started to blush. She loved when he said things like that. He started to feel her pants. He took his hand and just felt her sides and her pockets and then he started to slide his hands to be butt and feel her smooth, small ass with his cute little fingers, and then Jenn just fell.

Kafei had seen known her to do this a lot when he was around so he caught her just before she hit the ground, held her back with his delicate arms and stared down into Jenn’s shiny, beautiful eyes. They just kept that position for a moment, looking at each other with lust in their eyes, but then Kafei got another interest. “Hey Jenn, what’s that remote you got there?” Before Jenny could respond Kafei grabbed the remote and dropped Jenn on her back. “Cool, this some kind of laser beam or something Jenn, I’m not sure but if you don’t mind I’m gonna borrow it for awhile.” A distant bell rang across the school. “Uh oh, class started, I better go. Later Jenn, later ladies.” All the girls started to blush as this extremely seductive guy just took the most important invention to Jenn, and maybe even the whole world!

Jenn soon came back to her senses and realized that he took the control! She was real mad but just couldn’t help but forgive him. She goes to over to the school across the street, in hopes to persuade Kafei to give her back the control, and started to follow him to his sixth period. It was his elective, Film Studies. Then she found him, he was walking across the football, so she started to run after him. He had made it to the front of his class when she caught up to him. “KAFEI!” he turned around and saw she had been running, she was panting real hard. “Jenn? Why did you come out here? Is it because of the control, yeah, I already know it shrinks people.” she looked at with like he just said he was a Cyborg, in amazement.

He gestured her to come over there and that’s what she did. “I left this with you because I wanted to see what you would do with it… Tell me, Jenn, would you have shrunken me with it?” She looked at him with puppy eyes and said, “Yes, I would have. But that doesn’t mean I wouldn’t have kept you with me forever… you’re just so hot..” Kafei just stared at her for a second and then came out with what he wanted to say. “Jenn, no one can trust you with this. I’m sorry to tell you that but you’re irresponsible. I have to go Jenn, class is starting.” He went for the door at the end of the hall but then he realized something was holding him, it was her. “Please Kafei, give me back the control.” Kafei saw the pleading look in her shiny, beautiful eyes. “I can’t trust you, now let me go..” He was struggling to get loose of her powerful grip. “Kafei, I want the control!” Kafei knew he wasn’t getting away from her so he did the only thing that he thought would work. He got on the tip of his shoes and brought his neck up. He could barely reach but he made it to her face. He gave her a long, passionate smooch in the face.

Kafei felt his arm be let free and felt her start kissing back. He started to try and get her away but she held him tightly. He was struggling and squirming but he just couldn’t leaver her arms. Then she stopped. “Aha! I got it.” Jenn took the control from his pocket and pointed it at Kafei. “Do you really think that scares me Jenn? I made that thing. I have gotten used to being shrunk.” And Jenn just gets a little evil look in her eyes. What does Jenn do?
1311.title: Cutey Kafei

choices: She plays footsy with him (doesn't kill him!)
13111.content:
She aimed the control at Kafei and fired. He was sent into a ring of light and soon enough was just one inch small. "Oh, Kafei, that's so sad. I didn't really want to shrink you but you left me no choice." She said this in a mocking voice but Kafei had a different expression on his face. He was pissed. "I thought I could trust you, Jenn. But if you were that greedy to shrink me, then you don't deserve that control." He said this with utter confidence. You're in no position to say that, Kafei." Jenn bent down and got on her knees. She saw that Kafei was so aggravated. "Oh, poor thing. You must be real mad that I shrunk you eh?" She was just being playful, to bad for her Kafei wasn't.

He started to check his pockets for something. "Kafei, I always wanted to go on a date with you, but I was afraid you'd say no because of our age... Well, at least now I can have that date." Kafei took out his little gameboy and aimed the screen at himself. "Whatcha got there Kafei?" Jenn was starting to get worried because he did invent the control. "Is that a grow-gun?" Jenn was now understanding what he was doing but was a bit to late. He pressed the buttons and another ring of light encircled his body. Jenn got up as fast as she could and lifted up her foot.

She slammed her sandal right on Kafei's small body, but he had grown to two feet tall so he wasn't crushed. He stayed at that exact size though. "Get your damn foot off of me!!" He was yelling and kicking and trying so hard to get free but Jenn just stood there with her weight put on him. "Hey, I think this suits you better. Your big enough to be my boyfriend but not big enough to fight me off. It's almost sad Kafei, almost." Kafei never cried and nor would e start now, but if he did this would be the time. "Jenn, your a bitch. I gave you that thing not to kill people or force them to do things they don't want to, but to see how you would react. I would have willingly been our boyfriend if you passed but now I think differently about you."

"Aww, squirt, your so mean to me. I just want to have a little fun." He was squirming and trashing under her shoe but she just kept putting more weight on him. "Hand me that growing devise baby. Maybe if you do as I say I won't be so rough." She took off some of her weight and gestured towards the small gameboy like thing. Kafei grabbed it and tossed it to her. "Good, at least you listen to me." She took hold of his body and held him up to her face. "You'll be sorry when I'm done with you.." And not even a second after he said that, "Correction, baby, when I'm done with you." She got a big, girlish grin on her face.

Jenn put Kafei in her pocket and started walking to her busses. She saw some nerds hanging out in a corner by the bathrooms so she decided to crush a few more before she went home. She hadn't even gotten ten feet close to them and they were already one inch small. She lifted her huge sandals and crushed their puny bodies effortlessly. She felt their bones being cut into an thousand pieces and their blood smear under her shoe. She loved that feeling and she knew it. But, unfortunately, she had to board her bus before it left. She went through the agitating 15 minute ride and finally came to her house.

She ran to her room upstairs and closed her door. She tossed Kafei onto her bed and locked her door. Kafei just sat there, legs crossed and really pissed at Jenn. She took out the little grow gun and dangled it above his head. "Kafei.." she said in a teasing voice, "..do you want the gun? Come on, I know you want it..." He wasn't even going to move an inch. He sat there looking at her with a more mature expression. "Don't you want it Kafei? I can see it in your eyes." He moved his arm and flipped her off. She got very mad at him for that but still understood that he was six years younger than im and four feet smaller.

"That really hurts baby, but I just want to play." She giggled that girly giggle that they have and sat on the bed. Kafei was really horney by this and got a hard on. She saw that and got a bit happy. "So you think I'm hot? That's nice. I just love it when people think I'm hot." "Shut up bitch, I don't think your hot, I think you look ugly, woman." She just smiled at him like he hadn't meant it. "Oh baby, it's alright, I know you don't mean that...."
13111.title: Home with Kafei

131111.content:
Jenn grabbed Kafei and started rubbing his body. Kafei tried to fight her off, but like she said, he was too small. She rubbed his cheeks and then started petting his stomach, and pretty much treating him like a dog. “STOP IT! You know for a fact that I hate when people treat me like an animal!” She kept on doing the same thing, petting his stomach and rubbing his chest. “Do you want to call me pretty?” She looked down on him with a shiny white smile.

“NO! You disgust me!” She put on a half disappointed grin and started pouting, “When will I ever get through to you? I’m all you have now. You can’t do anything about it and you at my mercy. If I wanted to, I could squish your bones. When I put my foot on you back then, I was holding back the weight of my foot alone!” Kafei was surprised by this, but not impressed. “The training sessions are much different, being with you is like being with a level ten Sally just ten times harder. You don’t give u[ when I say so..”

“Training sessions?” Jenn was really surprised, she didn’t really believe that he had been shrunk before but now the pieces were fitting together. “So you have been shrunk before?” He looked away, giving away his answer. “So you will be able to unshrink yourself?” Kafei gave a very small, nearly unnoticeable nod. “Soon, and you can’t stop me.” Jenn crossed her arms and watched him move his head to look at her. “I can’t stop you, I suppose, but I can make your life a living hell…” Kafei’s eyes widened.

“No, you can’t… You wouldn’t….” “You’re wrong Kafei, I can and I would. Maybe you can just make it easier on yourself and just accept it. I’m beautiful, and you want to be with me.” Kafei saw her say this, and knew she was dead serious. He never thought that the real world would be like this. It is much harder than the simulations. Kafei didn’t want to say it, but he didn’t want someone more than twice his size, older, more powerful and ruthless like Jenn mad at him. He nodded his head. “Kafei…” She was expecting him to say it. “I think you are…. Beautiful.” He was having trouble saying this, he was very mad at her. “And…” “And I want to… be with you.” He gulped as he said those last words. “Oh Kafei, I so happy.” She was bouncing up and down and clapping her hands. “Don’t get so happy about it though. When I’m free, we’re through.” She hadn’t heard what he said and he was a bit glad.

Irritated by this, Jenny scrunched her toes, and the nerd who bit her was crushed into a bloody smear on her big toe. At this point, only the nerd trapped beneath the ball of her foot survived. Jenny greatly enjoyed feeling him helplessly squirm beneath her foot.

While Jenny thought the nerd was only worthy of being crushed, she did enjoy having someone helpless beneath her foot, and hesitated on killing him. She considered letting him live as a permanent cushion for her foot. However, she also thought that someone she liked would be far more deserving of being trapped beneath her beautiful, soft foot. 132212.content:
William "Billy" Cook was fouteen, lean (read: skinny) with touselled brown hair. The day had started as usual. He d Been with the guys on the lawn, but He’d been paying more attention to the comic he picked up on the way to school. He’d been absorbed in that when Jenn walked over. What the hell was wrong with people? It was another story by Brian Bendis, who seemed to be trying to write everything in the entire Marvel universe at the moment.
Bill turned the page with a sense of grim resignatiom. Bendis already killed the last Ant-man in a really crummy story, but now he was back and Bendis was doing his usual trick of drawing the story out to epic length without any kind of plot. It was a rare skill, if you thought about it.
That was when the beautiful foot in it’s expensive pink sandle had slammed down on the page. Jenn. Jenn was a goddess to Bill, and most of his friends. A few years older, the tall blonde with the endless legs and cruel confidence was something to be worshipped from afar.
How could it be any other way? Bill had always felt like an ant compared to her. Now he looked like one too.
Bill ran through the jungle in a state of panic. They’d all been shocked when they found themselves suddenly here, in this wilderness of huge green plants and strange noises. Luke’s face had turned to a mask of horror as he pointed and they all looked and saw it. A high dark platform about a hundred metres away as tall as a man. And on top of that, the towering toes of Goddess Jenn towering into the air. Behind and above, mountainess ankles supported perfect legs which towered into the heavens.
It was Scott who’d figured it out first. “Those trees are blades of grass!” he screamed, “We’ve shrunk! We’ve shrunk!”
It was the last thing he ever said as the mountainess foot, with a power and majesty beyond comprehension lifted like a spacecraft and flew overhead, blotting out the sky.
“Run!” he’d screamed as he began to peg it as fast as he could. He’d risked a glance back (never look back) and seen his friend Scott covered by Jenn’s uncaring sandel. The earth shook, knocking him down as the blades of grass which were taller than him were easily bent to the ground. Her toes twisted as she walked and then the foot was gone.
He’d been running in a blind panic ever since. He didn’t know where Luke was or if he was even alive or how long he’d been running. He couldn’t look up. Sometimes he saw a giant move across the sun and the earth shook.
What was he going to do? What could he do? He was the size of an ant!
Wait. That was it. What would Henry Pym, The Ant-man do?
He’d use his growing gas. Damn. He didn’t have any growing gas.
He kept walking.
Then he saw it. Ahead through the ‘trees’ was what seemed to be some kind of building. It was black and strangely shaped with an entrance about seventy feet high at a guess. What now?
132212.title: Jungle Bill

Bill found his way to the strange structure. And very strange it was. It was black and slightly shiny with strange tubes crossing over it's surface in a pattern before spilling down to the ground. They were thick and seemed to be made of black ropes woven together. Some way behind the structure, the sky was obscured by what seemed to be a dark coloured mountain. Curiouser and curiouser...
Looking into the seventy foot high entrance, there was a flat brown back wall, also a little glossy in appearance. The cave extended to the left into darkness. The cave went back about fifty feet to the brown wall. There was a step more than half as high as he was to get in.
Bill climbed the step and stood on a brown floor matching the rear wall. Looking up about halfway up the wall and slightly to his left Bill saw a symbol painted on the wall. It was what looked like an infinity sign enclosed in a circle, coloured gold. Their were other symbols in columns going down to the left of it, but they were too high up for Bill to read. The circle was about fifteen feet across by his estimate. He could still here the familiar distant rumblings of the giant world in the distance.
"Where AM I?" He wondered.

"No work today?" she asked as her friend ushered her through to the living room.

"Not till later. Kinda flextime," explained the redhead as she went to the kitchen to fetch drinks. Jenn took a seat and her friend followed, reclining on the couch opposite in her nightshirt.

Jenn always felt a little awed in the presence of this girl, but she dealt with it as she hoped Tara would help her into modelling.

"Look," she said, "I've got something really cool to show you..." She opened her bag and brought out a jar of tiny people.

Tara's eyes widened and Jenn felt good. She was impressed!

"Wow," the taller girl said, "I'll ask how in a minute.... but," and she looked her friend in the eye, "Can I have some for myself? They could really help in the shoot I'm doing..."
133111.title: Mysterious girl

choices: Follow the tiny couple around the school
1332.content:
The twenty-five or so members of the Mr.Lumberd 8am Biology class were now terrified. Jenn Jameson, the bitchiest(if not the most beautiful and intimidating) girl in school now towered above them like some sort of horrible evil Goddess, grinning down on them with contempt in her eyes. Most of them were scattered, alone, thier diminishing size making the normally small space much larger and vaster. Some quickly rushed to find the lab partners they were sitting with, even thought some of them barely knew each other. At this point, the comfort of another person was better than feeling this new Goddess' eyes upon them. Becky found herself alone until a nerd named Steve, whose last name she couldn't recall, came to her. He was short and very small boned(at normal size, of course...) and would talk to his friends about playing something called Dee and Dee, something which Becky usually turned around in her seat and asked him scornfully when he was going to get a life. Now he ran to her, out of breath and frightened, and still said "Are you okay?" Becky looked between him and her massive friend.

"I think so..." she replied, looking at him again, "I'm so scared, though..." He nodded.

"Yeah...me,too...she's huge! Like Giganta or something!" he said, scaling Jenns' magnificent body with his eyes. He turned back to her. "We should hide..." he said. Becky turned again and looked at Jenn. Would Jenn hurt her? At this, Jenn spoke.

"WELL, PUNY INSECTS...YOUR GODDESS HAVE ARRIVED. I'LL GIVE YOU ONE CHANCE TO BOW DOWN AND WORSHIP ME AT MY FEET. RUN TO ME AND BEG FOR MERCY. IF, AT THE COUNT OF FIVE, YOU DON'T ALL COME AND DO THAT...WELL, MY BIG BEAUTIFUL FEET WILL COME AND FIND YOU." She slipped her feet out of her flip flops and wiggled her toes. She giggled. "ONE!" She began to count.

"Becky, come on!" Steve cried.

"She won't do this!" Becky cried, "Jenn's mean sometimes, but kill us all likes bugs?! Never! I'm her friend!"

"She's not your friend!" Steve cried, "Come on...you're in as much danger as everyone else."

"TWO!" Came Jenns' thunderous voice.

"But..."

"Please, Becky." He said, grabbing her arm. She turned to look at him.

"Whay are you helping me?" Becky asked.

"THREE, LITTLE BUGS!"

"Because, I...well, this is probably the worst time to ask, but...I was wondering, if maybe you weren't busy friday...I mean, assuming we survive..." His face flushed and her voice cracked and he loosened his collar.

"FOUR...WHAT'S IT GONNA BE, SLAVES OR INSECTS?!" Jenn giggled.

Becky looked at Steve. He was asking her out! And he was so shy and nervous...it was almost cute. And he wanted to save her! That was sweet. All those times she'd been mean to him because of Jenns' influence...and now Jenn was a monster! She smiled at him.

"We'll talk about it if we don't end up stuck to Jenns' sole!" Becky said, her smile failing.

"No problem, let's go!" Steve said.

..........................

"FIVE!" Jenn roared, deliberetly ignoring the people in the class who WERE bowing down to her. In fact, as a reward for thier worship, Jenn stomped them first. Ten people, almost half the class, had rushed up to Jenns' beautiful, well-pedicured feet and bowed down, groveling, hoping to appease her. They'd lick this cruel beautys feet if it meant survival. Two or three of the nerds really DID lick her feet, crawling all over the building sized toes and rubbing and kissing. However, when she reached five, she wiggled her toes, crushing the few nerds between them with a giggle. "GLAD YOU LIKED THEM, GEEKS! YOU WERE DESINTED TO DIE UNDER THEM! OH, MISTER LUMBERD, WHERE OH WHERE ARE YOU, YOU LITTLE PRICK?!" Jenn said, walking through the room. Mark, starting tackle for the Sunnydale Razorbacks, tried to run as her foot casually landed on him, causing him to pop beneath her strawberry scented sole. Two nerdy girls, Marissa and Emily, died beneath her heel, being compressed into the fleshy monstrosity and forever staining it(until Jenn cleaned them off and deposited them into a trashcan...a fitting place for trash like them). She found her teached near the head of the class, quivering near the wall. She bent down and peered at him. "GUESS YOU SHOULD HAVE GIVEN ME THAT A, HUH? WHO'D HAVE THOUGHT YOU'D END UP COWERING IN FEAR FROM ME? LITTLE OLE' ME!" She giggled girlishly, the type of giggle that would make men hard as rocks between thier legs. Lumberd did get hard, before he pissed himself as she bent forward, her beautiful face mere inches from him. Her glossy pink lips, those big round green eyes and her long brown hair, tied back in a ponytail with her bangs loose over her forehead. She grinned at him. She sniffed. "EWW, DID YOU PISS YOURSELF?! THAT'S SO GROSS. I'D NEVER DO THAT, AND IF YOU'D HELD YOURSELF UP TO BEING MORE LIKE ME, TO ADORING ME LIKE PEOPLE SHOULD, THIS NEVER WOULD HAVE HAPPENED. SO, LUMBERD...WHY WEREN'T YOU BOWING AND WORSHIPPING LIKE THOSE NERDS OVER THERE? AM I NOT PRETTY ENOUGH FOR YOU?" Lumberd trembled. Jenn slammed a fist down near him. "ANSWER ME!"

"I...i...uh..." Lumberd said, falling down in fear. Jenn clicked her tounge and rolled her eyes.

"GUYS ARE ALWAYS TOUNGE-TIED AROUND ME. ESPECIALLY WHEN THEY'RE ITTY BITTY AND LOOKING UP AT ME. IT'S SUCH A TURN OFF." She reached out and flicked him with her finger, sending him crashing against the wall. He curled up in a ball and shivered. "NOW...WHAT SHOULD I DO, LUMBERD? YOU'RE THE ADULT HERE, WHAT'S THE ADULT THING TO DO, HUH?"

.......................

Meanwhile, Steve led Becky around the far side of the room, her hand held tightly in his. Becky had sobbed convulsively as her once good friend carelessly murdered classmates beneath her feet. What was worse, deep down, Becky envied Jenn and was more hurt that she wasn't let in on the whole thing. She looked at Steve and thought idylly about what it would be like to tower over him and squish under her toes while he confessed his love. It disturbed her how excited it made her. But she wasn't that big to him. In fact, he was a little taller. And Jenn, a girl she thought was her friend, was going to squish her, too! Jenn saw her as nothing more than a bug, and that hurt her feelings, as well as her pride. She was terrified, humiliated, hurt and sad all at the same time. She looked at Steve, who was keeping his eyes on Jenn, standing protecitvly in front of Becky. While Jenn made her way over to the teacher and spent her time belitting him, the two finally made it to the door and slid under a crack, into the giant hallway, to face the giant world, filled with potentially hundreds of OTHER giant classmates who would have them at thier mercy. They stood in the enormous hallway and saw rows of lockers, enormous building like lockers and each one belonging to an equally gigantic person. "What are we going to do?" Becky asked.

"Fine help..." Steve replied, but his eyes told the real story. All the eyes said was "Stay Alive."
1332.title: Romance and Death...a good combo

choices: Agree with Becky and see if Steve can get the girls' attention.
Keep wandering around and see if he can find someone a little more... reliable.
13321.content:
'Stay alive... but how...' Steve thought to himself... not ready to admit to Becky that finding a person that wouldn't hurt or abuse them was a long shot. Especially since Steve wasn't exactly the most popular kid in school... To say the least... but he wouldn't admit that to Becky... Never.

The world now was more than a frightening place, and Steve was lost in thought as to what might happen next. Becky interrupted him.

"Hear that Steve?"

"Hear what?"

"That voice... it's... it's Rachel!"

Becky pointed to a girl who's high heeled sandles they were right next to. She was talking to someone whom Becky Recognized as her other friend Tiffany.

"And that's Tiffany beside her! They're my friends. They'll help us for sure! They might even stop Jenn!"

Becky assured Steve.

Steve didn't exactly KNOW either of them but he heard alot about them from the other kids in school. Two of the most attractive girls there were... but niether as attractive (at least to him) as Becky... What to do... Becky didn't exactly keep good company judging by Jenn, but getting anyone else would be just as big of a dice roll.

What does Steve Tell Becky?

A female foot... in extreme size.

How should he get her attention?

13322.content:
Jenn smiled sweetly down at the tiny teacher cowering before her. She looked over at the corner of her eye and saw a few more students cowering in a corner, hoping she wouldn't see them. She didn't let on, rising to her feet and crossing the room(knbeknowst to her that her friend and a nerd Jenn would have loved to squish had just escaped under the door directly before her) and grabbed her flip flops. She walked back across the room and resumed kneeling in front of the tiny teacher, holding her flip flops in one hand. Grinning evilly, she quickly and brutally swung one flip flop in her hand, pulverising all three of the students under it, as if they were cornerned insects she was too good to stomp. The teacher began to sob. "Aww...don't feel bad, teach. You'll be following them soon enough...oh, and by the way...can you tell who they were, it's so hard for me to tell..." she held up the flip flop sole first in front of the teacher, who vomited at the sight of the blood and guts smeared into it. Jenn shifted and sat indian style in front of him and examined her soles. "Ewww...I think I got five all under my right foot...look!" Jenn held one foot forward, showing him the splotches of his students. "I think that's a lettermen jacket on the sole there. I think I got Mark, which is awesome. He was looking at a college scholarship, was gonna play in the big leauges someday...except his fate was the die under my feet. He was so lucky!"

"Oh...god..." Lumberd began.

"..Ess." Jenn finished for him, "'Oh, Goddess'...that's what you were gonna say, right?" She sighed, concedely and flipped her hair with her hand, holding her head high and smiling with self-appreciation. "I know, I know...I'm a Goddess. It's hard work, you know...being perfect. Everyone worshipping and adoring you...it's hard. That's why I'm kinda thinnin' the herd. Most of my subjects aren't worthy of me, and so I have to squish them. And I'm just getting started. So...again, the question is...are you worthy?" The teacher looked up at her, terrified. She tilted her head, looking at him curiously. "Do you have something to say, little one?"

"Please...don't kill me...I have a wife, and a daughter. Two daughters! Please!" He begged.

"You do?! Well...I guess I'll have to pay them a visit!" Jenn said with a smile. "But...should I visit them with you, or with you on my sole? That's my dilemma, and it's really hard. Deciding whether you live or die is really a harsh burden to put on pretty shoulders like mine. So...you choose." She slid abck and stuck her legs out in front, placing both her feet against the wall, on either side of them. The teacher rushed to her left foot and began to kiss it.

"Please, Goddess Jenn...please, I want to be with my family! I beg you! Please let me go, make me normal again! I'll give you the A you wanted, I'll give you my salary! I'll do anything!" He said, kissing and licking her soft foot flesh. She smiled.

"Awww, you are so cute! Make you normal again! Ha! Good one, teach. No...if you go back to your family, which is possible, you go back mini. I bet your Daughters would LOVE to see you tiny. How old are they?" Jenn asked.

"Fourteen and Sixteen!" He replied, still kissing the giant teens' foot.

"Hmm...well...times up..." She said, standing up.

Jenn snatched Mr. Lombard between her thumb and index finger, and pulled and empty tic-tac box out of her purse. She dropped him into the clear plastic container, which she then dumped into her purse leaving her teacher trapped in darkness.

Mr. Lombard was jostled around in the giant purse while Jenn rampaged around the classroom, finishing off the rest of her puny classmates. Light finally floods over him after what felt like hours, when Jenn's enormous fingers grab hold of his plastic prison and pluck it out of her purse. She holds it up to her billboard sized face, peering in at him. "WELCOME HOME!" She booms.

The next few minutes are a blur to him, the world rushes by as the cruel teen carries him up the walk towards his own home...

Without any further wait, Jenn had decided to bring the little guy back home to his family. She looks at him once more, a wicked smile carved into her face, and pressed the doorbell button, setting the man down in front of the door. The girl ran into a cluster of bushes beside the door and watched, making sure he didn't do anything unexpected. She could hear footsteps coming towrads the door, and she almost peed her pants in excitement. The feeling of such power to shrink people was amazing. The door opened after a minute, and in the doorway stood a woman, blonde-haired and quite pretty, even to Jenn's critical eye. She couldn't have been any older than Jenn herself.

Down at the porch, Mr. Lombard that if he thought he had been having a bad day before, this was just rididculous. In the doorway stood his teenage daughter, Stacy. She'd wanted nothing to dow ith him since she was twelve years old, and was sixteen and a half now. At this size, she could do anythign she wanted to him without anyone knowing. He feared the porspect, and now her enormous feet were just inches from him. He looked up, only to find her breasts made the girl's face unseeable. But he'd recognise his own daughter anywhere, and from any size. Jus then, the girl look around. "Hello? Anyone there?"
