13322121.content:
The man was frozen in fear. Someone was at the door, and he was in the foyer! He knew his way around the house of course, at normal size, but being this small was just ridiculous. Still not knowing where to go and feeling like a trapped insect, Mr. Lombard sees who was at the door: It is his sizteen-year-old daughter, Stacy. The two had been at complete odds ever since Stacy was twelve, and had recently been in a big fight. Right now the titanic girl was walking right towards him, her sandal-clad feet making noises like thunder. He couldn't believe Jen had just left him to die here, but he would survive nonetheless.

The blonde-haired teen stopped for a moment, her purse drooping off her shoulder. She fixed it and kept walking until she was just inches from her father and stopped, looking around at face level.
"Mom? Dad? Anybody home?"
His daughter's voice was painfully loud at this range, and out of pure instinct he brought his hands to his ears. Now the real dilemma was at hand. Should he try to hide and survive until he could contact his wife, or should he take advantage of thiss opportunity and get his daughter's attention, at the risk of her not wanting to help him?

"Time to go get him," she said, having thoroughly disposed of his car like he had done to her. She strode towards the door of the gym, but then had second thoughts. Not about squishing her lousy ex underfoot, but about the location. Jenn's first shrink and squish had been at a secluded bus stop. The gym was busy. What if someone caught her? She was still up in the air about just stomping on random people. After all, she thought, there's plenty of time to step on everyone else after creeps like Travis were history!
Jenn decided to wait here for him. No windows faced the parking lot and hedges blocked the view from the street. "Just because I'm stuck here until the dip gets done flexing his muscles doesn't mean I can't have some fun," she said to herself.
And then she saw the "Bunny cars". Travis had formed a "gang" with his buddies and they all had airbrushed Playboy Bunnies onto the sides. There were three of them here now. Aiming the device, she swept it across them, each apparently vanishing.
A few quick steps and she was next to the first, another convertible. A few quick stomps by one flip-flopped foot reduced it to twisted pieces. Admiring her work, she stepped backwards and heard a crunch underfoot. Darn it, I stepped on the van next to it by accident. She ground the already smashed vehicle down angrily.
Not wanting to make the same mistake, Jenn picked up the last of the Bunny cars, a tricked-out SUV. She pondered how it should meet its fate, then realized, "It's an off-road vehicle, it should be smashed in the dirt. Carrying it over to the undeveloped plot to the side, she flipped it out into the dirt. Pushing it along with one sandaled foot, she went "Vroom, vroom. Look at this ride fly, but what's that? A giant foot behind me! Ohmyfreakingod, gotta speed up. No use. Aaaah, I'm being crushed!" CRUNCH! Jenn's foot reduced it to the same pile of random rubble as the other three. She was really in to her game, so she was caught by surprise by the open door of the gym. It was her stupid ex. Had he seen her?

13411.content:
"What the Hell, Jenn?" Travis blurted. He still couldn't believe his eyes. Apparently, she had done something to his friend's car and his car too! He couldn't believe what his eyes had plainly seen, his ex-girlfriend crushing Bob's SUV into a thousand pieces under her dusty flip-flop. She must have hid the real cars and was crushing toy cars to make some stupid-ass point, he rationalized. She always stomped on things when they would fight.

"What did you do with my car Jenn?" he smiled unpleasantly, advancing towards her, though increasingly hesitant. This was a new Jenn. The old Jenn, while she sometimes had a small mean streak with the nerds in school, had always been intimidated of him and she wasn't showing any signs of it now.

Jenn watched him lurching towards her. He opened his mouth to ask some other foolish question when she cut him off.
"Hello Travis," she said sweetly, "how nice to see you. I've been waiting for you and passed the time by crushing your oh-so-expensive car under my $10 sandals. That's for what you did to my car. I'm going to step on you now. I'd have to do it anyway because you saw, but because of what you did to me, I'm going to enjoy it. She raised the device and fired.

Travis listened to her rave and watched stupidly as she pointed a TV remote? at him. A moment of disorientation and he was now staring up at an unbelievably tall giantess, his ex-girlfriend! Even through his confusion, her booming voice broke through, "I was going to squish your little legs and arms and inch my way up your body until your guts splurted out, but then I realized that in your back-assed, unmeaning way you were partly responsible for my getting this power, so I'll make it quick. Heck, I'll even take off my shoe. Seems only reasonable that you should die embracing naked girl flesh, even if it is her foot. Bye Travis." Her warm sole, slightly dusty, covered him. He had a moment feeling her soft sole engulf him, then nothing.
Jenn glanced at the faint red stain on her sole before replacing her thong. Yes, she thought, that was sooo much better than the first squish. Should I wait around for the rest of the gang?

Jenny knelt down to take a closer look at her bug of an ex-boyfriend, who was paralyzed with fear. From his perspective, her face was as big as a mountain, and her voice as loud as thunder. "Not very talkative, huh?" The girl smiled, like a cat who was playing with its prey. "Let's go somewhere more private, shall we? Penny slid down onto her back, then rolled over, her gargantuan foot nearly knocking the refrigerator over. She suddenly thanked her lucky stars that her parents kept a landline phone for emergencies; her oversized fingers were no doubt too big to use her cell phone, but she could use the tip of her fingernail to dial on the larger landline phone.

But... whom could she call? She thought about simply calling 911, but she was suddenly afraid of how they would react to her. What if they brought over the police? What if they shot her? What if they took her to a lab and studied her?

"This is so stupid," she muttered as she dialed the phone, calling her best friend Shana. Shana had just graduated and was taking nursing classes; she could at least make sure that Penny was still healthy, maybe take a blood sample.

She paused before she finished dialing. "Why am I even doing this?" she said aloud. She felt perfectly healthy. Better than healthy, in fact--she was energetic and lively. Her skin seemed to have cleared up. And, she suddenly realized, she wasn't wearing her glasses anymore and could see just fine. Even her hair seemed thicker and more vibrant. She was perfectly fine... aside from being twenty feet tall.

But still, a small voice in her head told her to call Shana. At the very least, Shana was smart--maybe she had an idea about what to do.

~*~


It was early evening by the time Shana Sharpe pulled up at Penny's house, her red hair bouncing as she walked to the front door. Just like Penny had asked, she brought some medical equipment and a few syringes; she was still finishing phlebotomy training, and the extra practice would be helpful anyway. But what had Penny been so worried about?

She rang the doorbell, trying to peek in the window but finding the shutters drawn.

"It's unlocked," Penny called. A bit too loudly. It sounded strange. But with a shrug, Shana opened the door and...

"HOLY SHIT!" she cried, dropping her medical bag on the ground.

There was Penny... or what had sounded like Penny, anyway. She kind of looked like Penny--the same wide, pretty green eyes, the same blonde hair, the same awkward smile. But her figure had changed--her legs were longer, her curves more pronounced, her physique a bit less fat. Also, she was twenty feet tall and wearing a bed sheet.

"...hi," she said weakly. "Sorry I didn't tell you. I didn't think you'd believe me."

Shana stepped closer cautiously, her eyes never leaving Penny's magnificent new body. Penny's legs were crossed, and Shana touched Penny's toes with her hands, marveling at the fact that her feet were nearly as long as Shana's whole body. "You're--you're real," she stammered.

"I am," Penny said. "But... but something weird is happening to me, and I was hoping maybe you could take some blood work back to your lab."

Shana nodded, nervously fumbling around in her bag for a needle. "Yeah. Yeah, I'll do that." As she prepared a fresh needle, Penny held out her arm--an arm that was longer than Shana's whole body--and clenched her fist, causing a vein to rise to the surface behind her elbow.

"At least I've got better veins now," Penny said, trying to laugh. Shana, for her part, stepped closer to the arm, scrubbing away at the oversized vein with a sterile wipe. She readied the needle and...

Shana looked up at Penny, frowning. "It broke," she said. "It can't penetrate your skin."

Penny sighed, pulling her arm back. She hadn't even felt the needle break against her. "I guess that makes sense, huh?"

Shana scratched her chin. "No, not really," she said. "I mean, you're just a really, really tall person. A needle shouldn't just break on you like this unless your skin is thicker somehow." She looked up at Penny, laying her hands on the giant girl's leg. "Sweetie, what happened to you? How did you get this big?"

It was shaped almost like a television remote control, but the functionality was obviously very different. Flipping the remote over, she found a small warning label on the other side. Penny, meanwhile, scooted closer to her friend, keeping her head low to avoid the ceiling.

"Do not consume foodstuffs... reduced or increased in size?" Shana read aloud. She looked up at Penny in horror. "Sweetie, does this thing change the sizes of stuff?"

Penny nodded sadly, holding out her hand to take the remote from Shana. She turned it over in her hand, noting that the buttons were probably too small for her to use now. "Jenn Hoffman used it to make me tiny. Then she made Zack even tinier than that. And--and then..." Penny began to cry, covering her face with her hands.

And then Penny returned to crying again. Shana moved closer, wrapping her arms around Penny's arm, trying her best to comfort the poor girl. "It's--it's okay, Penny... it's not your fault..." She couldn't even fathom what was happening here. What could all of this mean? How was it even possible?

She put her other hand against Shana's back, and all she could think about behind her tears was how small her best friend seemed now, the way her hand covered almost her entire back. She moved her hand again to wipe her tears from her eyes again, staring down at Shana with a glazed over look.

"And... and that's not all..." she said. The voice inside of her was beckoning her again. Show her. "I--I have to show you something something..."

Shana looked up, a bit of fear behind her sympathetic gaze. "You can tell me anything, sweetie. Sweetie, I love you to death, you know that, right?"

Penny smiled. A chill ran down her spine. "And--and I love you, too..." she whispered. "I'm sorry..."

She leaned forward, pulling Shana close to her, holding the smaller girl against her body. Shana didn't resist, but Penny knew she couldn't if she wanted to. Shana was too small.

Hesitating, Jenn decided to come back to him before the last one made his escape.

Ben was almost into the deeper grass when the foliage abruptly disappeared under a large pinkish foot. The way the giantess ground down on the grass was yet another illustration as to what she’d do to him if she caught him. Dodging back between her legs, he ran past Blister, screaming with his legs pulped. BAM! A foot crashed down, close enough that the tremor of its landing threw him off his feet. Scrambling to his feet, Ben heard her say, “Tough luck, punk.” then felt the ball of her foot push his body back down. Her big toe pressed his head into the ground. He thought the pain couldn’t get any worse. He was wrong.

Jenn scrubbed her messy foot into the dirt to scrub off Ben’s remains. “Yuck, I wish you guys wouldn’t squish all over my foot. I’m going to have to wash my feet before I go to the mall now.” She wandered over to where she’d dropped her thongs and slipped into them. Trudging home, she thought about her recent fun at the punks’ expense and what she should do next. She hardly noticed when she finished off the crippled guy into a wet spot in a passing footprint.
14212.title: Tough luck, punks

1422.content:
Jenn chewed her lower lip in anticipation, stretching her right leg out and spreading her toes along the grass, putting her weight on her back left foot. Her toes scrunched the(to her) little blades of grass and waited to see if they'd agree to her new demands. This remote was so much fun! Now these gross punks were cut down to the size they should be!

"C'mon, guys...don't make me repeat myself." Jenn said, a little impatiently. She sighed. "Look, little bug punks, you're nothing now! You've been made into exactly what you should be, little tiny things to be squished under MY glorious feet. I've always been better than people like you, and now there's no disputing it. So come up and kiss my feet, show me you accept your lowly position and maybe I won't kill you. I've been thinking of getting a new pet, and you all would do nicely!" There was no response, or movement in the grass. She rolled her eyes. "I'll start trampling all of this grass, pipsqueeks. Either play nice and love the foot, or go squish under it."

Inside the labyrinthe of grass, the remaining punks and the one goth girl huddled together.

"Maybe we should do as she says..." Said Jack, a purple haired punk. Beside him, Ziggy(a dirty, hippy style punk with shaggy hair) stood comforting Misery, the goth girl, who still wept at the horrible death of her boyfriend, Josh. This evil bitch never even considered Josh a person! To her, they were nothing! And who could blame her now?

"She's so horrible!" Misery said, trying to stay quiet in case the giantess' could hear them. She looked up from thier vantage point huddling just a few short steps away from the center of Jenn's pinky toe and her next toe. Her massive legs towered above them. Hell, her pinky toe loomed above them!

"I know, I know..." Ziggy said, once a happy-go-lucky class clown, now a subdued and terrified tiny man.

"I mean, she just shrank us all! She killed some of us! Who does she think she is, doing that to someone? Doesn't she know we're people?"

"No," Jack said, gazing up, "No, I don't think it occured to us that we were people. Ever. We were always nothing but insects to her, and now she doesn't even care about squishing us."

"She's playing with us." Ziggy said. Jack nodded.

"Yep. And why should she? No one's ever going to search for us on the bottom of her foot." Jack continued.

"I wanna go home...I wanna see my mom and dad..." Misery said, starting to cry. Ziggy shook his head.

"I think our only hope is to do as she says." Jack replied. They both looked at him. He raised his hands in exasperation. "What else are we going to do?! Run away?! Try to get home? Even if we did, what then? I'd hate to see what my little sister would do to me at this size. IF I could even get her attention! Like our families are going to examine thier feet long enough to see us jumping up and down!" Misery cried harder. Ziggy watched him seriously.

"Maybe if we do as she says, and worship her...well, maybe she might end up seeing as people and restore us." Ziggy suggested.

"Or she'll step on us like bugs, like she did to Josh!" Misery said.

"WHAT'S IT GONNA BE, LOWLY PEASENTS? WORSHIP ME OR DIE?!" Came Jenn's godlike voice.

142211222.content:
Misery wandered back to her small apartment and casually threw her backpack down at the door before sliding off her buckled up ankle high boots.

Walking down the hall to her bedroom, Misery slipped into her grey khakis, rolling up her pant legs to half way up her calves as usual. She grabbed a maroon teeshirt and her grey overshirt as she wandered back out of the bedroom, her bare feet slapping on the hardwood floor.

To Jenns surprise, the car sized zipper above her pulled along and she was treated to the dark outlined eyes of the giant goth, staring down at her.

"My friends, my boyfriend even. Squished under your feet. You think it's a game of some sort? Popular girls are going to 'rule the world'? Well I've got some bad news for you. This lil reject of society is going to show you a lesson in humiliation, and maybe let you live. But I doubt it," The gigantic goth explained with a smirk as she cuddled the tiny Jenn to her breasts, looking down at the small girl, tiny hands pressing against her chest, feeling like someone touching them with two pens lightly.

Jenn began to pathetically squeak out excuses, "It's not like that! Well, it is but... I didn't think okay? When you're stomping a bug out, you don't normally think about it's life, you think about getting rid of it!"

"Oh, that makes it all better," Came Misery's sarcastic reply, "So we're just bugs to you, is that it? Dumb reply, pint sized popular pop."

"Huh? You wouldn't!" Jenn started to cry, "You're not calling me food are you? You can't eat me Mizz! This isn't fair. I wasn't going to squish you!"

Misery laughed, "Sure you were Jenn, you just felt creative. Unfortunately, this last little bit of creativity is going to cost you. No worries. I don't plan to eat you" The goth threw herself down onto her big plush blue couch.

Histerically, Jenn began hugging Miserys fingers and smiling up at the huge pale giantess who held her life, "Oh thank you! Thank you so much Mizz! I'll do anything you want. Anything! I'm so glad that you're not going to hurt me!"

"Hey," The goth retorted, "Who said anything about that?" Misery slowly put the girl down on the couch cushion at her feet. Jenn was just shorter than the goth girls big toes.

Stumbling back Jenn began to cry again, "No, you wouldn't! That's just gross! You've had those boots on all day too. Stupid black ones in the summer." The 'delicate' Jenn gave a few little coughs.

Misery leaned back against the arm of the couch behind her and began to roar with laughter. Finally, she regained herself and wiped a few tears from her eyes. "You are a work of art Jenn! Here I am, with you shrunk at my feet, and you still have the guts to insult me!"

"I didn't... mean it as an insult," Jenn wimpered.

"Sure sounded like one to me!" Misery's reply came as she hugged her knees to her chest. "So, wanna find out if you can survive under one of these feet? It's not too gross I'm sure. You should see my friend Roxy! Taking walks all summer. She only wears flip flops but gaaah. I'm sure you'll do fine against me."

Falling backward onto her hands, Jenn began to scramble back along the couch as Misery flexed her toes eagerly. "You can't do this! Someone else must have a remote. They'll find you somehow! I'll be saved somehow." The girl girl grinned broadly as she raised her giant right foot up and held it's softly pink sole, pointed toward Jenn. "I hope."

Using her other foots toes Misery grabbed on to Jenn's free arm, now she had both of her arms firmly between her toes. "You know how easy it would be to rip of your arms right now? I could just pull and then pop they'll fly off. Or I could go slower and do something worse like say stretching you like an acordion until they finally pop off from the strength of my feet."

Hearing the gruesome ideas Jenn began panicking, "Please don't! I'll do anything! I'll even kiss your feet like I made your friends kiss mine!"

Chuckling slightly Misery looked at the shrunken girl with amusement, "Oh I know you will, in fact you'll be doing better licking. And don't worry about your arms, I won't get rid of them....yet. If I got rid of your arms how would you properly worship me? Oh no I have something better in mind."

Releasing her toes death grip on Jenn's arms Misery pulled her foot back slightly, until her toes came to Jenn's legs.

"W-What are you doing?!" The nervous girl asked.

With an innocent enough smile Misery silently wrapped her toes around Jenn's legs, her knee caps to be precise. "Nothing bad, just making sure you won't run." Grinding her toes together the goth girl instantly shattered Jenn's knee caps, leaving her with two broken legs.

Having never broken a bone in her life Jenn screamed as loud as possible at the unimaginable pain, earning a somewhat smug look from Misery. "Now you understand what my friends went through, only instead of making it end instantly like you did I'm going to prolong your suffering, make sure you realize the error of your ways.

Crying in pain Jenn screamed violently, "I did! I have! Please let me go!"

Shaking her head Misery once again chuckled, "Afraid not, I gotta make sure the message gets through." With that Misery released the grip her toes had on Jenn and leapt off of the couch.

"I'm kinda hungry, I'll be making some dinner. Stay right where you are." With her order Misery strode away, into a neighboring room which was undoubtedly her kitchen.

Still in horrific pain Jenn sat there, crying. Crying about her pain, about the fact she was shrunken, about being reduced to worshipping a goth girls feet. It was all like a horrible nightmare.

Mere minutes later Misery returned, holding a plastic cup of instant noodles. "They're tasty and easy to make. " She explained.

"Don't think you're gonna be having a break this soon young lady." She taunted, using a free hand to lift up the weary Jenn.

"As we can see from your futile attempts, your hands are still working just fine Jenn." Misery spoke with a cold unenthusiastic tone, as if she was making a formal statement, "So, while I'm eating, we should put these hands to good use."

142212.content:
Jenn watched for a little bit longer as the pathetic creatures kissed and licked and sucked and worshipped her Goddess-like right foot, and then rolled her eyes. "Man, this is so boring." Jenn said with a sigh. They all stopped and looked up, fearfully. Jenn shook her head. "Oh, don't stop on account of me. Enjoy your last moments with my foot. I wore my favorite lotion just for you pathetic worms. But, you know as well as I do that this is my world now, and you're nothing but...well, nothing! That's all you are! And I don't associate with nothings. Only real people who matter are worth my time. Sooooo, you guys are pretty useless to me. So, whatever." Jenn began to walk, with her tiny victims still grasping her foot. Without acknowledging them further, she walked back to the pavement and slipped her flip flops back on, and then continued to walk further down the road, already thinking of other uses for her new toy.

Down on her foot, the lowly trio shook thier heads in disbelief as she straightened her massive body and walked away, with them still attached to her. It was the ultimate punishment, and they were all at once terrified and humiliated. They weren't even worthy of her notice long enough for her to even kill them! As the massive foot began to lift into the air, all three found many thoughts rushing through thier now tiny heads.

Jack thought only of survival, though deep down her knew it was futile. He made a mad dash for her middle toe, seeing the bright steel toering that beautifully adorned it, like a monument to her beauty before the tiny subhuman who stood unnoticed. He slid as the foot began to shake, lift into the air, and grasped it with all his strength as the foot crashed into the ground. His stomach lurched as it all began again....

Ziggy thought about Jenn, and, in his own panic and delerium, about how beautiful she was. He stood still, dazed, as he stared up at her magnificent body. He could see her creamy skin in the tears in her denim jeans, her white tank top showing the shaking of breasts bigger than most buildings he had stood next to. He sank to his knees as his surroundings shook and shifted, and kissed her feet some more. In the end, hism mind broke. Maybe she was right, maybe he was never worthy of life. So, in death, he WOULD be exactly what she'd wanted him to be. But Jenn would never know about the doomed love and worship the tiny punk gave her as the foot reared up and he was tossed around. He was beneath her now, and soon he would be beneath her...literally.

Misery cried in terror and thought about her life. All the friends she'd had, her family...all her nice things she'd taken for granted and turned again in her quest to be "different". Like Ziggy, she'd looked up at Jenn and saw what she could have been. If only she'd been thankful for what she had! If only she'd been more like Jenn...happy to be a normal girl, being social and making friends, maybe she wouldn't have to die under this cruel teenaged giantess' feet. Tears ran down her streaks as death rushed to meet her.


Jenn slipped her foot into the flip flop, and as she did all three insects on her foot found it less than pleasent. Ziggy, being tossed around like a pinball, finally fell as her soft but now dirty foot slipped into the black flip flop, and he landed on the thin surface hard, feeling several bones break. He looked up and saw that Jenn didn't even glance at the flip flop, just shoved her foot in, the strap going between her toes. Those toes rushed down to meet him, and he felt massive pressure crush him, and he exploded all over her middle toe.

Misery, still weeping, raised her hands in terror as she slid and fell between Jenn's big and second toe. She found herself stuck there, and screamed in mortal terror as the toe strap came and slammed into her, crushing her into the smelly flesh of Jenn's beautiful foot. Unlike Ziggy, there was no quick explosion for Misery. Instead, still crying, she was slowly crushed, her arms, legs and ribs are cracking and breaking with every step Jenn took. Finally, after much pain and exhaustion, Misery finally passed out just as Jenn made it to her next destination. She would never wake up again, and Jenn wouldn't even notice Misery's body later as it was washed out between her toes and down the drain when Jenn took her next shower.

Jack had squeezed himself between the toe ring and Jenn's beautiful toe, actually finding himself well braced as the massive foot went about it's casual buisness. He never saw what happened to his friends, but he knew what happened nonetheless. As Jenn walked on, Jack was still "safe" beneath her toering. What happened to him next, he'd never know. But he hoped his destiny wasn't to be this beautiful cruel bitches' foot jewelery forever.

She just cannot comprehend that the titanic white walls in front of her are in fact Amber's shoes. Forcing her eyes upwards, she cannot even see the end of Amber's immeasurably tall legs. And if Amber's voice just now made Kate shudder, it has shaken Jenn to the core: she is now just an insignificant speck of dust to Amber. Her only hope is that Kate does not loose her grip on her.
15511211121.title: Tiny Kate, Tinier Jenn

choices: Amber plays with them some more
155112111211.content:
Before Kate can go far, she feels herself being lifted up in the air. Amber picks her little friend up, pinching Kate's waist with her thumb and her index finger. She feels so powerful holding a person between her fingers, just like when she picked up Jenn a few minutes earlier. She places Kate on her open palm and looks down on her with a wicked grin.

"This isn't funny anymore, Amber! Make me big again!" Kate shouts at the top of her voice, half exasperated and half fearful of her giantess friend. When you are standing in someone's hand, you probably don't want to annoy that person too much.

"It's still funny to me," says Amber. "It's funny for you when you had Jenn in your hand, wasn't it?"

Kate looks at Jenn in her hand and suddenly feels sorry for what she did to her. Jenn is still in a state of shock. Jenn can't even see Amber's entire face without having to scan the sky. The face was the size of a billboard just a minute ago. Now Amber's blue eyes are like a pair of suns and her pink lips move like no other object she has ever seen.

"Wait a minute!" Amber exclaims as she moves her face closer to focus on the terrified Kate's hand. "Is that Jenn you're holding? She shrank with you, didn't she? This is so cool, she's so fucking small I can't even see her that well. Open your hand and let me see her."

Kate hesitates. While she dislikes Jenn, she does not really want to expose her sister to this power-hungry giantess and potentially get her killed.

"O come on! Let me see her or I'll squash both of you in my hand." Amber shakes her hand slightly and starts to curl her fingers inwards.

Kate shrieks, "Okay, okay! Just don't hurt us!" She opens up her hand and, cupping her two hands together to hold Jenn better, she thrusts her arm upwards for Amber to see.

Amber giggles, realizing how much power she has over her tiny friend. And how much much more power she has over Jenn, a popular girl whom she used to envy but is now merely a speck in her presence. To see Jenn better, Amber closes her left eye and brings her right eye even closer to Kate's hands. She can barely make out Jenn's tiny cowering form in the middle of Kate's open palms.

"Beautiful," Amber coos. Her mere breath in saying this almost blows Jenn away from her perch in Kate's hands. Amber moves her hand slightly away from her face and laughs.

"Now what to do with the two of you?"
155112111211.title: Taunting for the Tiny Sisters

choices: takes her tiny captives to Jenn's room.
drops Kate and Jenn by her sneakers.
1551121112111.content:
Amber strokes Kate's body with her well-manicured finger. "Still can't believe I'm holding you in my hand, Kate. Now hold your sister tightly. I have some plans for such a tiny speck. If you lose her, you're going to regret it."

"Amber, please! I'm your friend! Make me big again1" Kate screams at Amber.

Amber pushes Kate with her finger, making her fall backward on the surface of the gigantic hand.

"First of all," Amber says while poking Kate with her fingernail. "I'm definitely not friends with a tiny worm like you. Second, you're not in a position to be making demands. And finally, I don't know if this remote thing can enlarge things instead of shrinking them. Should I try it and see if you shrink to Jenn's size there?"

Amber raises the remote and points it at Kate, her finger poised on the button. Jenn screams, not wanting to be shrunk to microscopic size, her tiny tiny voice is only audible to Kate.

"No! No! Please, don't!" Kate pleads while she struggles to stand on Amber's gargantuan hand. She only manages to fall on all fours, pleading desperately. "Do whatever you want but don't shrink me again!"

"Whatever I want, huh?" Amber repeats Kate's words with a big evil smile. "Whatever. I. Want. That sounds really really good. Not that you have a choice, now do you?" She closes her fist around Kate and
1551121112111.title: Establishing the rules

choices: Amber finds some of Jenn's clothes that she likes.
15511211121111.content:
Amber walks across the hallway to Jenn's room with Kate in her hand (and Jenn in Kate's hand). She saunters in the room and closes the door behind her. She puts Kate down on the desk.

"Now stay there like good little pets. Let's see what we can find here."

Kate stands on the desk, which is as wide as a football field to her. She does not quite know what to do with her minuscule sister. She finally decides to put her down by her feet. At her normal size, Jenn would never have allowed Amber and Kate in her room. At her current size, where Kate can squash her underfoot and Amber can flatten her under a fingernail with no effort whatsoever, she can only watch helplessly as Amber rummages through her belongings. Trying to vent her frustration and not thinking it through, Jenn runs to her sister's feet and starts to pound the top of Kate's sandals.

"You bitch!" Jenn screams at Kate. "This is all your fault! You better fix this or you'll be sorry! Look at how small I am! Wait until I tell on Mom and Dad and... and..." Jenn slowly realizes how empty her threats are and, collapsing forward, starts to sob on her sister's foot.

Kate looks down on Jenn, like a little mouse at her feet, first with amusement then with pity. She crouches down slowly and gently strokes Jenn's tiny back, whispering to her and hoping that Amber will not notice them. "I'm sorry, I'm really sorry. You know I was just teasing. I don't know how to fix the situation but I'll keep you safe. Come here. Don't be afraid." Kate very gently lifts Jenn up on her cupped hands and, still crouching, lets Jenn continue sobbing on her bosom. "It will be all right. It will be all right."

Jenn feels somewhat better and looks up at Kate. "Thank you," she says. "But what are we going to do? She's so huge and we're so..."

Her words are interrupted by Amber who now approaches the desk.
15511211121111.title: In Jenn's Room

choices: Amber makes the girls worship her feet
While Amber's distracted, Kate tries to find a hiding place
155112111211111.content:
"Oh, how adorable!" Amber exclaims. She's holding a matching set of black short skirt and red blouse. "Recognize these, Jenn? I guess they're too big for you, huh? Good thing I wear the same size you used to. Don't mind if I borrow these... hell, if I borrow all of your clothings, do you? Well, do you?"

Jenn glares angrily at Amber from her sister's hand but her clothings are the least of her worries now. "Fuck you, bitch!" she screams, knowing Amber would not be able to hear her anyway.

Amber giggles amusedly. "I'll take your inaudible chirping to mean that you don't mind. Well, thank you kindly, my little speck. Now you two can watch me ..." Amber pauses and her eyes glint with the realization of her full power over the two sisters. "... watch me, a goddess, change her attire." She laughs and, in a single stride, rests her head on the desk right in front of Kate, a few strands of her golden hair flowing forward until they almost touch her shrunken friend. "Hear that? Goddess Amber. I like that."

Kate and Jenn say nothing. Kate starts to worry about where this is going. For Jenn, it's harder to disagree with Amber's assertion that here is indeed a goddess, a mountain-sized girl with hair strands as thick as her own arms, with the power to extinguish her life with a single breath. Amber stands up and changes her clothes.

"Tada!" Amber exclaims with a flourish. "I think they look much better on me. What do you think, pet?" Again Kate and Jenn ignore her. This time, it's not a good decision. Amber steps toward the desk and slams her fist on the desktop, almost knocking Kate down. "I asked you a question, you little worm!"

"Yes! They look better on you!" Kate screams in a panic.

"Of course they do," Amber says. "Now, I can't be wearing these sneakers with such a nice outfit. Let's see what you have." She opens Jenn's closet to find many shoes and sandals arranged tidily on racks. She picks a black strappy sandals with one inch heels. Taking off her sneakers, she puts on the sandals, which fit her perfectly.

"You know, Jenn, you should have been nicer to me and share your wardrobe. Maybe I will be more merciful to you now."
155112111211111.title: Dressing up

1551121112111111.content:
Laughing contentedly, Amber stands up and strides around the room, admiring how good she looks in Jenn's clothes. She turns to Kate and says with a sweet smile, "What do you think, Kate?"

Kate is not in the least interested in the matters of fashion in her current situation. She pleads, "Please Amber! Stop playing around! This is serious!"

Amber's smile fades into a cold glare. She approaches Kate and grabs her roughly. "You pathetic little thing! Do you think I'm not being serious? I can kill you so easily. Then I can go shrink more people who may be more respectful than you! You don't get it, do you? You're now my pet, my little slave. And as for you, Jenn, you're nothing. Nothing but a little dustmite. I think I should teach the two of you a lesson."

Amber lowers her hand to the ground and drops Kate not too gently. Kate falls on her back and fortunately hurts neither herself nor Jenn who is clinging in terror to her hand. Amber stands up straight and, lifting one of her sandaled foot, places it next to Kate threateningly.

"Now give me one good reason why I shouldn't just squash you two under my foot!"

Kate looks up beyond Amber's skirt and blouse at Amber's goddess-like visage. She can smell a mixture of leather, lotion, and sweat emanating from the giantess' foot. She's serious, Kate says to herself, she's really going to step on us. She'd better think of something quick. She sees Amber's other foot, as big as a truck, moves forward slightly. In a couple seconds, she can become a stain under her beautiful friend's sole.

No time to think. Kate scrambles up, turns, and flings herself on Amber's big toe. She kisses the toe, burying her face on the base of the giantess' enormous nail. "No, please, please, don't kill me! Please!" she cries. She continues to kiss this goddess' toe.

In her panic, she drops the even smaller Jenn from her hand. Jenn falls on the top of Amber's toe, unharmed thanks to her small size and Amber's (relatively) soft skin. She tries to stand up but can't keep her balance and falls to the crack between Amber's toe.

Amber watches the little girl kissing her toe, which flexes automatically, a combination of being slightly tickled and (much more noticably) the raw feeling of power. Here was someone who used to be a normal human being of her size, now just a little thing begging mercy from her. And she holds her life in her hands or at her feet as the case is right now.

"I don't know," Amber purrs mockingly. "I'm not convinced that I shouldn't just step on you. Maybe my other toes are jealous of the big one." She presses down on her other toes to emphasize her point.

Kate looks up at Amber and she can tell that this power-hungry giantess is not going to stop humiliating her. So she crawls slowly toward the second toe and starts to kiss that too. Fortunately the smell is not so terrible and the toes are not dirty; Amber maintains her feet well pedicured and clean most of the time.

"You can lick them too," suggests Amber.

Kate takes that as a command and starts to lick the toes between her kisses. At her normal size, she used to admire Amber's feet but never did she imagine she would be kissing and licking them under coercion.

"Okay, that's enough! What about you, Jenn? At your size, you should worship me even more, I would think. Hey, where is she, Kate?"
1551121112111111.title: Worship Amber's Feet

choices: Amber experiments with the remote control again
Amber steps on one of the sisters
15511211121111111.content:
Jenn has been watching Kate, a giantess to her, kissing and licking the toes of the even more gigantic Amber. For a while, Jenn was feeling rather safe in being ignored by Amber. That was quickly shattered by Amber's thunderous voice demanding her to worship her. Jenn was brought back to the reality that she was after all sitting on the crack between this goddess' toes.

So she climbed up to the top of Amber's big toe, painfully aware of how small she was that she has to exert so much energy just climbing between Amber's toes. Even more humiliating is the sight of the long stretch of black leather (now even thicker than her height) that Jenn realizes is the strap of her own sandal. She looks up and up and up but all she can see is endless stretch of leg. From far far away, a booming voice comes to her.

"Ah, there you are. Why don't you kiss your goddess' toe? Or maybe you can just go ... squash!"

A gigantic shadow falls on her as Amber lowers her finger and places it right above her. Jenn is so terrified that she prostrates herself right there.

"Amber, please!" she hears Kate pleading. "I mean, mistress, goddess Amber... please. Look, she's worshiping you. Please don't kill her."

Amber lifts her finger and observes the tiny speck on her toe. Indeed Jenn has immediately started to kiss and lick the toe. At her size, the smell of lotion and sweat is even stronger than at Kate's size but she just wants to survive and avoid the anger of this goddess.

Amber can barely feel anything. She bends to get a closer look and that frightens Jenn even more, spurring her to lick more vigorously.

"Yes... I can feel you, tiny insect slave," Amber says, emphasizing the word 'slave' with relish. She looks at Kate who is watching her sister. As much as Kate dislikes Jenn, it's painful to watch her own sibling be so humiliated by her friend. But Amber is not done with Kate.

"Kate, my other foot," Amber says lazily. She drags her other foot next to the one where Kate and Jenn are. Kate, now too afraid to risk Amber's anger, runs without a moment of hesitation to the other set of toes. She licks and kisses the big toe, kneeling in front of the gargantuan foot. Her only thought now is to please her goddess to avoid being a stain under her foot.

Amber stands up straight, her movement almost knocking Jenn off her toe. Watching the two sisters kissing her feet, one the size of her finger and the other like a flea, she laughs heartily. The two have been the same size of her but now they are so insignificant. And they realize how much more beautiful, how much more powerful, how much a true goddess she is compared to them.
15511211121111111.title: Jenn Worships Amber

choices: points it at herself, making her grow.
155112111211111111.content:
"I'm going to have the world literally at my feet with this thing," says Amber. For the first time, she examines the remote more carefully. On the back of the remote, she finds a switch marked (+) and (-), currently set at the latter.


"I wonder if I can also enlarge things with this," says Amber. Both Jenn and Kate look up from their position at Amber's toes; so there can be a way of restoring them? Amber flicks her big toe, causing Jenn to tumble forward. "Who told you insects you can stop?" Terrified, the shrunken girls continue to kiss their mistress' toes.


"Well, there is only one way to find out. Or maybe there is another way..." Amber flips the switch to the (+) position and ...
155112111211111111.title: Enlarger?

choices: Amber plays with shrinking and enlarging the girls
She goes out to collect her worshipers
1551121112111111112.content:
"I like you that size, Kate, so I'm not going to risk making you bigger. Good, continue worshiping my toes. Let's try it instead on our resident flea here. Here, flea, go down here." Amber picks up a little piece of white paper and places it in front of her feet.

Jenn has neither the willpower nor reason to disobey the mountain-sized girl but she is so small that she is finding difficulty to even get gown from Amber's toe. She tries walking to the side of the toenail but even the drop there is very steep. Fearfully, she tries to grab hold of Amber's skin and starts to crawl down the fleshy precipice. Amber watches with amusement for a while.

"How pathetic can you be? It's just my toe, you know. What if I give you a liiiiitle help?" Amber tips her toe to the side very slightly but to Jenn, it is as if the mountain she is climbing is about to turn over. She loses her grip and drops several yards to the black leather sandal. Fortunately, she is unhurt due to her small mass and the soft surface of the sandal. Amber giggles to see the little speck dazed next to her toe.

"Well, this is just taking forever! You, the other slave!" Amber nudges Kate with her other foot. "Come over there, pick your pathetic sister up, and put her on the piece of paper." Kate obeys and carefully places Jenn on the piece of paper.

"Now for the test. If this doesn't work and she's shrunk down even smaller, you'll be responsible for finding her on that piece of paper. Then I can make her live under my toenail, perhaps," Amber says with glee. Amber pushes the button on the remote. Her other finger is on the switch at the back. Just in case, she thinks to herself, if this enlarges Jenn to normal size, I'll just shrink her again immediately.

The next moment, Jenn has been enlarged but, to her chagrin, she is still shrunk at the same size as Kate. Kate runs to her and hugs her, forgetting for a moment the giantess still in front of them. Amber ignores the two girls and squeezes her hands together with satisfaction.

"Well, this certainly has potential. For instance, we can experiment on shrinking you down smaller and smaller and smaller... and I don't have to lose my precious pets that way."

"Or... ooh, I like this too! I can gather a whole city of flea-sized people who will worship me, goddess Amber, while the two of you can stay your current size and be my personal priestesses."
1551121112111111112.title: Even more powerful Amber

choices: Amber decides to force her slaves to worship her again
Amber tries on the (+) switch on herself
15511211121111111121.content:
"Well, this definitely has big potential now. If I can either make this grow and shrink, the whole world may soon be easily dominated by me, and they will all worship Amber, the greatest goddess of all!"

Kate and Jenn, after hugging each other, realized once again that they were still tiny slaves to this power-hungry giantess. They looked at her and saw they had no hope. They were now slaves of a woman they saw as much more beautiful, divinal and incredibly huge they just HAD to worship her.

As Amber turned her face back on them, both sisters knew that they were done for.

"In fact, I think I would like you two to face just how greater I am than both of you. And how incredible I really am. So, I think I prefer my slaves as small as possible, so that you become fully dependent of your mistress. Jenn, you were already used to being insignificant, so you'll shrink further first."

Jenn's was completely frightened and watched in horror as the remote was once again on the (-) switch and pointed at her. She shrank back to her former height!

Kate grabbed her tiny sister with pity and an utter anger against Amber.

"You paranoid bitch! How could you do this to her? We worshipped you, we kissed your toes, we licked them and you still fool us like this?"

That was obviously a bad move.

"I think my slave needs to learn a TINY lesson."

Kate watched frightfully as the remote was now pointed at her. Jenn was absolutely crazy and just screamed "NO! Please, don't! I don't want to be any smaller! My goddess, don't do this to me, please! Kate, let me go!"

But it was too late. Before she knew it, Kate became as small as Jenn. Or, should I saw, as small as Jenn was. Jenn was so frightened she couldn't even open her eyes. She had now become the size of a bug to someone the size of a flea to her unspeakingly huge goddess.
15511211121111111121.title: Smaller worshippers

choices: Amber picks up the piece of paper they are on
155112111211111111211.content:
Jenn still to afraid to open her eyes just remains within the grasp of her younger yet bigger sister Katie. All she could hear was Katie screaming for dear life, her ears feeling like they are going to pop from Kate’s High pitch screams. This worried her least when she heard the deepened voice of Amber reigning down onto her ears.

"Maybe that will teach you my little slave to speak out of place to you Goddess. Now how about you come here and show your appreciation."

Kate not wanting to make her "Goddess" any angrier at being shrunk even more starts making her way across the very paper she was on. though before she could even get a 1/16 of an inch across it though, Amber stomps her Right Foot down next to it. Kate along with Jenn fly across it and land on the edge of it.

"You know though you two, i don't think your worthy to even worship such a glorious Goddess such as myself. You had you chance and what did you do? You turned it down. I should just squish you now!"

With that said Amber brings her foot up and over the piece of paper with the two sisters on it. Her foot hanging over the small flea sized speck that was Kate, and the bug sized girl that was in her hands. Lucky for them however Amber wasn't ready to part them from this world.

"I think i know what to do now."

Amber looks down at them evilly her fingers stroking the size remote.
155112111211111111211.title: Worship Denied

choices: The plan goes without a hitch
Someone interrupts Jenn and Kate's housewarming
1551121112111111112111.content:
"Now, let's see..." Amber said with a grin, bending down. Her gigantic fingers clutched the end of the single peice of paper that had become a huge new world for the miniaturised girls. Kate began to cry through her tightly shut eyes, realising that a girl she had once called friend had reduced her to something unrecognisable, so insignifigant that words couldn't express it. The concept of the change of thier relationship was something Kate could barely get her head around; Amber, her once best friend, was now some sort of deity and she was....a speck? A mote? Kate felt her heart race faster as she realised once again how easily her former best friend could simply end her life, not that she hadn't already.

Kate's eyes opened when she realised that Amber WAS her life now.

The paper landscape was lifted into the air, slightly curling around them until they were at the base of a funnel like shape, barely keeping thier tenative purchase on the slippery ground. Above them, Amber's beautiful face, framed to perfection by her long golden hair, was smirking with satisfaction. The world they now exsisted on was held precariously in her hands, and with the simplest of movements, she could crush them and thier world in her fist. Finally, the paper earth straightened in the air, with the sides of the paper making walls around them. Amber sat in a chair and crossed her right leg over her left and began to bob her foot up and down, looking down on her two creations.

"Y'know, I can't get over this...I'm a Goddess now. A real life Goddess. I created you, I control your whole world, your life...say it to yourselves, now." Amber commanded, lowering her face down to peer at the tiny creatures. Jenn and Kate both repeated the words, though Kate knew her Goddess couldn't see it. Despite herself, Kate began to pray to Amber, whispering her benedictions and pleas to the focus of her new religion. For millenia people prayed to Gods they couldn't see, but Amber was right there before her, weilding ultimate power....not only over Kate, but potentially over everyone, now she had full control of the remote. Amber smiled at Jenn's screaming of the words back at her, telling Amber she controlled everything about her. Amber bent forward at the waist, holding the paper out before her. "Here's what I'm going to do, my little shrinkees...I'm going to let you live, because I am a merciful God. I'm going to give you a new home, and everyday if you want to live you'll have to pray and have faith in your new Goddess. All you'll know if your new world...my toe." The paper world curled further, gently, forming a tunnel for the tiny girls. Amber placed the end of the tunnel upon Jenn's desk and slowly but gently tilted it forward until she saw the tiny flea-sized Jenn fall onto the desk. Amber leaned back and, with a sudden and terrifying movement, slipped her foot from Jenn's thick black sandal and slammed her foot upon the table. Jenn quivered in fear before the mountainous toes. "Flea," Amber said, grinning at the image in her head of the once powerful Jenn actually answering to that name, her tiny head lifting at the sound of a sixteen year old rival's voice...and then grinning wider at the idea of Jenn being HAPPY to hear it, once she'd adjusted.... "Flea, put speck down....right under the toenail of my middle toe." Jenn looked down at her sister and then back at Amber, and did as she was told. Amber peered around her perfect leg, down to her beautiful foot, and smiled when she saw her wishes being obeyed, "Good girl. Speck, welcome to heaven. Make yourself at home....you're going to be there for the rest of your life. Now, Flea...hold still." Amber pointed the remote at Jenn. Jenn shivered again, fighting back tears, "No...get on all fours. I want you to grovel as I shrink you. In fact, beg me to do it. Tell me you want me to shrink you and make you live under my toenail. Grovel and pray. Pray to your Goddess to grant your fondest wish; being toenail fungus. Tell me you've always wanted it, and always dreamed of it! Your fantasy is to be my slave, living helplessly under my toenail....always under MY toenail." Amber placed a hand on the table, palm up. Jenn crawled into it on all fours and gasped as Amber lifted her to her enormous ear.

"Please, Goddess Amber! I beg you, my Goddess, to shrink me to the size of a speck and let me live under your toenail! I've dreamed of it ever since you first came over to visit us, ever since you were twelve and met Kate, I've always fantasised about being tiny and subjucated by you. I'd look at your toes and wish I could live there..I used to wish I'd die, because I knew that's where heaven was!" Jenn started to cry, feeling horrible and useless, "I..." she sobbed...."I...used to look at your sandals closely when you slept over! I'd wish I could be them! I'd pick out spots I'd visit when I lived on your toe! I've dreamed of this for years, so please oh please make me your fungus-girl! I pray in your name, my Goddess!" Jenn broke down and sobbed and Amber laughed loudly, having barely contained her laughter during jenn's performance.

"Awww, Flea....I would have let you worship me before! Maybe I coudn't grant your prayers the way I can now..." She laughed, "Okay, Flea...since you asked so nicely...bow down before my gigantic foot, the object of your dreams and wishes, and wait for me to shrink you. Then, when you're done, I'm going to stand up, turn around and placed my foot so the sole is facing up. When it's like that, you grab my toe and Speck will help you up." Jenn groveled and whimpered, agreeing.
1551121112111111112111.title: Humiliation to the extreme

choices: Follow Jenn and Kate's struggle for survival
15511211121111111121111.content:
Amber placed Jenn on the table, and Jenn assumed the position again, kissing Amber's beautiful foot once more for good measure. It was admittedly lovely, especially to Jenn's rapidly deteriorating mind, and she realised that maybe it wouldn't be so bad to forget about her life and live as Amber's toemite. Maybe she'd come to love it there. Amber grinned and stood up, watching Jenn closely as she could, and nearly screamed with laughter at the fact that Jenn was obeying her still, groveling before her divine power. "Okay, Flea...almost to heaven!" Amber pointed the remote and pressed the minur button. Jenn shrank rapidly, almost completley invivisible to her eye. Amber balanced on the chair, taking her eyes from her worshipper, and rolled her foot, sole up. She looked back over her shoulder. "Okay, climb aboard!" Amber cried. She shut her eyes, imagining Jenn's trek up, climbing over the summit of her overturned toenail, to where her sister would be waiting, completley disoriented by the movement of her new world. Amber shivered at the thrill, imagining what thier life would be like, living on her foot, like parasites. Only hearing her voice as she went about her life, only experiencing the foul air when she went jogging, drinking her foot sweat and eating toejam. She grinned wider at the idea of shrinking food down and placing it under her toenail for them....thier only hope of water was when she showered, maybe she'd shrink a bucket sometime so they could keep water stored, always after it washed away dirt and grime from her day, wishing they could bathe, but only having dirty Amber-foot water to use.....oh, it was amazing. Maybe she'd shrink a camera down so they could record thier activities, so she could see thier lives and how they suffered living in toe-world. Realising how long she'd spent fantasising, she turned around, gently moving the foot for what would probably be the last time, and sat down, peering down at her foot. She pulled her foot back to her lap and looked down at her middle toe, and peered closely at the nail.
"Eww," she laughed, "I think I have some dirt or something down there! Hahahaha!" She laughed, "Seriously, though, I better never have to clean that nail. Okay, pets, here's the deal. To test your faith, your Goddess will not feed you or even pay attention to you for three days. In that three days you will need to learn to survive on your own, praying daily for my intervention. Keep your home clean! Now, Flea...I know you'd want me to have them, so I'm taking a bunch of your clothes, and Speck...well, I'm gonna help myself to some of your stuff, too. Maybe someday I'll shrink some of your stuff so you can have them....just think, your lives led to this! You were born to live under my toenail. You guys are soooooo pathetic, and I am soooo amazing! You think about that daily. Your destiny was this moment, this life." Amber laughed and placed her foot on the floor, and slipped it back into her new sandal. Standing up, she stretched, picked up the remote and began to shrink Jenn and Kate's things, placing them in her purse, and went home.
15511211121111111121111.title: Homecoming

choices: Amber should learn the remote's functions first
155112111211111111211112.content:
Amber returns to her home with a newfound bounce in her step. She'd been confident before, but this new feeling is just... uncanny. She'd always had that feeling that she was better than the other girls: better looking, more charismatic, and so much better dressed. This is different. This is power--the power to control whatever or whoever she wished. And as she hangs up Jenn's clothes in her closet, she feels like she can almost hear the little prayers of her microscopic worshippers, trapped forever in the heavenly bliss of her body. She wants there to be more voices.

But first, the remote. She looks over it carefully, observing the numerous buttons and functions on it. She's not sure how most of them work, and it may be worthwhile to test them out in private before heading out to gather more followers. On the other hand, her desire for ultimate power beckons. She imagines Jenn and Kate... no... Flea and Speck once more, cowering before her, so tiny and helpless before her. She's figured the remote out, after all; why not head out now?

1551121112111111112111121.content:
For most of the evening, Amber stays in her room, experimenting with the remote's functions. She quickly learns how to control the resulting size, shrinking things along a variety of ranges. One of Jenn's outfits shrinks just about half an inch, and she then decides to shrink it out of existence altogether. She learns to control the rate of shrinking as well--to slow down the shrinking process over the course of a few seconds, a few minutes, even as much as a month. The thought of watching her snooty classmates slowly dwindle away to nothing at school excites her so much that she can't contain herselves.

The bitches have it coming, after all. Amber knew that if she ever told them the truth--that she was actually 19 and lied about her age in order to conceal her years of failure as an elementary school student--she'd be laughed out of the school. A 19-year-old junior in high school? She should've gotten her GED by now, unless she was some kind of moron. Some kind of moron, of course, raised by an alcoholic mom and an asshole dad. Some kind of moron who still played the petty high school popularity game instead of moving on with her life. That's what they'd say. That's what they'd say even as she watched them become smaller and smaller, their attempts to make her feel small now thrown back in their faces as she grew more and more huge before them...

The remote can make things larger, too, of course, much in the same way it can make things smaller. She plays around with the percentage height adjustment for a bit without firing... a 50% increase in height...100%... 1,000%.... 10,000%... 1,000,000%... 9,999,999,999%? How huge could this thing make her?

She decides not to think about it. Becoming that much bigger had its own dangers, and there's something about seeing people shrink that fills her with so much more power. It's one thing to control her own fate; it's quite another to have that same control over someone else.

By the time she figures out the remote's function, evening has begun to fall. It's one of those cool August Fridays that's made for a little fun, especially with a size-controlling remote in hand. Opening her closet, she pulls out two outfits. In one hand she holds a barely-there bikini. She thinks about the beach: usually on these nights, there are a few parties down there, probably a few of the sluts from school with their undeserved hardbody boyfriends. It might be worth cutting a few of them down to size.

In her other hand is something less revealing but no less alluring: a short, low-cut dress. On a night like this, a goddess like her might want a couple of drinks. It's not like the bartender could turn her away, after all.

Hammerin' Hank is glad to see the place jumping on a Friday night, with fifteen patrons all scattered throughout the smoky Red Sky bar. The lady at the bar smiles at him as she cracks open a peanut and stuffs it into the corner of her mouth, running her tongue over it. There's energy there--not the sort of person Hank is used to seeing. She's sexy in a small-town way.

When the door swings open a second later, though, he suddenly thinks she's the plainest Jane there is.

The lady who walks in a second later is stunning--no, not stunning, but mesmerizing. Her legs are so long they defy local zoning laws, and they shake those hips as she walks with a confidence normally reserved for the gods. He can only see the smile on her face for a second before he's drawn to those amazing tits, her dress leaving little to the imagination. She's just a shade under six feet tall and brilliant, and she sits at a bar stool across from Hank, messing with her purse.

"Strawberry daiquiri," Amber says.

Hank stammers, his eyes still transfixed on those tits. "...guhuh?"

Amber snickers; it's just as good as she'd hoped. She leans forward a bit, letting her breasts spill over the countertop as she leans toward Hank, licking every syllable. "Strawberry daiquiri, big boy."

Hank finally shakes his head and snaps out of his stupor. "No problem," he snickers, returning to the drinks behind him. "Of course, I'm gonna need to see some ID."

"I'm 19," Amber says bluntly. Hank, just as suddenly, stops pouring.

"...well, kid, I'm sorry, but I ain't supposed to sell ya booze if you ain't 21," he says. "I'd like ta, but I'd have the cops in here in no time, an' I can't afford no fines right now!"

Amber sighs, reaching into her purse. She produces a compact and stares into the mirror. "That's a stupid law," she says. "The goddess Amber hereby relieves you of your obligation to that law. Make me a strawberry daiquiri." She returns her compact to her purse again, then begins digging for something else.

"Goddess Amber?" Hank laughs, and the redhead begins laughing with him. "Listen, lady, I don't know who you think you are, but I gotta obey the law! You can't just come in here an'--"

Hank doesn't even finish his sentence before Amber slides the remote out of her purse, fiddles with the controls, and fires.

Hank is in awe at what he sees a minute later. He feels like he's on the floor, staring up at the huge bar rising over him, the bottles of beer and liquor stretching out above. It's only when he realizes that he's standing up that he panics at the sight of his own monolithic bar. He suddenly realizes the truth: he's only the size of a bug!

A moment later, the wooden floor begins to shake, knocking Hank onto his back. He stares upward as two massive flesh-colored towers settle above him, held up by two black pumps that would be sexy at normal size but rise like buildings to Hank now. The legs disappear beneath a short black skirt, and above, the goddess Amber's exquisitely painted pink fingernails are dropping, each one larger than Hank's entire body. And before the bartender can even get to his feet, the fingernails close around him, pulling him into the air with impossible speed by the back of his shirt. Not one second later, he's dangling in front of that huge face, watching the goddess Amber slowly lick her lips as she stares at her tiny prey.

At first I was scared, but I started to notice the way people were running from me, getting smaller and smaller when I grew so big I busted out of the school building. The strangest thing was that it almost made me really, really horny, and the bigger I got, the worse it got, until I finally smashed the entire town with my feet before I woke up. I was wet when I woke up, too. I mean, isn't that fucked up?"

Her first instinct is to cower, but something about the experience doesn't make her afraid. Amber's breath is heavy and slow, and her gaze is strange. Before the visage of her goddess Jenn feels herself returning to that dream again, filled with the power overflowing through her until she could burst. She looks down to find that her bikini bottom is starting to be wet, but strangely, she doesn't feel embarassed.

Something new is happening.

1551121112111122.content:
"Now..." Amber says with a huge smile. "Let's see what I can do about making that dream come true."

Before either girl can so much as blink, Amber picks up Jenn and Kate in one hand. She looks around the room for something, finally settling on a tall empty souvenier glass. She scrutinizes it carefully, then lays it on the table, cupping her other hand over it.

"Kate," she says. "Kate, help your little sister into the glass. If she gets hurt or lost, I'm going to find a snake to feed you to." Kate gasps, clutching her sister firmly into her hand as Amber tilts her palm. She slides into the glass, down the side, and settles into the bottom, and Amber is pleased to see that she's not nearly tall enough to climb out the side.

It isn't long before the girls feel the glass lift into the air once again, and Kate clutches Jenn firmly to her chest. The glass comes to rest on a high shelf, and the girls here something dropping on either side.

"Just to be safe, I'm propping your little prison up with some books," she says, her voice seemingly coming from below the girls. "And on top of that, you're very, very high up now. I wouldn't try to tip this glass unless you're ready for a long fall. Now, you both wait here for a few minutes. Your goddess has some very important preparations to make, but She will return soon!"

The girls stand still as Amber's huge footsteps shake the room for a moment, and the slamming of the bedroom door suggests her departure--presumably, with the remote.

Kate pulls Jenn away from her chest and leans back against the side of the glass, being careful to keep it upright. "Jenn," she says, "what the fuck?"

Jenn looks down, seemingly embarassed. "I... I don't know what to say," she squeaks. "It was so strange... I-I never thought anyone'd read that."

"It's okay," Kate says, running her hand through her tiny big sister's hair. "Besides, it looks like you're gonna get your wish."

"I know," Jenn says. "And I'll tell you this: the first second I'm bigger than her, I'm gonna smash that bitch's head in." She punches one palm with her fist, then nods, looking up at Kate.

Kate, however, looks aghast. "Smash... the goddess?" She gasps, almost as if she can't believe she had just said that. Jenn places her hands on her hips and stomps her feet.

"Oh, come on, Kate!" she shouts. "You don't really believe her when she says she's a goddess, do you? I mean, sure, she's got that remote, but it's not like she has any power of her own!"

"I just don't know..." Kate says slowly. "It's scary, Jenn, seeing how much control she has over us. I mean, we're up here in the glass I bought you in Winnipeg, on the top of your bookshelf, and we can't go anywhere. Even when she's not around, she controls everything about us."

"Stop it," Jenn says. "Stop it now. You can't let her do this to your mind."

"And what if she makes us smaller?" Kate asks. "What if she makes everyone in town tiny like us and takes us all up to her room to live out the rest of our lives? Or what if she starts making herself so big that there's no weapons on Earth that can stop her?"

"Stop it!" Jenn shouts. "She's just a fucking teenager, okay? She doesn't have that kind of power! We'll find a way to stop her!"

Kate looks down at Jenn, tears welling up in her eyes. In a few minutes (hours? days? That is for the goddess to decide), Amber will be back. If she's serious, she'll make Jenn grow bigger, letting her older sister run rampant throughout the world. Why? Kate can't tell, but she knows that whatever Amber does will be for her own glory.

And yet... Jenn is standing before her, small enough to fit inside her hand.

Maybe there is a way.
1551121112111122.title: Control

15511211121111222.content:
Kate slides backward and onto the floor of the glass, leaning against the wall. "No use doing anything now," she says, closing her eyes. Jenn, sensing that there's even less she can do at her near-microscopic size, curls up in Jenn's open palm. It isn't long before both girls are asleep.

---

"Do you love your sister?"

The booming voice of Amber is enough to rattle both tiny girls awake. They look up to find Amber's huge face, fully made up with dark purple eyeshadow and bright red lipstick, staring down at them. Kate rubs her eyes slowly.

"Wh-what?"

"Not you." She reaches her finger into the glass and points one long, painted nail at Jenn. "You. Speck of dust. Do you love your sister?"

Jenn pulls herself to her feet, looking up at Kate, then up past Kate into Amber's goddess-like visage. "Yeah," she says--then, as if to make sure she's noticed, does an exaggerrated nod.

Amber smiles. "Then this is gonna break your heart."

With two huge fingers, Amber reaches into the glass and grabs Kate by the hair, pulling her out. She instinctively shrieks and grabs hold, throwing Jenn for a loop, although the tiny girl is able to hold on, securing herself on Amber's hair. Amber holds the shrieking Kate up in front of her face, smiling sweetly.

"Now, be honest," she says, motioning down to herself. Kate points her eyes downward to see that Amber is wearing a form-fitting red spaghetti strap dress, her breasts rising and falling with anticipation (although she can't see much past them). She tries to force herself to nod, but the tension of being held by both Amber and gravity forces her to reconsider.

"Yes!" she shouts.

"Yes... what?"

"Yes, my goddess Amber, you are truly splendorous in your--your beauty in every way!" Kate screams. "I... I feel that I, your worthless servant, am as nothing before your size, your beauty, and your power. My goddess, please, spare me! Spare m-m-my worthless... pitiful... life..."

"Kate, no!" Jenn screams, climbing on top of Kate's head from her hand.

Amber, meanwhile, grins mischievously, holding out a fingernail toward Kate's head. "Speck of dust, climb onto me," she says, "or I'll crush her head and you."

With tears in her eyes, Jenn carefully maneuvers across Kate's head, then climbs onto the fingernail. As she's lifted away from Kate, she sees the terror in her sister's eyes, the tears streaming down her face. She knows, however, that she's just as helpless as she is... perhaps even more so at her size. But for how long?

"Good," Amber says. She bends over slowly and carefully, keeping Jenn balanced on her fingernail as she stoops down. A plastic insect cage lies at her feet, and she drops Kate inside, letting her fall onto her ass. Then, Amber moves Jenn and her fingernail toward the insect cage. "Look inside. I want you to see what I've been doing."

As Jenn moves into position, she presses her hands against the glass wall of the cage, aghast. There are dozens of people inside the glass cage, and she knows each and every one of them. Four friends from school. Her boyfriend Tom. Her mother, father, and grandparents. Her aunt Gina and uncle Mark. And, perhaps most terrifyingly of all, her two cousins, Lily and Connor. Lily is only five years old and crying into her father's chest; Connor is a toddler and barely walking.

They're all the size of insects.

"YOU BITCH!" Jenn screams, turning to Amber. "WHY!? WHAT THE FUCK DID THEY DO!?"

"It's funny," Amber says with a smirk. "You know you're too small for me to hear you, and yet you still make those noises." Amber closes the lid on the cage as Jenn and Kate's parents run to Kate's side, hugging her as they stare up in wide-eyed terror at Amber. Amber pulls Jenn up toward her face, staring daggers into her. Jenn, however, is nearly hysterical, crying and screaming at the top of her lungs. It's a bad dream. It has to be a bad dream. It has to be.

"Now," Amber says, "you are casting aside the petty relationships of your mortal life. You are no longer a human being. At this moment, you are a speck of dust, but soon, your goddess will transform you again. You will become my avatar of destruction, the engine by which I exact my will upon the world. You will be my slave, and in return, I will give you the power to destroy. You will do nothing unless you are told, and you will not so much as lift a finger in protest. If I am not satisfied with your obedience... well..."

She picks up the insect cage with her other hand and holds it toward Jenn. She sees again her family and friends--giants to her, mere insects to Amber. The goddess.

"...you will not be the only one punished."

Amber lays the insect cage on a table, then sets Jenn in front of it. From her purse, she produces the remote yet again.

"Don't worry, speck of dust," Amber says with a smile. "You told me about your dream. It means that even though you tried to be a human being on the outside, on the inside you've always been a monster. I, your goddess, am just transforming you into your real form. And when I do so, you will thank me."

Jenn is numb. The whole experience washes over her like waves on the beach, yet she can say or do nothing. She had planned to smash Amber's head in the first chance she got, but behind her, her loved ones cower like the bugs they have become. She hadn't anticipated Amber strategizing like this. She had underestimated her. A goddess always has contingencies.

She sighs and looks up again at Amber aiming the remote. She gets to live out her dream, at least. And besides, it's not like being a speck of dust was pleasant anyway. At least monsters matter.

More than that, though, she loved the hunt, to pursue a helpless little person, to trap him, to hold him before her face, to hear his pleas, to see that tiny erection forming in his pants as he stared at her incredible chest, her perfect face, the smooth and voluptuous curves of her gigantic body. He wanted to be inside her... and she wanted him inside her. It was a mutual lust, but Jenn only allowed herself--and her goddess--to be satisfied.

She was becoming a monster, and she loved it.

"You know," Amber said, moving her fingertip upward to Jenn's chest. The enormous finger--all of it--suddenly pressed against Jenn's whole body, and she gasped as those searching fingers circled around her tiny nipples. "I have a secret to tell you. I'm 19 years old. I've been held back in school for four years, wishing that I could tell the seniors like you so that you'd feel safe longing for my beautiful body... the same way I longed for yours. 18 years old. Mature." She moved her hand slowly to her face, licking her lips.

"You told me about your dream, Jenn," Amber continues. "My dream is you. Do you know how long I've wanted to feel those undulating curves of yours? How long I've wanted to taste..." She creeps her tongue across Jenn's chest, and she gasps, then moans softly. "...that flesh? Why do you think I hung around Kate for so long? I was trying to get close to you..." She moves her face closer to Jenn, who stares up into her enormous eye, her chest heaving with her rapid breaths. "...the tall, long-legged woman with the perfect figure."

She pinned Jenn down against her hand, her hot breath steaming across her flat stomach. Amber's tongue curled between Jenn's legs, gently probing every hot spot at once.

"And now, I have you..."

She licked again. Jenn shivered, digging her fingernails deep into her goddess's enormous palm.

"That perfect body in the palm of my hand..."

She licked again, then whispered, the warmth of her breath sending ripples of erotic ecstasy down Jenn's entire body.

"...forever."

She withdrew, and Jenn found herself unable to move, shivering, wide-eyed, her hands suddenly back on her breasts. Her perfect body absolutely ached to be filled, to feel every supple curve caressed, to feel the warmth of flesh slide between her legs. Less than an hour ago, she longed only for the touch of a man. Now? Now she understood that she was different. A man was a different species.

She was unique, and only the touch of her goddess could satisfy her.

Amber smiled as she lay Jenn down in a shoebox she'd placed on the table, in a bed of tissue and a handkerchief she'd created, watching as her creation's mind drifted away, as the urge to sleep overpowered her. She had broken Jenn. She was no longer a person. She was a monster.

And tomorrow, she would continue her evolution.
