1551121112111122211122.content:
"Ugh," Darcy said, rubbing her forehead as she pulled herself up. She had been out cold for some time, she was sure of it, but she had no idea how long. A fear struck her for just a moment, but when she looked down at her body, she saw that she was still wearing her cheerleader uniform and wasn't really hurt. Except her head. Always her head.

"The hell is going on?" she asked no one in particular as she stood up. Her vision was still blurry, but she was somewhere... vast. She didn't know where. The surface beneath her was soft and white, thatched with a pattern that looked like bamboo. Something registered in the back of her brain, but she couldn't quite place it. As she pulled herself together, she saw that the surface stretched out for hundreds of feet before giving way to... what was that? Hills?

"I swear to God, when I find those other girls, I'm kicking them all off the squad," she muttered. "MIKI? TINA?" Her voice echoed throughout the area, but no one answered. "Damn it," she muttered, and she set off toward that weird blue hill in the distance. She looked in the sky for the sun, something, anything to help her find her sense of direction, but everything was so blurry. She couldn't even find the blue of the sky. Everything was... brown.

But when she hit the hills, something registered in her at last. She saw that the blue surface was marked with white, rising in the shape of a cursive A. She looked down at her own uniform and saw the same pattern.

And when she climbed the rightmost hill, she found herself staring down over the top of Tina's incredible chest, looking down as her fellow squad member--hundreds of feet tall--slowly regained consciousness.

She did the only thing that came natural.

She screamed her tiny little head off.

---

"Holy shit!" Tina said. Darcy was standing on her boob, just a couple inches tall! "Darcy, calm down! It's okay!" She looked around, noticing a huge brown sky that stretched far over her head. She scooped Darcy off of her chest and sat up, the itty-bitty squad captain still shrieking at the top of her lungs.

"Don't eat me!" Darcy screamed, the first intelligible words to come out of this garble.

"I'm not going to eat you, dumbass! Calm down!" Tina yelled. "Where are we? And how did you get so small?"

"I didn't get small!" Darcy countered. "You got big! Look at you with your--your giant ass and your... your..."

Just then, the ground beneath both of them began to shake. Tina held on to Darcy tight as the ground beneath her started to shift, slanting downward. She found herself suddenly falling, screaming along with Darcy as they both fell further and further, at last landing on a soft, pink surface.

"Oh, God..." Darcy muttered. "Where are we?"

Tina looked around. It was obvious. There were lines in the pink surface. There were fingers.

It was a massive hand, rising higher and higher.

---

"Wow!" Miki shouted, looking down at the tiny Tina who stood in her hand. "You're so... so little, Tina!"

"Oh, God damn it..." Tina muttered. "Darcy, stay calm, it's okay, it's just Miki."

"Darcy? Where's Darcy?" Miki asked. "Where are we?"

---

Darcy could hardly believe it. She was the size of a bug to Tina, who was the size of a bug to Miki. Two-thirds of the Aberdeen High School Cheerleading Squad Seniors had been shrunken down by... who? The third one? It couldn't have been Miki. But the curvaceous cutie filled the sky above Darcy's head, her every word like thunder. Though she and Tina were hashing things out, Darcy was too terrified to even pay attention. She could only look around, surveying the huge brown sky overhead, trying to figure out what it meant as the two giants who held her planned their next move.

But it was Darcy who first saw it overhead.

At first, it just seemed that the distant brown sky was being blotted out. But soon, she could see a shape to it. Blue, wide, framed with long brown strands of...

...a face.

A colossal face.

A face that made even the goddess Miki look like a puny ant.

Darcy shrieked and screamed and hollered and howled in abject terror even more when she realized whom the face belonged to.

It was Jenn Hoffman, the girl who'd quit the squad a year ago.

She was thousands of miles tall.

And she was roaring.
1551121112111122211122.title: Russian Nesting Cheerleaders

choices: Amber somehow manages to find Darcy
The tiny Darcy stows along as Jenn and Amber take their reign of terror public
15511211121111222111222.content:
Darcy couldn't even find the strength to scream as the monstrous Jenn scooped up the group in her hand. She couldn't even fathom the scale of it all. Something that... that huge moved so quickly, with such ferocity. She didn't feel like prey. She felt like a speck of dust. She felt like nothing. She gaped up at the sky, watching as the two gigantic cheerleaders who held her shrieked for their lives.

As Jenn held them up, Darcy found herself slipping from Tina's grasp. She didn't even try to hold on; she just slipped and fell forever, the vastness of even an inch of space swallowing her infinitesimal body up...

---

Jenn glared down at her tiny captive and couldn't help but smile. A cheerleader, no bigger than a bread crumb. She moved close and squinted and could barely make out the dark hair and curvaceous shape of Miki Chandler, and she could barely hear her high-pitched shriek.

The Goddess had left her this bounty in the food bowl of her room some time while she slept. It wouldn't fill her up, but it would do something better.

It would make her bigger.

Without waiting another moment, she greedily stuffed her hand in her mouth, snatching Miki up with her tongue. She felt the now-familiar salty taste and swirled the impossibly tiny girl around inside of her mouth for as long as she could take it, She reveled in her power--even at her tiny size, Miki was completely at her mercy. Powerless. Helpless.

And she delighted as she swallowed her little body whole.

A warmth came over her, a familiar sensation she'd felt before. She looked at her hands, down at her perfect body, and found that it was glowing white. Somehow, her Goddess had found a way to insert the growth element into the food she ate! With a smile on her face, she ran her hands over her body, watching as the tiny shoebox home in which she lived got smaller and smaller, waiting for the right moment to burst the shoebox lid open.

---

Darcy was on her breasts. She was sure of it. The surface was incredibly vast but had a gentle curve, and in the distance was a tall brown leather wall that seemed to match the tiny (relatively speaking) outfit that Jenn had been wearing. High in the sky above her head, Jenn licked her hand clean. Darcy couldn't even cry; she was so small, so insignificant, that she was numb to the fact that Jenn had eaten her friends. Of course she had. That's what monsters do.

But yet--even as a white glow diffused from Jenn's body--something was going through Darcy's mind. It wasn't Jenn who had shrunk her. It was... that new girl. The blonde. The sophomore who'd been held back at her other school. She'd walked onto the seniors at lunch and had fired... what was it? A gun? Something had knocked them unconscious.

Darcy was so lost in her thoughts that she didn't even notice that Jenn was growing, but she did notice when the sky above her suddenly bent upward, flooding the home with light.

And there she was. High overhead, higher overhead than even Jenn was. Thousands of miles of leg disappeared into a red skirt that was barely hip-high, a red blouse that embraced her curves, hands the size of asteroids clutching onto... what, a remote control? An incredibly beautiful face, blonde hair framing it, an imperious smirk marking it as it looked down at Jenn.

From inside a living room.

Suddenly, the scale of the matter flooded Darcy's mind. Jenn wasn't huge; she was small herself. This girl--Amber Hart, she suddenly realized--was normal-sized, and that remote let her control sizes. She had shrunk the cheerleaders and fed them to Jenn... her pet.

She couldn't get over it. Jenn Hoffman, the hottest girl in school, reduced to a mere pet who ate shrunken people at the behest of someone else. An entire cheerleading squad transformed into a meal.

Jenn wasn't a goddess. Jenn was a servant. Amber was all-powerful, and she knew it. Nothing could stop her.

And Darcy closed her eyes, dropped to her knees, and prayed. She prayed for mercy. She prayed that her new Goddess would spare her, would let her live out the rest of her life as this tiny creature. She prayed because she knew there was no way of getting back to her normal size, and she only hoped the omnipotent Amber would find it in Her heart to spare her.

Pretty, popular girls like her didn't have to be concerned with how things like this worked, only about the results. If it worked, that's all she needed to know.

She did however, want to know what else this remote could do. She knew it could shrink people, and Amber had gotten very good at that. All she had to do was get to the science club at the school that met after hours and make them figure it out. Deciding that it was the best course of action, Amber got up from the couch and gathered her things, including the remote, and headed over to the front door where she'd kicked off her shoes. After slipping the other shoe on as well, she tied the strings just enough for the shoes to stay on her feet, and headed for the school again.

Jenn had spent the last several hours desperately trying to escape the giant teenager's shoe. After being kidnapped and attacked by the girl's pretty little toes, thrown about inside the shoe as the massive teen walked, and finally held prisoner inside the empty shoe without food or water, Jenn's spirit had been all but broken. She'd even fallen asleep for a while after wearing herself out in her attempts to climb up to freedom.

A large chunk of her time inside the shoe had been spent trying to convince herself to stay alive, and not just let Amber's foot kill her when it returned. She'd even been debating on whether her death would come more quickly by sitting where the ball of Amber's foot rested, or at the heel of the shoe. Jenn's heart began to beat faster, she wasn't at the heel of the shoe yet, but she was pretty far from where the ball of Amber's foot would rest. Getting on her hands and knees, now in tears and crying loudly (to her), the tiny Jenn crawled towards the heel of the shoe, hoping to reach it before Amber's foot did.

"Hi, Amber!" Kate said with a smile.

"I was about to go...way to take, like, six hours to answer your door." Amber said. Kate shrugged.

"Sorry, I didn't hear it until the last second...uh, wanna come in?" Kate asked, smiling her pretty smile.

"Whatever." Amber said, stepping past Kate rudely. Kate was used to this behavior, and it didn't bother her much. The pair were usually very close, but neither mistook the other for an equal. Kate, having watched her sister for years, knew what popularity was. One girl was the most beautiful, the most powerful, and that was Amber. She took stock of what had happened. She was certain she hadn't accidentally used the remote on herself; otherwise, she would be getting smaller, not bigger...

With her expanded size, the writing seemed to be growing even smaller, so she squinted to read it before it was too late.

(WARNING: Do not consume foodstuffs reduced or increased in size by this product. Any item affected by this product should be considered contaminated with radiation until at least one full hour after the time of size alteration. Failure to wait for the radiation to subside may result in uncontrollable changes in size over an extended period of time.)

She shuddered a little bit when she read the word "foodstuffs." She hadn't consumed food; she had eaten her former best friend. On the other hand, she wasn't much more than food, was she? So tiny, like a granule of sugar... she felt goosebumps all over her body as she imagined the power she'd had over her friend...

She was shocked back to reality as her head cracked against the ceiling. She suddenly looked around and found that she was beginning to outgrow her room... and then some. As Amber looked around, rising to her full height of at least 35 feet, she felt a number of feelings. Shame. Humiliation. Exposure. Power.

Carefully he stepped onto the massive tank like object and slowly crept along one of the veins. Eventually he came to the big toe. He watched as it slowly moved back and forth. Deciding that that was a quick way to die, he slid down to the floor. As he walked away from his wife, he felt a shake and watched his wife walk toward the kitchen. He was alone now.
15512211212112111122112121.title: Leaps and Jumps

155122112121121111221121211.content:
Against his senses, he quick ran after his titanic wife. He rounded the door frame and saw her on the phone.
“I don’t care if its too late just get the heck over here!” she said. She hung up and then moved toward him. Harold hid as she walked back to the spot where she had kissed him earlier. She sat down and began looking for something. Slowly he moved away as she crept closer. Suddenly the door rang and she stood up. He watched as she opened the door.
“What the heck is going…” a voice said.
“Shhhhh,” Shelly said as she grabbed the body and pulled it in. Harold quickly realized it was Maria Jones. She placed her in the middle of the foyer and stepped back a few paces. She pulled out the remote, fiddled with it, and aimed it at her.
“What are you doing,” Maria said right before the beam hit her. Harold slowly watched as she grew from a normal middle aged woman to something roughly the same as Shelly minus her bright red hair. Maria looked herself off in astonishment; she had never looked this good, ever.
“How did you….”
“I will explain in time,” Shelly said. “Go change into a pair of sweatpants and a t-shirt upstairs and then come back down. You have to help me find, Harold.”
“Find Harold, What happened to him?” Maria said, still admiring herself.
“He’s about a foot tall and I’m worried,” she said with a smile. Harold sensed the fake sincerity and shivered in fear.
“Ok,” she pranced up the steps and out of sight. Harold decided to do the same and hid next to the door. He felt the floor shake, and saw a giant hand suddenly swoop down and grab him.
155122112121121111221121211.title: Hunting Harold

1551221121211211112211212111.content:
Harold waited in the darkness for what seemed like an eternity. Suddenly light streamed in and Harold looked around wildly. He was in between two walls of women.

“Harold, you did a bad thing…” Shelly said.
Maria squealed “Isn’t he just the cutest little thing”. Her hand crept up to Harold and poked him. “This is really Harold?”
“Yep.” Shelly said. “You want him?”
“What do you mean?”

“I mean, you can have him and do as you wish.” Harold looked up at his wife with a scornful look. “In case you’re interested they taste like salmon.”

“Oooooo” she said. “I’ll take him”. Shelly tipped him into her hands. “Good bye Harold,” she said with a smile. Maria looked him over for a moment and then grabbed him and deposited him into her cleavage.

“Be careful, he’s a runner”, Harold heard Shelly said as he disappeared into the skin folds. From this point, Harold felt like he was a fish in warm water; he could breathe, but not move or see much of anything. He could however hear Maria as clear as day.
1551221121211211112211212111.title: Shelly Shares

15512211212112111122112121112.content:
Harold, extremely tired by his adventures thus far, decided that fate was going to take him wherever it wanted to, and gave up. He listened to one side of Maria and Shelly’s conversation for as long as he could before passing out from exhaustion.

He woke up some time later to what sounded like grunting and could hear Maria’s heart beat like a low drum. Confused, he waited until the beating subsided and then started poking Maria. She apparently paid no attention and Harold stopped eventually. As he tried to figure out what could have been going on, he felt movement above him. With the usual quickness, he felt a hand grab him and pull him out into the air. Barely seeing anything, Harold shaded his eyes and waited for them to adjust. Then he saw it, a pair of wide billboard sized lips. He waited for them to part, but nothing happened for a moment. Then they came forward and kissed him, covering his upper torso in lipstick. He felt bewildered and could feel the hand lower him. With a small drop he was deposited on a blanket. He looked around and knew that he wasn’t at home anymore.

“Did you have fun?” He heard a cooing voice say. Harold looked up and saw Maria hovering above him.
“Best hospitality I’ve had in ages.” Harold stretched and stood up. “Where am I?”
“Oh I brought you home.” She said. “I thought the news would be better that way.”
“What news?”
“Uh,” she paused, “Shelly does not really exist anymore.”

“She doesn’t exist,” Harold said. “Um?” Maria looked at him for a moment before miming her picking up something and depositing it in her mouth. Harold gulped and started backing up toward the edge of the bed. Before he got a literal foot away from her, Maria’s hand grabbed him, and he was once again faced with the lips.

“I’m not going to eat you,” she whispered. Harold kissed her hand and looked up to see a small flush of red fade from Maria’s face. “In fact, I wanted to talk about something that’s been on my mind since the day we met.”
“What’s up?”

“Well,” She fumbled for her words, “to put it bluntly, I have had a small school girl crush on you since you and Shelly moved in a while back, and since Shelly is indisposed,” she patted her stomach with a small sense of pride. “I was wondering if you would want marry me?”

“Maria, before I answer this question, do you have the remote?” Maria looked at him indigently before producing a small black remote. “Answer my question first.”
15512211212112111122112121112.title: Lipstick

155122112121121111221121211121.content:
Harold shook his head. Maria looked back at him and squeezed him a bit, “You’re not lying to me?”

Harold, whose back was now perfectly aligned for the first time since he was in college, stared right into her eyes. “Maria, look at it this way. Today alone my wife tried to eat me any point she had the chance. You thus far have kept me safe, warm, and,” he grabbed a bit of lipstick on his arm and pulled it off, “moderately clean. If that isn’t honest love, I don’t know what is.” Maria smiled and kissed him again, covering Harold with even more lipstick. “Thanks,” he said as she dropped him to the floor, aimed the remote at him and fired. After a moment of tingling, Harold lay normal sized at Maria’s feet. As he stood up, he noticed he felt like a new person. Then he noticed that Maria was still a foot taller then him and about the same curvy shape as his late wife.

“Problem?” she said as she pulled him closer and kissed him deeply. As she pulled away Harold looked into her eyes. “Nope.”

“Good,” They kissed again, this time Maria dropped the remote to the floor and crushed it into a pulp.
155122112121121111221121211121.title: Honest Love

155122112121121111221121211122.content:
“Uh”, said Harold as he looked for the right words after a day of playing mouse to various women. Maria’s eyes narrowed and her once light grip on Harold suddenly got tighter. He found it hard to breathe and even harder to speak. “Well,” she said,honestly not seeing that she was killing him. Harold tried to say something but he was feeling lightheaded. Within moments he was in a coma on her hand. She poked him and slowly realized that he was gone.

“Ah well,” she opened her mouth and brought Harold toward it. He passed by her teeth and within moments was only a memory. Maria breathed in and slowly her body shrunk back to its normal size and shape. She laid back on her bed and thought about the time it took to place the size remote on the bus in a place where Harold’s daughter, Jennifer, would have easily found it, how much time she had to spend with Shelly in order for to see if she was the right type that would respond well to the remote’s eat-n-grow side effects, and how much effort it took to fake the “missing daughter” emergency that got Harold home on time from work. She sighed and turned off the light, and within moments, was fast asleep.
155122112121121111221121211122.title: Uh...?

155122112121121111221121212.content:
He decided to wait till nightfall, get to the remote and hopefully fix himself. While it was a simple plan, he realized that he would have a long adventure to get upstairs. And he had better start now.

For the next few hours, he made his way slowly up the stairs, battling spiders and the family cat in the process. Eventually he made it to the top landing at about 8pm and to the master bedroom by 10pm. He stood in the door frame, weary and tired. Suddenly he felt the shudder of his titanic wife downstairs and bolted under a sewing box. He watched as his wife bounded into the room, dropped the remote onto a nightstand and began to disrobe. He watched in awe as her naked form slipped between the sheets and the light went out.
155122112121121111221121212.title: Waiting? Hardly

1551221121211211112211212121.content: Harold quickly made a dash for the nightstand and made it there within about 5-10 minutes. He shimmed up the stand and saw it there in the moonlight. He slowly looked it over, and eventually found the dial. Slowly he moved the dial to “normal”, each time it created a ticking noise. Setting a timer to two minutes, he quickly positioned it so that it would hit him. He then had an idea.
1551221121211211112211212121.title: Sprinter

15512211212112111122112121211.content:
Quickly he turned the dial back to “miniscule” and pushed the remote as fast as he could so that it would hit Shelly. Harold hopped over the side of the remote and bashed the red button. He watched as the beam hit Shelly. Nothing happened for a moment and then he watched as the mountain range dropped away to nothingness. He heard no screams, which meant that he had at least till morning to find her. He quickly redid the settings and within moments was sitting in the tatters of the beside table.

He quickly checked himself, and then he slowly lifted the sheets and found a tiny Shelly, still amazingly asleep. He quickly grabbed a toothbrush holder in the bathroom and scooped up the sleeping babe. Looking down he saw her stir and then realize that she was now as big as centipede. She began screaming in a pitch that Harold could not hear.

“Sorry Babe, it was you or me.” He said. He so wanted to restore her to her normal size and have a supermodel for a wife but he knew that she would lust after the remote more then him. He moved to the tap and turned it on. He watched her flail about for a few moments as the water rose and then disappear below the waterline. With a small flourish Harold tipped the glass into the sink. He then set about smashing the remote into a fine dust and then dropped those remains into the trash. Within minutes he was in bed asleep.
15512211212112111122112121211.title: Shrink Shelly

15512211212112111122112121212.content:
Harold shook off the idea and waited for the beam. Suddenly he heard something shift behind him and he felt a rush of wind followed by darkness. He heard a muffled giggle. “Nice try” Suddenly the floor fell out from under him and he realized that he was in Shelly’s mouth. Before he could scream, he was lifted toward the back and deposited into her throat.

************************************

Mmmmmm… Shelly still could not get enough of that feeling of a body as it fell down her throat. She shifted to find a comfortable position as her body grew a bit bigger. "I wounder who I should go after next," she thought as She fell back asleep; A wide smile on her face.
15512211212112111122112121212.title: Greed

1551221121211211112211212122.content:
Harold decided to wait a bit more, and make sure that Shelly was fast asleep before he went after the remote. What seemed like days later (but was only about an hour or so) he ran to the nightstand, got to the table top and set the remote to fix himself. “Oh thank god,” he said as the beam hit him. After crashing through the table, he grabbed the remote and stood up. In the darkness he couldn’t see much. Suddenly he felt a bit of sheet at a height he knew was not normal.

“Good work,” Shelly said and instantly the pair became interlocked in a wrestling match. Trying to remain level headed, Harold kept a hold of the remote, but could hear the dial on the remote tick as it kept turning. Suddenly a beam lit up the room and smacked straight into Shelly. At once she dropped him into the darkness, and went for the light. Harold blocked the light and stared at the silhouette of his wife. Suddenly she began to laugh. Harold looked down at the remote. It said “Giant”.

Staring at that for a moment, he missed his wife grow to the ceiling and the sounds of strain coming from the floor. With a sudden crash, Harold looked up to see an ever expanding torso, and bed sheet as it began to enclose the hole. Quickly he ran for the stairs, but just as he reached the door, he felt the house tip to the right, and watched as the lower floor of the house fell away, revealing a wide stretch of the neighborhood.
1551221121211211112211212122.title: Oh bother....

15512211212112111122112121222.content:
Harold stood very still for a moment and felt the house turn as Shelly did. He looked into the Master bedroom, and saw a white billing sheet covering two boulders. Suddenly he felt part of the house give way and looked up to see a hand, feeling around the remains of the master bedroom. He slowly kept toward the other side of the house, tip toeing over debris. He looked over the railing and could see a set of police cars at his wife’s feet, along with a small crowd. He stopped by his daughter’s room and watched the hand as it felt around. Suddenly he felt another crash, along with the door as it burst off its hinges. Her other hand was now just feet away from him. Slowly both hands snaked toward him, and Harold prayed that something would keep him safe. The door hand found him first and he watched as it grabbed him around the chest and rose through the ceiling toward Shelly. He felt in his pockets, but the remote was gone.

Somewhere below, a woman named Maria Jones watched as her best friend Shelly ripped through the remains of their two story home. Just as she pulled something from the wreckage around her massive chest, Maria saw something shiny fall and hit the ground only a few feet from her. Carefully walking over to get it, and not get squished by Shelly’s massive feet, Maria bent down and grabbed the object. It looked like a TV remote, but with a small dial on the one end. It was set to “Giant”. Looking back up at Shelly, she watched as she dropped something into her mouth and swallowed. With an echoing burp, Shelly smiled and then looked down at the people. Maria quickly twirled the dial and realized that this device was probably the thing that made her friend the way she was now.
15512211212112111122112121222.title: Cornered

155122112121121111221121212221.content: Maria took the remote, twirled the dial down to “miniscule” and fired. She watched as Shelly slowly faded out of sight and then dropped the remote to the ground and smashed it to tiny pieces. She knew she had forgotten about this one, and now everything was set ok. Walking slowly away she knew that growth technology was not quite ready for public consumption.
155122112121121111221121212221.title: Maria....

155122112121121111221121212222.content: Maria, never wanting to miss out on a good thing, quickly aimed the remote at herself, twirled the dial to “Giant” and fired. For a moment nothing happened, and then she felt the tingling sensation emanating from her body. She watched her newly sculpted leg and felt a sudden pain in her chest as it expanded. She watched as the world suddenly got smaller, and was thankful that somehow her ripped pants and shirt grew with her. When she stopped growing, she looked herself over, and then saw Shelly staring at her. For a moment neither woman spoke.
155122112121121111221121212222.title: showdown

1551221121211211112211212122222.content:
Shelly smiled, “Welcome to the club. Nice Shirt.” Maria smiled back. “Do you still have the remote?”

“Yes,” she handed Shelly the remote, which was now the size of a car.

“Is April Martins here?” Shelly asked the crowd by her feet. She waited a moment, and then a small mousy woman appeared out of the crowd. Aiming the remote at her the best she could, Shelly fired. Within minutes, the same mousy woman was now roughly the same size as both Maria and Shelly and looked 1000% more beautiful then she had when she was normal sized.

“Now what,” April asked as she looked down at the crowd. “I’m a bit hungry.”

“Have at it,” Shelly said. “Eating them may make you grow bigger.” With that both Maria and April bent over and took a big handful of people from the crowd, and dumped them into their mouths. Slowly they grew a bit bigger. Shelly was not the shortest by a head or so.

“Ladies…” She said. “Shortest one by morning is the loser.” And with that they began running after the crowd and slowly they destroyed the city, adding to the group of giants every so often. By morning there were about 10 of them, and they were all at least 150 feet in height. Over in the city park, Shelly sat licking her fingers. She looked around and smiled. Life was good.
1551221121211211112211212122222.title: The club

15512211212112111122112122.content:
Harold slid down the side of his wife’s stomach and whammed into the soft elastic lining. Digging beneath it, he found a draw string. As he estimated the distance from the floor he felt something above him. Looking up he saw Shelly’s hand just as it grabbed him. Feeling another fluid rush, he was brought up to Shelly’s face. She smiled.

“Miss me?”

Before he could say anything he was lifted high into the air. Suddenly he drop down, and watched his wife’s open mouth become larger. Passing by her teeth, Harold knew things were over. He saw the mouth close and felt the head tilt back down. It was humid and quiet in Shelly’s mouth. Harold looked down at the pulsating tongue. With a quick movement, the tongue moved him back toward her throat. The floor fell out from under him and he tumbled down into the darkness.

**************************************************************************** **

Shelly waited a moment and then the same thing happened again. A rip on her pants appeared on her other leg and both rips slowly snaked up both legs. Her t-shirt shrunk again, and deep rips appeared in the sleeves. She stretched and instinctively reached out her hand. To her surprise it hit the ceiling. “Ah hell,” she said, “I’m getting too big.” She looked down at the remote.
15512211212112111122112122.title: “Miss me?”

155122112121121111221121221.content:
She aimed the remote at her chest. “I might as well go full blown.” She chuckled at that and looked at the remote. Twirling the dial to the highest setting, she pointed it at herself and fired. The tingling sensation came back like nothing she had ever felt.

Suddenly she heard the rips grow a bit more and watched as the ceiling came up to meet her. With a dull creek and a crash, she passed through the upper sections of the house. Within moments her head had poked through the roof of the house. Punching through either side of the outer walls, she stood up and removed what was left of her home.

Looking down at herself, she saw that the sweatpants were still on her, though now they were more of shorts. Looking at the t-shirt she found that it also was still mostly there, though now it was more of a tube top. For whatever the reason, that clothes stayed, and she was thankful for it. She looked down at the world and smiled.
155122112121121111221121221.title: Rips and Tears

1551221121211212.content:
"EWWW...SPEAKING OF BUGS." Shelly said, her eyes boring into Kates' tiny form.

"Oh, no...please no..." Kate said, her voice seemingly little more than to squeak to even herself. She looked up at Amber. "Help me! Please! Tell her it's me!" Amber looked down and smiled evilly.

"EWW...LOOKS LIKE THE BUG PROBLEM FOLLOWED YOU HOME!" Amber said, wickedly.

"You bitch! Please! Don't do this to me, you're my best friend!" Kate cried. She turned and looked up at her Mom. "No, Mom! It's me, Katie! Please don't step on me! I'm not a bug!"

"DID YOU HEAR SOMETHING?" Shelly asked, looking behind her.

"NOPE. NOTHING." Amber said, "MAYBE THE BUG IS SQUEAKING."

"HMM. MAYBE. THAT'D BE FUNNY, IF BUGS COULD TALK..." Shelly said.

"YEAH," Amber agreed, "'OH, PLEASE, GIANT LADY...DON'T SQUISH ME! PLEASE!'" Amber mocked in a squeaky voice. Shelly laughed.

"WELL, SORRY, BUG...BUT YOU'RE IN MY HOUSE, AND I'M GOING TO SQUISH YOU. THAT'LL TEACH YOU TO COME INTO THE GIANTS' DOMAIN!" Shelly said with a grin.

"No, Mom!" Kate screamed. Shelly lifted her high-heel up and began to lower it quickly upon her Daughter. "Mommy, please, don't! MOMMY!" She screamed. The sole crashed into her and began to squish her into the ground. Katie felt her Mom's massive weight bear down on her, squeezing her body, collapsing her body beneath her. She couldn't hear or feel anything but the sole of the shoe, dirty and scuffed, squashing her. Her own Mother was ending her life like an insect, destroying her utterly beneath the lowest part of her body. Kate, in her last moments, was reminded of her thoughts of Amber, about how her life was only a plaything to used and discarded by Amber. This was worse. Now she was just a nusiance, a pest that her Mother could casually murder beneath her feet. Kate felt even smaller and more worthless at this fate, and with her last breath spit blood onto the bottom of the foot. This, however, only blended with the rest of her blood as she exploded onto her Mothers' sole. Kate, apparently, was born to be a stain on her Mother's shoe.
.....................

Shelly twisted her foot on top of the bug and then stepped back, looking at the stain. "Eww..." she grabbed a tissue and wiped the remains of her Daughter from her shoe, "That bug had a lot of blood in it."

"Yeah..."
1551221121211212.title: Kates' destiny

1551221122.content:
Amber placed a hand over the glass and then tipped it, feeling the slight thump of Kates' tiny body into her palm. She then lifted the glass away and saw Kate wiggling like a confused insect in the lines of her palm. She lowered her face down low to the hand and looked closely at her. "YOU ARE JUST TOO CUTE, KATE." Kate looked up.

"What are you going to do with me?" Kate asked, cowering in fear from her enormous face. Ambers' sweet breath cascaded over her, threatening to roll her further on the soft fleshy landscape she was lying on.

"KATE, STOP THAT...I WON'T HURT YOU. YOU KNOW THAT. I JUST WAS TESTING IN THE DEVICE WORKED, AND IT DID, AND I GOT A LITTLE CARRIED AWAY. I'M SORRY, OKAY?"

"O-okay..." Kate said. She was about to ask about being restored, but Autumn cut her off.

"JUST THINK WHAT COULD HAPPEN WITH THAT DEVICE, KATE!" Amber said.

"We could rule the school!" Kate said. Amber frowned.

"WE?"

"I mean...you! YOU could rule the school. And I'd be with you, like always!" Kate said, suddenly fearful again. Ambers' huge eyes stared down at her.
1551221122.title: Plotting

15512211221.content: "Okay, I'll restore you." she says. She hits the reverse button and shoots it at Kate. Does something bad happen to Amber?
15512211221.title: Payback

155122112211.content: As Amber pressed the button she accidentally hit the magnify button to...
155122112211.title: giant kate

1551221122112.content: Amber hits the button and Kate grows back to her original height, but then continues to grow to...
1551221122112.title: Payback

choices: Amber has some tests for Kate
15512211222.content:
"I'M SORRY, KATE...BUT I CAN'T MAKE YOU BIG AGAIN." Amber said without emotion.

"Why not?!" Kate asked.

"BECAUSE...YOU MIGHT TRY TO TAKE THE REMOTE FROM ME AND USE IT YOURSELF. MAYBE YOU'D WANT REVENGE ON ME FROM MY TEASING YOU. OR MAYBE YOU WANT TO BE THE BIGGEST GIRL IN SCHOOL YOURSELF." Amber said.

"No! Please, Amber...I want to be normal again!" Kate said.

"I'M SORRY, KATE." Amber said, shaking her head, making Kate dizzy as she watched the long blonde hair shake around.

"Oh, please! I'll do anything, Amber! Anything!"

"HMMM....ANYTHING?" Amber asked, looking thoughtful.
15512211222.title: Refusal

choices: Old man walking across the street
15512212.content: Who do they choose to test it on?
15512212.title: Amber and Kate find a test subject

1552.content:
She looked at her huge surroundings.
"What am I going to do?", she says. She looked at the remote. She thought that it wouldn't be of much help, but she should hide it. She pushed it with all her strength behind some bushes. She know stopped to think. She would be in danger outside, so she walked into her house. Inside, she had to think again. She had to get someone's attention, but who? Who could she trust?
1552.title: Who's help?

15521.content: So, males would be more likely to recognize her when they see her, instead of shouting and running like females. Who?
15521.title: Male

15522.content: Ok, a female should be less likely to squash her if she thought she was a bug. Who?
15522.title: Female

info.brief_description: The schools beautiful in-crowd decide to literally become bigger than everyone else.
info.description: Jennifer gets her friends together to teach the nerdy world a lesson by shrinking and getting rid of them! Please keep to the usual eating or stomping additions.
